点三个点表示省略
diǎn sāngè diǎn biǎoshì shěnglüè 
put three dots to show that something has been omitted
这一段与主题关系不大，满可以省略。
Zhè yíduàn yǔ zhǔtí guānxì bú dà，mǎn kěyǐ shěnglüè。
This irrelevant paragraph may well be left out.
这个句子的主语省略了。
Zhège jùzi de zhǔyǔ shěnglüè le。
The subject of the sentence is understood.
这里的省略号是用来表示对话的断断续续。
Zhèli de shěnglüèhào shì yònglái biǎoshì duìhuà de duànduànxùxù。
The suspension points here are used to show the intermittence of the dialogue.
省略
shěngluè
omit
省略
省略。
省略了一道工序。
承前省略。
Unnecessary register procedures must be rejected to raise our work efficiency.
为了提高我们的工作效率，不必要的登记程序必须省略掉。
New Englanders drop their post-vocalic r\'s.
Xīn Yīnggélán rén shěnglüè yuányīn hòu de r。
新英格兰人省略元音后的r。
The British get &quot;pud&quot; from &quot;pudding&quot; by apocope.
Yīngguórén bǎ“pudding”de cíwěi shěnglüè，dédào“pud”yì cí。
英国人把“pudding”的词尾省略，得到“pud”一词。
The explanation was concise，even elliptical to the verge of obscurity.
Zhè fèn jiěshì sānjiānqíkǒu，shènzhì shěnglüè dàole móhu de dìbù。
这份解释三缄其口，甚至省略到了模糊的地步。
A common syntax error is to omit a parenthesis.
Yígè chángjiàn de yǔfǎcuòwù shì shěnglüè chārù yǔ。
一个常见的语法错误是省略插入语。
The tactically useful province is still firmly in the rebels\' hands.
Nàgè zhànlüè yào shěng réngrán láoláo de kòngzhì zài pànjūn shǒushàng。
那个战略要省仍然牢牢地控制在叛军手上。
点三个点表示省略
diǎn sāngè diǎn biǎoshì shěnglüè 
put three dots to show that something has been omitted
由于营销策略的改变，第三季度的销售额陡增。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè de gǎibiàn，dìsān jìdù de xiāoshòu\'é dǒuzēng。
The sales volume in the third quarter skyrocketed, which should be attributed to the change in marketing strategy.
小数点以后第三位的数字可以忽略不计。

bǎochí shílì zuò zhànlüè shàng de chètuì 
maintain military strength through strategic retreats
由于线索过于疏略，我们的侦破工作难度很大。
Yóuyú xiànsuǒ guòyú shūlüè，wǒmen de zhēnpò gōngzuò nándù hěndà。
The clues are too sketchy, so it\'s hard to carry out our detective work.
情况有变，是以对计划略作修改。

你的工作是定下战略并将其付诸实施。

Please avoid using abbreviations that may be confusing to everyone but the author.

小数点以后第三位的数字可以忽略不计。
The name was omitted due to oversight.
由于忽略，名字被漏掉了。
略知皮毛
lüè zhī pímáo
have only a superficial knowledge (of a subject)
对于这件事，我也只是略知皮毛。
Duìyú zhèjiàn shì，wǒ yě zhǐshì lüèzhī pímáo。
I know only a little about this matter.
这个句子的主语省略了。

The subject of the sentence is understood.

The patient became a bit better after the acupuncture treatment.
我略为晚到了一会儿，他就等急了。

I was just a little late, but he was already impatient.
侵略行为
qīnlüè xíngwéi
act of aggression; aggression
这些士兵没有一个愿意为侵略战争卖命。

略为迟疑了一下就坐下了。

安迪的英明策略为公司带来了一单大生意。

他最后还是出演了这一角色，因为片酬略涨了一些。

lüèwēi yǒudiǎn gǎnmào

他提供的材料过于简略。

After several years of struggle, the guerrilla forces finally defeated the invader.
暴雨过后，才略有凉意。
to pass unnoticed
被忽略过去
Routine steps can be skipped in an emergency.
例行的步骤在紧急情况下可以略过。
Don\'t skip over that fact before you haven\'t come to any decision.
在你下决定之前，别略过了那个事实。
I jumped over a few boring chapters in the book.
Wǒ lüè guòle zhè běn shū de yìxiē wúliáo zhāngjié。

Denholm Elliott has been warned off booze after a health scare.

略读
lüè dú 
a cursory reading
对于那种故事性不强的书，我仅仅略读而已。
Duìyú nàzhǒng gùshìxìng bùqiáng de shū，wǒ jǐnjǐn lüèdú éryǐ。
I just skim books which do not tell stories.
我通过读佛经来领略佛教思想的精义。
Wǒ tōngguò dú fójīng lái lǐnglüè fójiào sīxiǎng de jīngyì。
I try to comprehend the profoundity of Buddhist ideas by reading Buddhist scriptures.
名著缩略版很适合儿童阅读。
Míngzhù suōlüèbǎn hěnshìhé értóng yuèdú。
Simplified editions of famous works are suitable for children to read.
He skimmed over some of the central arguments on both sides.
Tā lüè dúle yíxià shuāngfāng de yìxiē zhǔyào guāndiǎn。
他略读了一下双方的一些主要观点。
I\'ve skimmed through the book.
wǒ lüè dúle biàn zhè běn shū。
我略读了遍这本书。
Roland and James looked through them and decided who should read what.
Luólándé hé Zhānmǔsī cūlüè de fānyuèle yíxià，juédìngle shuí dú shénme。
罗兰德和詹姆斯粗略地翻阅了一下，决定了谁读什么。
这个词略带贬义。
Zhège cí lüè dài biǎnyì。
This word is slightly derogative.
她说的普通话略带南方方音。
Tā shuō de pǔtōnghuà lüèdài nánfāng fāngyīn。
She speaks mandarin with a slight southern accent.
我喜欢上了羌笛那略带哀怨的音色。
Wǒ xǐhuan shàng le qiāngdí nà lüèdài āiyuàn de yīnsè。
I fell in love with the subtly plaintive timbre of the Qiang flute.
带你去领略一下少林功夫如何？
Dài nǐ qù lǐnglüè yíxià shàolín gōngfu rúhé？
How about letting me show you some Shaolin martial arts skills?
略带酒意。
Her new novel is tinged with thinnish humor.
她的新小说略带诙谐。
Packed snow would become a firm, stable, even slightly sticky surface.
Yā shí de xuě huì xíngchéng yí gè jiāngù、wěndìng、shènzhì lüèdài niánxìng de biǎomiàn。
压实的雪会形成一个坚固、稳定、甚至略带粘性的表面。
For a moment she looked accusingly at his abundant hair, his olive skin, his blameless eyes.
Yí huìer，tā lüèdài zébèi de kànzhe tā nóngmì de tóufa、gǎnlǎnsè pífū hé wúgū de yǎnjing。
一会儿，她略带责备地看着他浓密的头发、橄榄色皮肤和无辜的眼睛。
I flung away the cigar with a certain wasteful symbolism.

我以一种略带浪费的意味扔掉了雪茄。
Andy\'s great policy brought the company a big deal.
安迪的英明策略为公司带来了一单大生意。

新的营销策略给我们带来了切实的利润。

这些策略为经纪自营商带来收益。
The landscape unit drawn diagrammatically illustrates the gentle rolling relief, with a peat-filled basin.
Huìzhì de dìxíng dānyuántú gàilüè de chǎnmíngle zhège qǐfú héhuǎn de dìmào —— qízhōng dàiyǒu yí gè fùhán níméi de péndì。
绘制的地形单元图概略地阐明了这个起伏和缓的地貌——其中带有一个富含泥煤的盆地。
间架匀称，详略得当。
关于那个问题他只略略说了几句。
Guānyú nàge wèntí tā zhǐ lüèlüè shuō le jǐ jù。
He touched only briefly on that question.

Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.

We\'ll never forget that those invaders murdered people by burying them alive.

I just skim books which do not tell stories.

相比较而言，还是这篇文章略胜一筹。
Xiāng bǐjiào éryán，háishi zhèpiān wénzhāng lüèshèng yìchóu。

我略为晚到了一会儿，他就等急了。

对于这件事，我也只是略知皮毛。

Tā dúzài yìxiāng，xīn zhōng lüèyǒu xiē qīwǎng。

我喜欢上了羌笛那略带哀怨的音色。
Wǒ xǐhuan shàng le qiāngdí nà lüèdài āiyuàn de yīnsè。
I fell in love with the subtly plaintive timbre of the Qiang flute.
我空军采取强击策略，将目标定在了敌军指挥部。
Wǒ kōngjūn cǎiqǔ qiángjī cèlüè，jiāng mùbiāo dìngzài le díjūn zhǐhuībù。
Our air force adopted a forceful attacking strategy, and fixed our targets on the enemy\'s headquarters.
他写的故事过于缺略，应该再增加些细节。
Tā xiě de gùshì guòyú quēlüè，yīnggāi zài zēngjiā xiē xìjié。
The stories he writes are incomplete, they need more details.

Qīnlüèzhě de bàoxíng yǐnfā le rénmín zhànzhēng de gāocháo。
The aggressors\' atrocities aroused a surge in the people\'s war.
疏略细节是你失败的主要原因。
Shūlüè xìjié shì nǐ shībài de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for your failure is your neglect of details.
由于线索过于疏略，我们的侦破工作难度很大。
Yóuyú xiànsuǒ guòyú shūlüè，wǒmen de zhēnpò gōngzuò nándù hěndà。
The clues are too sketchy, so it\'s hard to carry out our detective work.
名著缩略版很适合儿童阅读。
Míngzhù suōlüèbǎn hěnshìhé értóng yuèdú。
Simplified editions of famous works are suitable for children to read.
今年的投效比往年略有起色。
Jīnnián de tóuxiào bǐ wǎngnián lüèyǒu qǐsè。
The rate of return this year is slightly better than that of past years.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
他忽略了一个重要的细故，致使结论错误。
Tā hūlüè le yígè zhòngyào de xìgù，zhìshǐ jiélùn cuòwù。
He neglected an important condition which led to a incorrect conclusion.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
写文章必须抓住重点，做到详略得当。
Xiě wénzhāng bìxū zhuāzhù zhòngdiǎn，zuòdào xiánglüè dédàng。
One must grasp the main idea and be consistent in writing.
侵略者来势汹汹，我们要尽快想好应敌之策。
Qīnlüèzhě láishì xiōngxiōng，wǒmen yào jǐnkuài xiǎnghǎo yìngdí zhī cè。
The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
由于策略正确，正大集团今年坐收余利。
Yóuyú cèlüè zhèngquè，zhèngdà jítuán jīnnián zuòshōu yúlì。
Thanks to the correct strategy, the CP Group can sit idly and collect profit this year.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.
战争中战略物资的运输很重要。
Zhànzhēng zhōng zhànlüè wùzī de yùnshū hěn zhòngyào。
During a war, the transportation of strategic materials is very important.
为了抗击外国的侵略，他们自发组成志愿军。
Wèile kàngjī wàiguó de qīnlüè，tāmen zìfā zǔchéng zhìyuànjūn。
For the purpose of fighting against  the foreign invasion, they organized spontaneously an army composed of volunteers.
不愧是一代宗师，他走棋的策略千变万化。
Búkuì shì yídài zōngshī，tā zǒuqí de cèlüè qiānbiàn wànhuà。
With an ever-changing strategy for playing chess, he is really worthy of being called a master.
游击队经过几年的斗争终于打败了侵略者。
Yóujīduì jīngguò jǐnián de dòuzhēng zhōng yú dǎbài le qīnlüèzhě。
After several years of struggle, the guerrilla forces finally defeated the invader.
成本核算时有形损耗往往不会被忽略。
Chéngběn hésuàn shí yǒuxíng sǔnhào wǎngwǎng búhuì bèi hūlüè。
When calculating the cost, material loss is usually not neglected.
由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。
Yóuyú gōngsī jīnnián yíngxiāo cèlüè dédàng，lìrùn yuányuán érlái。
Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.
这里的省略号是用来表示对话的断断续续。
Zhèli de shěnglüèhào shì yònglái biǎoshì duìhuà de duànduànxùxù。
The suspension points here are used to show the intermittence of the dialogue.
侵略者的残暴
qīnluèzhěde cánbào
the cruelty of the invaders
侵略者受到了应得的惩罚。
Qīnluèzhě shòudàole yīngdéde chéngfá。
The invaders got the punishment they deserved.

zhànluèyàochōng
place of strategic importance
粗略的分类
cūluède fēnlèi
rough classification
易被忽略的细节
yì bèi hūluède xìjié
details that could be easily overlooked
他说话一贯很简略。
Tā shuōhuà yíguàn hěn jiǎnluè.
What he says is always very sketchy.
他简略介绍了公司的情况。
Tā jiǎnluè jièshàole gōngsī de qíngkuàng.
He gave a brief description of the situation at the company.

The end had finally come for the invaders.

Tā shì gè yǒu móuluè 、 yǒu cáizhì de jūnshìjiā.

驱除侵略者

Cānjiā shìwēi de rénshù，yuēluè yǒu shíwàn rén。

政府策略一向都是拒绝和恐怖分子谈判。
The politics of the company will ruin their image.
公司的策略会毁掉他们的形象。

老板总是不在办公室，她对此略有微词。

你的工作是定下战略并将其付诸实施。

在战略会议上，她的观点未被予以考虑。

如果你的意见没有被听取，就是说它被人们忽略了。

零和博弈是指在一个博弈中，无论每个参与人选择什么样的策略，所有参与人的支付之和总是为零。

他想到了一个逐渐削弱对手的战略。

例行的步骤在紧急情况下可以略过。

现在，许多国家都把农业发展放在发展战略的优先地位。
Don\'t skip over that fact before you haven\'t come to any decision.
在你下决定之前，别略过了那个事实。

他最后还是出演了这一角色，因为片酬略涨了一些。

看合同时不要忽略细节。

该标题因缺少空间而被节略。

我略施小计，使竞争对手不知所措。

The same point can be made in a slightly different way.
Yòng lüèwēi bùtóng de fāngfǎ kěyǐ dédào xiāngtóng de guāndiǎn

Jiàgé lüèyǒu xiàjiàng。

Please avoid using abbreviations that may be confusing to everyone but the author.
Qǐng bìmiǎn shǐyòng nàxiē huì lìng chú zuòzhě běnrén zhīwài de suǒyǒurén dōu míhuòbùjiě de suōlüèyǔ。
请避免使用那些会令除作者本人之外的所有人都迷惑不解的缩略语。
Do not ignore warnings from the locals if the volcano is active, it can be very dangerous near the summit
Rúguǒ huǒshān hěn huóyuè，nàme qiānwàn búyào hūlüè dāngdì de jǐngshì，lí huǒshān shāndǐng guò jìn huì fēicháng wēixiǎn。
如果火山很活跃，那么千万不要忽略当地的警示，离火山山顶过近会非常危险。
Entering into an alliance is a strategy for a smaller country to win a war.
Jiārù liánméng shì xiǎo guójiā yíngdé zhànzhēng de yìzhǒng zhànlüè。
加入联盟是小国家赢得战争的一种战略。

It was widely conceived that this was a better strategy.
Guǎngfàn rènwéi，zhè shì gèng hǎo de cèlüè。

他明显地忽略了这个问题。
A form-only requirement is usually ignored.
Xíngshì shàng de yāoqiú jīngcháng bèi hūlüè。
形式上的要求经常被忽略。
The invaders scorched the land.
Qīnlüèzhě shǐ zhèli chéngwéi jiāotǔ。
侵略者使这里成为焦土。
He was sadly neglected.
Tā bèi hěn kělián de hūlüè le。
他被很可怜地忽略了。
The invaders encountered stiff opposition.
Qīnlüèzhě yùdàole wánqiáng de dǐkàng。
侵略者遇到了顽强的抵抗。
Their strategies have drawn in more investors.
tāmen de cèlüè yǐ xīyǐnle gèngduō tóuzīzhě。
他们的策略已吸引了更多投资者。
These strategies generated money for broker-dealers.
zhèxiē cèlüè wèi jīngjì zìyíngshāng dàilái shōuyì。
这些策略为经纪自营商带来收益。
The ECB has an exit strategy from its non-standard measures in place.
ōuzhōu Yāngháng mùqián yōngyǒu tuìchū fēichángguī cuòshī de cèlüè。
欧洲央行目前拥有退出非常规措施的策略。
A tie-up would tick several strategic boxes.
liǎngzhě de hébìng jùyǒu duōchóng zhànlüèyìyì。
两者的合并具有多重战略意义。
The potential fruits of this strategy are most obviously commercial.
zhè yī zhànlüè zuì míngxiǎn de qiánzài chéngguǒ shì shāngyè shàng de。
这一战略最明显的潜在成果是商业上的。
领略川菜风味
lǐnɡlüè chuāncài fēnɡwèi 
taste Sichuan dishes
领略塞外风光
lǐnglüè sàiwài fēngguāng
see and appreciate the scenery north of the Great Wall
带你去领略一下少林功夫如何？
Dài nǐ qù lǐnglüè yíxià shàolín gōngfu rúhé？
How about letting me show you some Shaolin martial arts skills?
你要用心去领略中国艺术的精微。
Nǐ yào yòngxīn qù lǐnglüè Zhōngguó yìshù de jīngwēi。
You must try to comprehend the profoundity and subtlety of Chinese art.
我通过读佛经来领略佛教思想的精义。

I try to comprehend the profoundity of Buddhist ideas by reading Buddhist scriptures.

他领军作战很有谋略
distill,distil the meaning of a poem
领略诗的精髓
It is a shame that you haven\'t been having the gorgeous autumn which we have enjoyed.

你没有领略到我们尽情享受的绚丽秋景，真是太遗憾了。
He caught only a glimpse of the professor\'s meaning.
Tā zhǐ dàlüè lǐnghuìle nà wèi jiàoshòu de yìtú。
他只大略领会了那位教授的意图。
You have the edge on me.
你略微领先于我。
They invaded our territorial waters.
Tāmen qīnlüèle wǒmen de lǐnghǎi。
他们侵略了我们的领海。
本报略有删节
běnbào lüèyǒu shānjié
slightly abridged by our editorial staff
I jumped over a few boring chapters in the book.
Wǒ lüè guòle zhè běn shū de yìxiē wúliáo zhāngjié。
我略过了这本书的一些无聊章节。
编辑节略了来稿不正确的地方。
Biānjí jiélüè le láigǎo búzhèngquè de dìfāng。
The editor abridged the incorrect parts of the contribution.
这是我论文的节略，请专家指正。
Zhè shì wǒ lùnwén de jiélüè，qǐng zhuānjiā zhǐzhèng。
This is the summary of my thesis, and I hope you experts will give your comments on it.
你把这个节略交给那位外交官。
Nǐ bǎ zhège jiélüè jiāogěi nà wèi wàijiāoguān。
Send this memorandum to that diplomat.
节略
jiéluè
outline
疏略细节是你失败的主要原因。
Shūlüè xìjié shì nǐ shībài de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for your failure is your neglect of details.
略去细节
lüè qù xìjié 
leave out the details
本报略有删节
běnbào lüèyǒu shānjié
slightly abridged by our editorial staff
易被忽略的细节
yì bèi hūluède xìjié
details that could be easily overlooked
我们忽略了一个重要的细节。
Wǒmen hūlüè le yígè zhóngyào de xìjié。
We overlooked an important detail.
他写的故事过于缺略，应该再增加些细节。
Tā xiě de gùshì guòyú quēlüè，yīnggāi zài zēngjiā xiē xìjié。
The stories he writes are incomplete, they need more details.
节略了文章的开头和结尾。
只转发了文章的节略，没有发表全文。
不能只注重枝节考据而疏略了宏观研究。
The headline was capsulized for the lack of space.
Gāi biāotí yīn quēshǎo kōngjiān ér bèi jiélüè。
该标题因缺少空间而被节略。
Don\'t ignore the specifics when reading the contract.
看合同时不要忽略细节。
Details of the plan remain sketchy.
Gāi xiàng jìhuà de xìjié yīrán hěn cūlüè。
该项计划的细节依然很粗略。
We will explore the method further in the chapter dealing with tactics.
Wǒmen jiāng zài tǎolùn cèlüè wèntí de zhāngjié zhōng jìnyíbù tàntǎo gāi wèntí。
我们将在讨论策略问题的章节中进一步探讨该问题。
I jumped over a few boring chapters in the book.
Wǒ lüè guòle zhè běn shū de yìxiē wúliáo zhāngjié。
我略过了这本书的一些无聊章节。
这道题还比较容易，仅需要略论一下。
Zhè dào tí hái bǐjiào róngyì，jǐn xūyào lüèlùn yíxià。
This question is relatively easy, and only needs brief argumentation.
相比较而言，还是这篇文章略胜一筹。
Xiāng bǐjiào éryán，háishi zhèpiān wénzhāng lüèshèng yìchóu。
By comparison, this article is a notch above.
他提供的材料过于简略。
Tā tígōng de cáiliào guòyú jiǎnlüè。
The material he supplied is too sketchy.
简略地拟出计划要点
jiǎnlüè de nǐchū jìhuà yàodiǎn 
sketch out the main points of the plan
他说话一贯很简略。
Tā shuōhuà yíguàn hěn jiǎnluè.
What he says is always very sketchy.
他简略介绍了公司的情况。
Tā jiǎnluè jièshàole gōngsī de qíngkuàng.
He gave a brief description of the situation at the company.
发动侵略战争的人，简直就是危害世界和平的反动派。
Fādòng qīnlüè zhànzhēng de rén，jiǎnzhí jiùshì wēihài shìjiè hépíng de fǎndòngpài。
Those who started the war of aggression are reactionaries who put the peace of the world in danger.
简略
内容简略。
a capsule biography
简历，简略的传记
a thumbnail sketch
略图；简略的速写
The writer only gave a thumbnail sketch of his characters.
这位作家对他作品中的人物只作简略的勾画。
The article only glances over the problem.
该文只简略地提到了这个问题。
This curt sumMary is not meant to be ungracious.

简略的摘要并不意味着就要没吸引力。
I want to be very brief, as I skate over the next couple of chapters.
wǒ xiǎng yào hěn jiǎndān dàlüè de tí yíxià jiēxiàlái de jǐ zhāng。
我想要很简单大略地提一下接下来的几章。
When he decided to go, he reckoned without Jane.
Tā juédìng zǒu de shíhou hūlüèle Jiǎn。
他决定走的时候忽略了简。
我们忽略了一个重要的细节。
Wǒmen hūlüè le yígè zhóngyào de xìjié。
We overlooked an important detail.
我们不能只关心孩子智力因素的训练，而忽略了非智力因素的培养。

We should concern ourselves with the intellectual factors as well as the non-intellectual ones of our children.
他忽略了一个重要的细故，致使结论错误。
Tā hūlüè le yígè zhòngyào de xìgù，zhìshǐ jiélùn cuòwù。
He neglected an important condition which led to a incorrect conclusion.
成本核算时有形损耗往往不会被忽略。
Chéngběn hésuàn shí yǒuxíng sǔnhào wǎngwǎng búhuì bèi hūlüè。
When calculating the cost, material loss is usually not neglected.
易被忽略的细节
yì bèi hūluède xìjié
details that could be easily overlooked
忽略
这点很重要，千万不能忽略。
小数点以后第三位的数字可以忽略不计。
Some parents persistently overlook or ignore their children\'s good behaviour.
Yìxiē fùmǔ zǒngshì hūlüè huò hūshì háizi de liánghǎo biǎoxiàn。
一些父母总是忽略或忽视孩子的良好表现。
a omission due to oversight
因忽略而产生的遗漏
The name was omitted due to oversight.
由于忽略，名字被漏掉了。
If your advice falls on deaf ears, people will ignore it.
如果你的意见没有被听取，就是说它被人们忽略了。
to go by the board
被忽略
to omit to do sth
忽略做某事
to pass unnoticed
被忽略过去
to lose sight of sth
[fig] 忽略某事
People should not keep exploiting natural resources without thinking about the environmental damages that causes.
人们开发自然资源的同时不应忽略破坏环境的代价。
They are the underclass and thus usually left out of the picture.
他们属于最下层，一般就都被人们所忽略了。

Mourning can have a therapeutic function that we ignore at our peril.

When he decided to go, he reckoned without Jane.

It splits hairs over non-essential points and ignores the fact that it wouldn\'t matter.

这不过是在为琐事而争辩，忽略了这并不重要的事实。

He discussed the general but neglected the particular.
Tā tǎolùn de shì yìbān qíngkuàng ér hūlüèle tèshū qíngkuàng。
他讨论的是一般情况而忽略了特殊情况。
The effect was negligible.

影响可以忽略不计。
His retirement was not allowed to go unmarked.
Tā de tuìxiū shì bùrónghūlüè de。
他的退休是不容忽略的。
He tried vainly to impress his neglecters.
Tā nǔlì gěi hūlüè tā de rén liúxià yìnxiàng，dàn méiyǒu chénggōng。
他努力给忽略他的人留下印象，但没有成功。
He light-heartedly overlooks some of the basic facts of life.

xióngcái dàlüè

This irrelevant paragraph may well be left out.

大众没有理解这个粗略的声明。
Mr. Alexander launched a scathing attack on Labour\'s campaign tactics.

Andy\'s great policy brought the company a big deal.

策略
cèlüè
tactics
由于营销策略的改变，第三季度的销售额陡增。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè de gǎibiàn，dìsān jìdù de xiāoshòu\'é dǒuzēng。
The sales volume in the third quarter skyrocketed, which should be attributed to the change in marketing strategy.
他通过复盘给我讲解下棋策略。
Tā tōngguò fùpán gěi wǒ jiǎngjiě xiàqí cèlüè。
He explains the tactics of chess to me by replaying the original situations of the chessboard.
我空军采取强击策略，将目标定在了敌军指挥部。
Wǒ kōngjūn cǎiqǔ qiángjī cèlüè，jiāng mùbiāo dìngzài le díjūn zhǐhuībù。
Our air force adopted a forceful attacking strategy, and fixed our targets on the enemy\'s headquarters.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
由于策略正确，正大集团今年坐收余利。
Yóuyú cèlüè zhèngquè，zhèngdà jítuán jīnnián zuòshōu yúlì。
Thanks to the correct strategy, the CP Group can sit idly and collect profit this year.
不愧是一代宗师，他走棋的策略千变万化。
Búkuì shì yídài zōngshī，tā zǒuqí de cèlüè qiānbiàn wànhuà。
With an ever-changing strategy for playing chess, he is really worthy of being called a master.
由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。
Yóuyú gōngsī jīnnián yíngxiāo cèlüè dédàng，lìrùn yuányuán érlái。
Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.
策略
cèluè
tactic
战略决策
zhànlüè juécè
strategic decision
侵略者来势汹汹，我们要尽快想好应敌之策。
Qīnlüèzhě láishì xiōngxiōng，wǒmen yào jǐnkuài xiǎnghǎo yìngdí zhī cè。
The invaders attacked in full fury, and we must think out a strategy to deal with them.
策略
功防策略。
制定并运用正确的工作策略
处理此事，要策略一些
伟大的战略决策。
The government\'s official line has always been to refuse to negotiate with terrorists.
政府策略一向都是拒绝和恐怖分子谈判。
The politics of the company will ruin their image.
公司的策略会毁掉他们的形象。
tactical voting
[BRIT] 策略性投票
This country has an aggressive foreign policy.
这个国家采用的是一种侵略性的外交策略。
The new marketing policy of the company has proved to be a failed effort.
公司的新市场策略已被证明为是一次失败的尝试。
Andy\'s great policy brought the company a big deal.
安迪的英明策略为公司带来了一单大生意。
A zero-sum game is a game in which the sum of the payoffs of all the players is zero whatever strategies they choose.
零和博弈是指在一个博弈中，无论每个参与人选择什么样的策略，所有参与人的支付之和总是为零。
Intelligence sources told us we should change our strategy if we want to win the war.
从情报来看，如果要赢得这场战争，我们就应该改变策略。
Our company\'s strategy has been questioned by some investors.
一些投资者对我们公司的策略表示了质疑。
Poison pills is one strategy used to defend against hostile takeovers.
使用毒药是一种抵御侵略的策略。
The new marketing strategy has brought us visual profits.
新的营销策略给我们带来了切实的利润。
His first task was to give the new group a strategic thrust.
Tā de shǒuyàorènwù shì yǒu cèlüè de jīlì zhè zhī xīn duì de shìqì。
他的首要任务是有策略地激励这支新队的士气。
The coach called a draw for the next play.
Jiàoliàn mìnglìng xiàyíbù cǎiyòng xūchuánshípǎo cèlüè。
教练命令下一步采用虚传实跑策略。
It was widely conceived that this was a better strategy.
Guǎngfàn rènwéi，zhè shì gèng hǎo de cèlüè。
广泛认为，这是更好的策略。
The strategy specifies the maximum concentration of a pollutant which is allowed to be emitted.
Zhège cèlüè quèdìngle yì zhǒng yǔnxǔ páifàng de wūrǎn wùzhì de zuì gāo nóngdù。
这个策略确定了一种允许排放的污染物质的最高浓度。
Research must now turn toward farming strategies that conserve energy.
Yánjiū xiànzài bìxū zhuǎnxiàng néngliàng bǎocún cèlüè de zhìdìng。
研究现在必须转向能量保存策略的制定。
An hour later they used the same tactics to gain entry to the other half of the camp.
Yí gè xiǎoshí hòu，tāmen shǐyòngle tóngyàng de cèlüè déyǐ jìnrù lìng yí bàn de zhàngpeng。
一个小时后，他们使用了同样的策略得以进入另一半的帐篷。
They say a pest control campaign is needed to stop a squirrel population explosion.
Jùshuō xūyào yòng chónghài fángzhì cèlüè lái kòngzhì sōngshǔ shùliàng de zēngzhǎng。
据说需要用虫害防治策略来控制松鼠数量的增长。
Research can help a company to develop its global marketing strategy.
Yánjiū néng bāngzhù gōngsī zhìdìng chū qí quánqiú yíngxiāo cèlüè。
研究能帮助公司制定出其全球营销策略。
All Blacks\' tactics and mentality will prove valuable.
Bùláikèsī suǒyǒu de cèlüè hé cáizhì dōuhuì fāhuī zuòyòng de。
布莱克斯所有的策略和才智都会发挥作用的。
The strategy on each hole is completely decided by the position of the flag on the green.
Duì měi gè qiúdòng de cèlüè wánquán yóu cǎodì qígān de wèizhi quèdìng。
对每个球洞的策略完全由草地旗杆的位置确定。
We will explore the method further in the chapter dealing with tactics.
Wǒmen jiāng zài tǎolùn cèlüè wèntí de zhāngjié zhōng jìnyíbù tàntǎo gāi wèntí。
我们将在讨论策略问题的章节中进一步探讨该问题。
This strategy is better than the previous one.
Zhège cèlüè bǐ qián yí gè gèng hǎo。
这个策略比前一个更好。
Figure out a negotiating strategy with your agent.
Gēn nǐ de dàilǐrén héjì yí gè tánpàn cèlüè bā。
跟你的代理人合计一个谈判策略吧。
Mr. Alexander launched a scathing attack on Labour\'s campaign tactics.
Yàlìshāndà xiānsheng duì gōngdǎng de jìngxuǎn cèlüè fāqǐ měngliè jìngōng。
亚历山大先生对工党的竞选策略发起猛烈进攻。
The Greek strategy was firmly based on the facts of geography.
Xīlàrén de cèlüè yángé jīyú dìlǐxué de shìshí。
希腊人的策略严格基于地理学的事实。
It is necessary to think through your exit strategy.
Yǒu bìyào quánmiàn dì kǎolǜ nǐmen de tuìchū cèluè。
有必要全面地考虑你们的退出策略。
His search for a move that would avoid checkmate was unsuccessful.
Tā méiyǒu zhǎodào yíbù nénggòu bìmiǎn bèi jiāng sǐ de cèlüè。
他没有找到一步能够避免被将死的策略。
Newscasters speculated about the president\'s game plan for an invasion.
Xīnwén pínglùnyuán jìngxiāng cāicè zǒngtǒng duì shíshī rùqīn de cèlüè。
新闻评论员竞相猜测总统对实施入侵的策略。
The government made an announcement about changes in the drug war.
Zhèngfǔ zhēnduì jìndú cèlüè de biànhuà fābiǎo yí xiàng shēngmíng。
政府针对禁毒策略的变化发表一项声明。
The suggester of this absurd strategy was a fool.
Zhège huāngmiù cèlüè de tíyìzhě shì gè shǎguā。
这个荒谬策略的提议者是个傻瓜。
Their strategies have drawn in more investors.
tāmen de cèlüè yǐ xīyǐnle gèngduō tóuzīzhě。
他们的策略已吸引了更多投资者。
These strategies generated money for broker-dealers.
zhèxiē cèlüè wèi jīngjì zìyíngshāng dàilái shōuyì。
这些策略为经纪自营商带来收益。
The ECB has an exit strategy from its non-standard measures in place.
ōuzhōu Yāngháng mùqián yōngyǒu tuìchū fēichángguī cuòshī de cèlüè。
欧洲央行目前拥有退出非常规措施的策略。
他雄才大略满腹经纶，是个不可多得的人才。
Tā xióngcái dàlüè mǎnfù jīnglún，shì gè bùkě duōdé de réncái。
He has great knowledge and bold vision and is a rare genius .

xióngcái dàlüè

欧洲经济共同体
Ōuzhōu Jīngjì Gòngtóngtǐ
the European Economic Community (EEC)

Zài běiōu de shénhuà zhōng，fēngyuán láizìyú fēngshén hé tā de sì gè táoqì érzi。
According to legends from Northern Europe, wind is produced by Aeolus and her four naughty sons.
这一带的建筑群大都是北欧的建筑风格。
Zhè yídài de jiànzhùqún dàdōushì běiōu de jiànzhù fēnggé。
The architectural complex of this area is of the style of northern Europe.
出访欧洲五国的考察团已于今日返抵北京。
Chūfǎng Ōuzhōu wǔguó de kǎochátuán yǐ yú jīnrì fǎndǐ Běijīng。
The delegation returned to Beijing after their visit to five European countries.
I haven\'t been to northern Europe.
我还从来没有去过北欧。
Sweden is a Northern European country.
瑞典是一个北欧国家。
Agassiz recognized marks of glaciation all over northern Europe.
Ājiāxīsī fāxiànle zhěnggè běi\'ōu de bīngchuān biāozhì。
阿加西斯发现了整个北欧的冰川标志。
Each rune had its own magical significance.
Měigè běi\'ōu wénzì dōu yǒu gèzì de wūshù yìyì。
每个北欧文字都有各自的巫术意义。
The birds breed in northern parts of Europe, and winter in France.
Zhèxiē niǎo zài Ōuzhōu běibù fánzhí，zài Fǎguó guòdōng。
这些鸟在欧洲北部繁殖，在法国过冬。
Europe and North America will shift thousands of kilometres northwards into the polar region.
Ōuzhōu hé Běiměi dàlù jiāng xiàng běi yídòng shùqiān gōnglǐ dào jídì dìqū。
欧洲和北美大陆将向北移动数千公里到极地地区。
这些条件白纸黑字，一清二楚，想抵赖是抵赖不掉的。
Zhèxiē tiáojiàn báizhǐhēizì，yìqīng\'èrchǔ，xiǎng dǐlài shì dǐlài bú diào de。
These terms are clearly written in black and white. You can never deny them.
他把情况打听得一清二楚。
Tā bǎ qíngkuàngdǎtīng de yìqīngèrchǔ。
He has found out all about it.
一清二楚
查他个一清二楚。
他是个有心人，对什么问题都要弄个一清二楚。
公私钱物他分得一清二楚，丝毫不含糊
看得一清二楚。
The effects of the drought are apparent to anyone who sees the parched fields.

对于看到干枯的田地的任何人来说，干旱所造成的严重后果是一清二楚的。
头脑清楚
tóunǎo qīngchu
a clear head
头脑清楚
tóunǎo qīngchu
clear-headed
伤员痛楚地吼叫。
Shāngyuán tòngchǔ de hǒujiào。
The wounded soldier shouted in pain.
痛楚消失了。
Tòngchǔ xiāoshī le。
The pain subsided.
她清楚地感觉到，相思的痛苦正啃啮着她的心。
Tā qīngchu de gǎnjué dào，xiāngsī de tòngkǔ zhèng kěnniè zhe tā de xīn。
She misses him so much that the pain is gnawing at her.
这个问题你清楚不清楚？
Zhège wèntí nǐ qīngchu bùqīngchu?
Do you understand this question or not?
不大清楚
bú dà qīngchu 
not too clear
我对这个问题不清楚，只能不赞一词。
Wǒ duì zhège wèntí bùqīngchu，zhǐnéngbúzànyìcí。
I\'m not clear about this matter, so I had better keep quiet.
当面弄清楚
dāngmiàn nòng qīngchu 
straighten things out face to face
这一事件使我们更清楚地懂得了问题的复杂性。
Zhè yí shìjiàn shǐ wǒmen gèng qīngchu de dǒngdé le wèntí de fùzáxìng。
This incident brought home to us the complex nature of the problem.
想清楚了再动笔。
Xiǎng qīngchu le zài dòngbǐ。
Think it all out before you start writing.
这篇文章段落清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng duànluò qīngchu。
This article is well paragraphed.
这事略有耳闻，详细情况不很清楚。
Zhè shì lüèyǒuěrwén，xiángxì qíngkuàng bùhěn qīngchu。
I\'ve heard a little about it, but I don\'t know the details.
他发音不清楚。
Tā fāyīn bùqīngchu。
His articulation is poor.
怪我没讲清楚。
Guài wǒ méi jiǎngqīngchu。
I\'m to blame for not having made it clearer.
把道理讲清楚
bǎ dàolǐ jiǎngqīngchu 
state the reasons clearly
咱们得把情况摸清楚，要不回去就得交白卷。
Zánmen děi bǎ qíngkuàngmō qīngchu，yàobùhuíqù jiù děi jiāo báijuàn。
We must find out exactly how things stand here, or we\'ll have nothing to report.
我不清楚这件事的背景，只能就事论事地谈谈。
Wǒ bùqīngchu zhèjiànshì de bèijǐng，zhǐnéngjiùshìlùnshì de tántan。
I don\'t know the whole background, so I can only judge the case as it stands.
我希望大家开诚布公，把问题摆到桌面上谈清楚。
Wǒ xīwàngdàjiā kāichéngbùgōng，bǎ wèntí bǎidào zhuōmiàn shàngtán qīngchu。
I hope that we can all be perfectly honest about the matter and put all our cards on the table for a frank discussion.
她唱得不错，只是口白不够清楚。
Tā chàng de búcuò，zhǐshì kǒubái bú gòu qīngchu。
She sings well but does not speak clearly enough.
口齿清楚
kǒuchǐ qīnɡchu
have clear enunciation
这篇文章眉目清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngméimù qīngchu。
The article is clear and well-organized.
你把相片拿到明处来，让大家看个清楚。

Bǎ wèntí nàoqīngchu zài fāyán。

有些问题还需要弄清楚。
Yǒuxiē wèntí hái xūyào nòngqīngchu。
Certain questions have yet to be clarified.
我没听清楚，你从起头儿再说一遍。
Wǒ méi tīngqīngchu，nǐ cóngqǐtóur zài shuō yí biàn。

这件事情的前因后果已经调查得清清楚楚。
Zhèjiàn shìqing de qiányīnhòuguǒ yǐjing diàochá de qīngqīngchuchǔ。
The entire matter, its cause and effect, has been fully cleared up through investigation.

zìjì qīngchu

Wǒ zhēn bùqīngchu tā wèishénme zhèyàng zuò。
I really can\'t understand why he has done this.
这件事我们认为有必要跟你们说清楚。
Zhèjiànshì wǒmen rènwéi yǒu bìyào gēn nǐmen shuō qīngchu。
We deem it necessary to make this clear to you.
任凭问题多复杂，我们也能搞清楚。
Rènpíng wèntí duō fùzá，wǒmen yě néng gǎo qīngchu。
We can solve the problem no matter how complicated it is.
这事不是三言两语能说清楚的。
Zhè shì búshì sānyánliǎngyǔ néng shuō qīngchu de。
The matter can\'t be explained in a few words.
事情还没弄清楚，先别声张。
Shìqíng hái méi nòng qīngchu，xiān bié shēngzhāng。

她的思路很清楚。
Tā de sīlù hěn qīngchu。
She thinks very clearly.
现在算把情况弄清楚了。
Xiànzài suàn bǎ qíngkuàng nòng qīngchu le。

这篇文章条理清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngtiáolǐ qīngchu。
The article is well-organized.

吐字清楚
tǔzì qīngchu 
enunciate clearly
有话说清楚，不要吞吞吐吐。
Yǒu huà shuō qīngchu，bú yào tūntuntǔtu。

Zhǐ xiāo jǐ jù huà jiù kěyǐ shuō qīngchu。

Tā yǎozìr qīnɡchǔ。

清楚
qīngchǔ
clear; distinct
这个词很常见，但我不清楚它的比喻义。

Bùyóu wǒmen bǎ shìqing shuō qīngchu，tā jiù cōngcōngmángmáng de pǎokāi le。
He rushed away without allowing us to explain.

你从头到尾把事情说清楚，不要着急。

Wǒ bìxū dǎwèn qīngchu tā qù nǎ le。

对于这个问题的看法，我已经说得很清楚了。
Duìyú zhège wèntí de kànfǎ，wǒ yǐjing shuō de hěn qīngchu le。
I have made myself quite clear on that issue.
她不愧是搞财务的，家庭分类账记得清楚详细。

他总是当时不考虑清楚，过去几天了才找后帐。

这个机徽很醒目，即使在天上也可以看得清楚。

原谅我口拙，这么简单的事我都没说清楚。

跟他讲不清楚，他已经老糊涂了。

他们之间究竟盘结着多少恩怨，我也不清楚。

请你尽量说清楚自己所处的区位，我们好去救援。

她说话时嗓门儿太小，后面的同学都听不清楚。
Tā shuōhuà shí sǎngménr tài xiǎo，hòumian de tóngxué dōu tīng bùqīngchu。

他已经喝醉了，神智不太清楚。
Tā yǐjing hēzuì le，shénzhì bú tài qīngchu。

他俩的私怨很深，为什么这样我们都不清楚。
Tā liǎ de sīyuàn hěnshēn，wèishénme zhèyàng wǒmen dōu bùqīngchu。

你刚来这个单位，要先搞清楚这些条条块块。

我不清楚这个地区的土名是什么！

显示屏上清楚地写着会议的时间、地点和参加人员。

军事纵横谈让我对国际形势有了更清楚的认识。
Jūnshì zònghéngtán ràng wǒ duì guójì xíngshì yǒu le gèng qīngchu de rènshi。

是因为用了放大器，所以电视信号更清楚了。

想写好汉字就要先清楚正字法。

Tā shuōhuà céngcìqīngchu。
He speaks very clearly.

Tāmen zhōngyú duìmiàn\'ér bǎ shìqing shuōqīngchu le。

Nǐ yào bǎ yǒuguānzhèngcè jiāodài qīngchu.

Xiěwénzhāng màiluò yào qīngchu.

Yìjiàn yīngdāng shuō chūlái，dàjiā cáinéng qīngchu de liǎojiě。
意见应当说出来，大家才能清楚地了解。
Let us be quite clear about terminology first.
Shǒuxiān，ràng wǒmen bǎ shùyǔ gǎo qīngchǔ。

I have to shout to make myself understood.

《Chǔcí》 
The Songs of Chu
当面弄清楚
dāngmiàn nòng qīngchu 
straighten things out face to face
这一事件使我们更清楚地懂得了问题的复杂性。
Zhè yí shìjiàn shǐ wǒmen gèng qīngchu de dǒngdé le wèntí de fùzáxìng。
This incident brought home to us the complex nature of the problem.

这篇文章段落清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng duànluò qīngchu。
This article is well paragraphed.
这事略有耳闻，详细情况不很清楚。
Zhè shì lüèyǒuěrwén，xiángxì qíngkuàng bùhěn qīngchu。
I\'ve heard a little about it, but I don\'t know the details.
他发音不清楚。
Tā fāyīn bùqīngchu。
His articulation is poor.
怪我没讲清楚。
Guài wǒ méi jiǎngqīngchu。
I\'m to blame for not having made it clearer.
伤员痛楚地吼叫。
Shāngyuán tòngchǔ de hǒujiào。
The wounded soldier shouted in pain.
把道理讲清楚
bǎ dàolǐ jiǎngqīngchu 
state the reasons clearly
咱们得把情况摸清楚，要不回去就得交白卷。
Zánmen děi bǎ qíngkuàngmō qīngchu，yàobùhuíqù jiù děi jiāo báijuàn。
We must find out exactly how things stand here, or we\'ll have nothing to report.
我不清楚这件事的背景，只能就事论事地谈谈。
Wǒ bùqīngchu zhèjiànshì de bèijǐng，zhǐnéngjiùshìlùnshì de tántan。
I don\'t know the whole background, so I can only judge the case as it stands.
我希望大家开诚布公，把问题摆到桌面上谈清楚。
Wǒ xīwàngdàjiā kāichéngbùgōng，bǎ wèntí bǎidào zhuōmiàn shàngtán qīngchu。

她唱得不错，只是口白不够清楚。
Tā chàng de búcuò，zhǐshì kǒubái bú gòu qīngchu。
She sings well but does not speak clearly enough.
口齿清楚
kǒuchǐ qīnɡchu
have clear enunciation
这篇文章眉目清楚。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngméimù qīngchu。
The article is clear and well-organized.
你把相片拿到明处来，让大家看个清楚。

Yǒuxiē wèntí hái xūyào nòngqīngchu。

yīguān qíchǔ

zìjì qīngchu

这事不是三言两语能说清楚的。

吐字清楚
tǔzì qīngchu 
enunciate clearly

该形式被清楚地写了下来，因此很容易理解。

I have to shout to make myself understood.

bú dà qīngchu 
not too clear

He never thinks things through when they happen, but blames others later.

你从头到尾把事情说清楚，不要着急。

你要把问题想清楚不能一叶障目。
Nǐ yào bǎ wèntí xiǎng qīngchu bùnéng yíyè zhàngmù。
You can\'t have your views overshadowed by trivial things if you want to make the problems clear.
咱们得把情况摸清楚，要不回去就得交白卷。

这篇文章文理显豁，主题清楚，是篇不可多得的佳作。

This article is clear in its theme, and logical in its structure.
这事不是三言两语能说清楚的。
Zhè shì búshì sānyánliǎngyǔ néng shuō qīngchu de。
The matter can\'t be explained in a few words.
不由我们把事情说清楚，他就匆匆忙忙的跑开了。

He rushed away without allowing us to explain.

Zhège wèntí búshì yíjùbànjù néng jiǎng qīngchu de。
This can\'t be explained in a few sentences.
这些条件白纸黑字，一清二楚，想抵赖是抵赖不掉的。

These terms are clearly written in black and white. You can never deny them.
一定要记清楚奇零，这个数目可千万不要错。

她不愧是搞财务的，家庭分类账记得清楚详细。

She is a real accountant who even keeps a detailed  household ledger.
他不想再欺骗别人，于是把整个事情搬到桌面儿上说清楚了。

to brush {or} sweep objections aside
对反对意见置之不理｛或｝不顾反对意见
we asked for her autograph only to be ignored
我们要她的签名却被置之不理
It\'s a problem which they usually put aside.
这是他们通常置之不理的问题。
I try to be indifferent to the slurs of my enemies.
Wǒ jìnlì duì dírén de fěibàng zhìzhībùlǐ。
我尽力对敌人的诽谤置之不理。
I turned my back and broke my promises.
Wǒ zhìzhībùlǐ，wéibèile nuòyán。
我置之不理，违背了诺言。
God does not close his eyes to wrong.
Shàngdì búhuì duì cuòwù zhìzhībùlǐ。
上帝不会对错误置之不理。
No competitor will let the Jammer pass without a fight.
Méiyǒu cānsàizhě huì duì gānrǎo zhìzhībùlǐ，ér qīngyán fàngqì de。
没有参赛者会对干扰置之不理，而轻言放弃的。
He waved aside her protest and continued on.
Tā duì tā de kàngyì zhìzhībùlǐ，jìxù zǒu。
他对她的抗议置之不理，继续走。
此药宜置于阴凉处。
Cǐ yào yí zhìyú yīnliángchù。
The medicine should be kept in a cool, dark place.
安置于案头
ānzhì yú àntóu 
be placed on one\'s desk

zhìshēn yú qúnzhòngzhī zhōng

Printers once kept the type for capitals and for small letters in separate cases; capitals were kept in the upper half of the type case and so became known as upper-case letters.
Páibǎn gōngrén yídù jiāng dàxiě zìmǔ hé xiǎoxiě zìmǔ huózì zhìyú bùtóng de gépán（case）zhōng；dàxiě zìmó fàngzài gé pán shàng de shàng bànfāng，gù éryòu chēngwéi“upper-case letter”。
排版工人一度将大写字母和小写字母活字置于不同的格盘（case）中；大写字模放在格盘上的上半方，故而又称为“upper-case letter”。

裁判判进球无效，因为有个球员处在越位位置。

zhágǔn tiǎozhěngzhuāngzhì

zhàomínɡ zhuānɡzhì 
lighting installation

ānzhì yú àntóu

置酒款待
zhì jiǔ kuǎndài

zhì yìshēn yīfu

zhì yìxiē jiājù

zhìbàn jiājù 
buy furniture

zhìbàn túshū yíqì 
procure books and instruments
不予置评
bùyǔ zhìpíng
give no comment

Wǒ duō cì quàngào，tā dōu zhìruòwǎngwén。

zhìshēn yú qúnzhòngzhī zhōng

zhìshēn yìyù

不可置信
bùkě zhìxìn 
not to be believed; unbelievable

Duìyú zhèzhǒng tiǎoxìn，wǒmen bùnéng zhìzhībùlǐ。

bǎ shēngsǐ zhìzhīdùwài

zhuǎn xiàng zhuāngzhì 
steering gear

按照位置，可以将定语分为前置定语和后置定语。

Printers once kept the type for capitals and for small letters in separate cases; capitals were kept in the upper half of the type case and so became known as upper-case letters.
Páibǎn gōngrén yídù jiāng dàxiě zìmǔ hé xiǎoxiě zìmǔ huózì zhìyú bùtóng de gépán（case）zhōng；dàxiě zìmó fàngzài gé pán shàng de shàng bànfāng，gù éryòu chēngwéi“upper-case letter”。
排版工人一度将大写字母和小写字母活字置于不同的格盘（case）中；大写字模放在格盘上的上半方，故而又称为“upper-case letter”。

nányǐzhìxìn
hard to believe

nányǐzhìxìn
hard to believe

按规则，方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词。
There are prepositive and postpositive attributes in terms of position.
按照位置，可以将定语分为前置定语和后置定语。
Japanese postposes the adpositions, whereas English preposes them.

日语后置介词，而英语前置介词。

Printers once kept the type for capitals and for small letters in separate cases; capitals were kept in the upper half of the type case and so became known as upper-case letters.
Páibǎn gōngrén yídù jiāng dàxiě zìmǔ hé xiǎoxiě zìmǔ huózì zhìyú bùtóng de gépán（case）zhōng；dàxiě zìmó fàngzài gé pán shàng de shàng bànfāng，gù éryòu chēngwéi“upper-case letter”。
排版工人一度将大写字母和小写字母活字置于不同的格盘（case）中；大写字模放在格盘上的上半方，故而又称为“upper-case letter”。

毕业生的数量很惊人，百分之九十的学生考试都及格了。
In recent years, undergraduate students prefer going overseas for their master degrees.
近几年，本科毕业生喜欢去国外完成硕士学位。
University is not the only choice of high school graduates, thus they can find a job or go to vocational school.
上大学不是高中毕业生的唯一选择，比如他们可以去工作，可以到职业学校学习。
Because of the economic crisis, many talented but underemployed college graduates are working as delivery people or laborers.
由于经济危机，很多富有才华的大学毕业生学非所用，从事送货或者其他体力工作。
Employment conditions for newly graduated students are generally bleak.
应届毕业生总体就业形势黯淡。
Can you imagine a college graduate being that naive and innocent?
你能想象一个大学毕业生会那样天真幼稚么？
Whatever happened to the class of 2000?
Yǒu shénme guānyú liǎngqiān jiè bìyèshēng de xīnwén ma？
有什么关于2000届毕业生的新闻吗？
The candidates are chosen from hundreds of university graduates.
Zhèxiē hòuxuǎnrén shì cóng shàngbǎi gè dàxué de bìyèshēng zhōng xuǎn chūlái de。
这些候选人是从上百个大学的毕业生中选出来的。
Our graduates are mainly employed in electrical engineering.
Wǒmen de bìyèshēng zhǔyào cóngshì diànjīgōngchéng fāngmiàn de gōngzuò。
我们的毕业生主要从事电机工程方面的工作。
Recent graduates were recruited into the armed forces.
Yīngjiè bìyèshēng bèi zhāomù jìn jūnduì lǐ。
应届毕业生被招募进军队里。
Many schools have structured training programmes for graduates.
Hěn duō xuéxiào yǐ wèi bìyèshēngmen zhìdìngle péixùn fāng\'àn。
很多学校已为毕业生们制定了培训方案。
The graduates gave vent to cheers.
Zhèxiē bìyèshēng gāoshēng huānhū。
这些毕业生高声欢呼。
The alumni followed a program of annual giving.
Bìyèshēngmen zūnxúnle niándù juānzèng de jìhuà。
毕业生们遵循了年度捐赠的计划。
Most of our graduates are employed.
Wǒmen de dàduōshù bìyèshēng dōu zhǎodàole gōngzuò。
我们的大多数毕业生都找到了工作。
At the individual level, no one can blame these graduates.
cóng gèrén céngmiàn jiǎng，shuí dōu wúquán zhǐzé zhèxiē bìyèshēng。
从个人层面讲，谁都无权指责这些毕业生。
Working in such a famous consulting firm is a challenge for graduates.
对刚毕业的学生来说，在这样著名的咨询公司工作是个挑战。
Most recent graduates are surely desperate for a job.
Dàduōshù gāng bìyè de xuéshengmen dōu fēicháng jíyú zhǎodào gōngzuò。
大多数刚毕业的学生们都非常急于找到工作。
This school graduates 2,000 students each year.
Zhè suǒ Xuéxiào měinián bìyè liǎngqiān míng xuésheng。
这所学校每年毕业2,000名学生。
In a few weeks, a fresh crop of medical students will arrive at the hospital.
Jǐ gè xīngqī yǐhòu，yìqún gāng bìyè de yīxué xuésheng jiāng láidào zhè suǒ yīyuàn。
几个星期以后，一群刚毕业的医学学生将来到这所医院。
The students liberated their slaves upon graduating from the university.
Zhèxiē xuésheng dàxué bìyè huíjiā hòu jiù shìfàngle tāmen jiā de núlì。
这些学生大学毕业回家后就释放了他们家的奴隶。
The commencement ceremony affirms each student\'s search for knowledge.
Zhège bìyè diǎnlǐ shì duì měi gè xuésheng duì zhīshi de zhuīqiú de kěndìng。
这个毕业典礼是对每个学生对知识的追求的肯定。
All students will be awarded a distinction upon graduation.
Suǒyǒu de xuésheng dōu jiāng bèi shòuyǔ bìyèzhèngshū。
所有的学生都将被授予毕业证书。
The university conferred a degree on its most famous former student，who never graduated.
Zhè suǒ Dàxué xiàng tā zuì zhùmíng de yíwèi guòqù de xuésheng shòuyǔ xuéwèi，suīrán zhè wèi xuésheng cónglái yě méiyǒu bìyè。
这所大学向它最著名的一位过去的学生授予学位，虽然这位学生从来也没有毕业。
After graduation，she stayed on in Cambridge as a student adviser.
Bìyè zhīhòu，tā liúzài Jiànqiáodàxué zuò xuésheng fǔdǎoyuán。
毕业之后，她留在剑桥大学做学生辅导员。
After graduation, my perspective on everything had been changing very fast.
毕业以后，我对事物的看法很快发生了转变。
He is stable communist who devoted all his life to our socilist career.
他是个坚定的共产主义者，把毕生精力都献给了社会主义事业。
The commencement speaker presented a forceful speech that impressed the students.
Bìyèdiǎnlǐ yǎnjiǎngrén fābiǎole yì piān hěn yǒu gǎnrǎnlì de jiǎnghuà，gěi xuéshengmen liúxiàle shēnkè yìnxiàng。
毕业典礼演讲人发表了一篇很有感染力的讲话，给学生们留下了深刻印象。
Frolicsome students celebrated their graduation with parties and practical jokes.
Ài nào de xuéshengmen tōngguò jùhuì hé gè zhǒng èzuòjù lái qìngzhù tāmen de bìyè。
爱闹的学生们通过聚会和各种恶作剧来庆祝他们的毕业。
本届毕业生
běnjiè bìyèshēng 
this year\'s graduates
还有一年，他就大学毕业了。
Háiyǒu yì nián，tā jiù dàxué bìyè le。
He\'ll graduate from college next year.
毕业时同学们互相题词共勉。
Bìyè shí tóngxuémen hùxiāng tící gòngmiǎn。
At graduation the students presented each other with valedictory inscriptions.
热烈欢送毕业生到祖国需要的地方去
rèliè huānsòngbìyèshēngdào zǔguó xūyào de dìfangqù
give a warm send-off to graduates going to where the country needs them
毕业鉴定
bìyè jiàndìnɡ 
graduation appraisal
历届毕业生
lìjiè bìyèshēnɡ 
graduates of all previous years
临毕业时，同学们对学校都十分留恋。
Lín bìyè shí，tóngxuémen duì xuéxiào dōu shífēn liúliàn。
As their graduation day drew near, the students felt reluctant to leave their school.
毕业前夕，学生们紧张地准备考试。
Bìyè qiánxī，xuéshengmen jǐnzhāng de zhǔnbèi kǎoshì。
As graduation day drew near, the students were all anxiously preparing for their final exams.
上届毕业生
shàngjiè bìyèshēng
last year\'s graduates
我和他同期毕业。
Wǒ hé tā tóngqī bìyè。
I graduated the same time as he.
老师们怀着惜别的心情，送走了毕业同学。
Lǎoshīmen huái zhe xībié de xīnqíng，sòngzǒu le bìyè tóngxué。
The teachers reluctantly parted with the graduates.
下届毕业生
xià jiè bìyèshēnɡ
students graduating next year
毕业在即
bìyè zàijí
will soon be graduating
从入学到毕业
cóng rùxué dào bìyè
from entrance to graduation
首届毕业生
shǒujiè bìyèshēng
the first class of graduates
她已经大学毕业，就要步入社会。
Tā yǐjing dàxué bìyè，jiùyào bùrù shèhuì。
She has just graduated from college, and is going to step into the society soon.
大学毕业找不到工作，他愁肠郁结。
Dàxué bìyè zhǎobúdào gōngzuò，tā chóucháng yùjié。
He couldn\'t find a job after graduation, which made him very depressed.
我们学校有两名大学毕业生做了村官。
Wǒmen xuéxiào yǒu liǎng míng dàxué bìyèshēng zuò le cūnguān。
Two graduates from our university became village officials.
不少大学毕业生都投身到了大西北的建设中。
Bùshǎo dàxuébìyèshēng dōu tóushēn dào le dàxīběi de jiànshè zhōng。
Many graduates have devoted themselves to the construction of the northwestern region of China.
他是定向生，毕业后要回到原籍工作。
Tā shì dìng xiàng shēng，bìyè hòu yào huí dào yuánjí gōngzuò。
He is a student taking leave from work for special training, so he will go back to his post after graduation.
现在的一些大学毕业生找工作时高不成，低不就。
Xiànzài de yìxiē dàxué bìyèshēng zhǎo gōngzuò shí gāobùchéng，dībújiù。
Nowadays, some college graduates are unfit for higher posts but unwilling to take lower ones.
这位高材生是北大毕业的。
Zhèwèi gāocáishēng shì Běidà bìyè de。
The brilliant student graduated from Beijing University.
老人的学历是高小毕业。
Lǎorén de xuélì shì gāoxiǎo bìyè。
The old man has a higher primary school academic qualification.
毕业的时候，我送老师一把电动刮胡刀。
Bìyè de shíhou，wǒ sòng lǎoshī yìbǎ diàndòng guāhúdāo。
When graduating, I gave my teacher an electric razor as a present.
三年级一班的级任是个刚毕业的女老师。
Sānniánjí yībān de jírèn shì gè gāng bìyè de nǚlǎoshī。
The teacher in charge of Class One, Grade Three is a girl who has just graduated.
毕业论文中都会有引文和加注。
Bìyèlùnwén zhōng dōu huì yǒu yǐnwén hé jiāzhù。
There are many citations and notes in graduation theses.
这些天，她一直在为写毕业论文开题报告的事而忙碌着。
Zhèxiē tiān，tā yìzhí zài wèi xiě bìyè lùnwén kāití bàogào de shì ér mánglù zhe。
These days, she is busy writing the opening report for her graduation paper.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
毕业时，老师给小明的考语中有这么一句话：“该生聪明但不好学”。
Bìyè shí，lǎoshī gěi Xiǎo Míng de kǎoyǔ zhōng yǒu zhème yíjùhuà：“Gāishēng cōngmíng dàn búhàoxué”。
When graduating, there was a sentence in the comments that the teacher gave Xiaoming: &quot;this student is smart but not willing to study.&quot;
毕业晚会上同学们的笑脸，至今还刻印在他的记忆里。
Bìyè wǎnhuì shàng tóngxuémen de xiàoliǎn，zhìjīn hái kèyìn zài tā de jìyì lǐ。
The smiles of his classmates at the graduation party are engraved in his mind.
毕业后的第三个年头儿，我们搞了一次同学聚会。
Bìyè hòu de dìsāngè niántóur，wǒmen gǎo le yícì tóngxué jùhuì。
Three years after we graduated, we organized a reunion.
到明年的年中，我们就该毕业了。
Dào míngnián de nián zhōng，wǒmen jiù gāi bìyè le。
We shall graduate in the middle of next year.
他从神学院毕业后就一直担任神职工作。
Tā cóng shénxuéyuàn bìyè hòu jiù yìzhí dānrèn shénzhí gōngzuò。
He has been doing clerical work since his graduation from theological college.
他毕业论文的题目是《试论新闻工作的艺术性》。
Tā bìyè lùnwén de tímù shì《Shìlùn xīnwén gōngzuò de yìshùxìng》。
The title of his thesis is &quot;Some Opinions on the Artistic Quality of Journalism&quot;.
班长通知我们，今天他要填发毕业证书，要求每个人都必须到场。
Bānzhǎng tōngzhī wǒmen，jīntiān tā yào tiánfā bìyèzhèngshū，yāoqiú měigèrén dōu bìxū dàochǎng。
The monitor has informed us that everyone must be present to fill in the diplomas which will issued to us.
暑假后我们就大四了，毕业为期不远了！
Shǔjià hòu wǒmen jiù dàsì le，bìyè wéiqī bùyuǎn le！
We\'ll become seniors after the summer vacation. Graduation is not far away!
毕业后能找到一份好工作是我目前唯一的心愿。
Bìyè hòu néng zhǎodào yífèn hǎogōngzuò shì wǒ mùqián wéiyí de xīnyuàn。
My only wish at present is to find a good job after graduation.
小王刚从学校毕业就进入一家跨国公司担任文秘。
Xiǎo Wáng gāng cóng xuéxiào bìyè jiù jìnrù yìjiā kuàguó gōngsī dānrèn wénmì。
Xiao Wang worked for a international company as a secretary after graduating from college.
对于刚考入大学的人来说，毕业总是遥遥无期的。
Duìyú gāng kǎorù dàxué de rén láishuō，bìyè zǒngshì yáoyáo wúqī de。
Graduation seems so far away for those who have just been admitted to university.
毕业后，他就一直从事务工行业。
Bìyè hòu，tā jiù yìzhí cóngshì wùgōng hángyè。
He began to be engaged in construction work since graduating from college.
本周五之前你务须将毕业论文交给老师。
Běnzhōuwǔ zhīqián nǐ wùxū jiāng bìyèlùnwén jiāogěi lǎoshī。
You must hand in your thesis before this Friday.
小王是2001年从戏校影视表演专业毕业的。
Xiǎo Wáng shì èrlínglíngyī nián cóng xìxiào yǐngshì biǎoyǎn zhuānyè bìyè de。
Xiao Wang graduated form the drama school in 2001 majoring in stage performance.
同学们毕业十年了，今天才得以相聚。
Tóngxuémen bìyè shínián le，jīntiān cái déyǐ xiāngjù。
The class have been able to reunite 10 years after graduation.
职校毕业生成为今年企业争抢的香饽饽。
Zhíxiào bìyèshēng chéngwéi jīnnián qǐyè zhēngqiǎng de xiāngbobo。
The graduates of technical schools are welcomed in today\'s job market.
作为学校的毕业生，我们理应了解校史。
Zuòwéi xuéxiào de bìyèshēng，wǒmen lǐyīng liǎojiě xiàoshǐ。
As graduates of the school, we should know better about its history.
警校毕业后他就当了一名刑事警察。
Jǐngxiào bìyè hòu tā jiù dāng le yìmíng xíngshì jǐngchá。
He became a criminal policeman after graduating from the Police Academy.
小张大学毕业后放弃高薪工作回家修地球。
Xiǎo Zhāng dàxué bìyè hòu fàngqì gāoxīn gōngzuò huíjiā xiūdìqiú。
Xiao Zhang gave up a well-paid job and went back home to till the earth after graduating from university.
虽然我在大学修读的是法律专业，可毕业后却当了一名会计。
Suīrán wǒ zài dàxué xiūdú de shì fǎlǜ zhuānyè，kě bìyè hòu què dāng le yìmíng kuàijì。
Though I majored in law at university, I became an accountant after graduation.
一转眼我们都毕业三年了，变化真大啊。
Yì zhuǎnyǎn wǒmen dōu bìyè sān nián le，biànhuà zhēn dà a。
In a flash, our graduation was three years ago, the changes are so big.
大学毕业了，同学们依依惜别，不知何时再相聚。
Dàxué bìyè le，tóngxuémen yīyī xībié，bùzhī héshí zài xiāngjù。
When we graduated from the university, we said goodbye reluctantly to each other without knowing when we would get together again.
他从厨师学校毕业后进入一家三星级酒店作了掌灶。
Tā cóng chúshī xuéxiào bìyè hòujìn rù yìjiā sānxīngjí jiǔdiàn zuò le zhǎngzào。
After graduating from a cooking school, he became the chef at a three-star hotel.
毕业于职校的他技术娴熟。
Bìyèyú zhíxiào de tā jìshù xiánshú。
He who graduated from a vocational school has a good command of skills.
别看他仅仅毕业于中技，工作能力却很强。
Biékàn tā jǐnjǐn bìyè yú zhōngjì，gōngzuò nénglì què hěn qiáng。
Though he is just a graduate from secondary technical school, he has strong working ability.
专科生不仅要面对三年的学费问题，还要面对毕业后就业难的问题。
Zhuānkēshēng bùjǐn yào miànduì sānnián de xuéfèiwèntí，háiyào miànduì bìyèhòu jiùyènán de wèntí。
College students not only have to face three years\' tuition, but also have to deal with the difficulties of finding a job after graduation.
他毕业后在一家报社工作，专门转译国外新闻。
Tā bìyè hòu zài yìjiā bàoshè gōngzuò，zhuānmén zhuǎnyì guówài xīnwén。
After graduation, he worked for a newspaper office and specialized in translating foreign news.
他从学校毕业后，组织关系便迁到了现在的单位。
Tā cóng xuéxiào bìyè hòu，zǔzhī guānxì biàn qiāndào le xiànzài de dānwèi。
After graduating from school, his membership credential was transferred to his present unit.
他从石油学院一毕业，就被分到了钻井队。
Tā cóng shíyóu xuéyuàn yí bìyè，jiù bèi fēndào le zuànjǐngduì。
After graduating from The Petroleum College, he was assigned to the drilling team.
他毕业后选择了坐机关，荒废了自己在学校学的技术。
Tā bìyè hòu xuǎnzé le zuò jīguān，huāngfèi le zìjǐ zài xuéxiào xué de jìshù。
After the graduation, he chose to work in an office, and wasted the skills he had learned in school.
我一直保留着高中毕业时的纪念册。
Wǒ yìzhí bǎoliú zhe gāo zhōng bìyè shí de jìniàncè。
I have always kept the yearbook bought at my high school graduation.
他想毕业后去当志愿兵。
Tā xiǎng bìyè hòu qù dāng zhìyuànbīng。
He wants to be volunteer soldier after graduation.
现在许多大学毕业生成了自由职业者。
Xiànzài xǔduō dàxué bìyèshēng chéng le zìyóu zhíyè zhě。
Nowadays, many college graduates choose to be freelancers.
他大学毕业后，自愿到穷困的山乡支教，做了一个民办教师。
Tā dàxué bìyè hòu，zìyuàn dào qióngkùn de shānxiāng zhījiào，zuòle yígè mínbàn jiàoshī。
After graduation, he volunteered to be a community-supported teacher in the poor countryside.
他本科毕业。
Tā běnkēbìyè。
He graduated with a bachelor\'s degree.
她毕业于牛津大学法律系。
Tā bìyèyú Niújīndàxué fǎlǜxì。
She graduated in law from Oxford University.
我正为毕业论文搜集材料。
Wǒ zhèngwèi bìyèlùnwén sōujícáiliào。
I\'m in the process of gathering material for my dissertation.
为了写毕业论文，我参考了几十本书。
Wèile xiě bìyèlùnwén，wǒ cānkǎole jǐshíběnshū。
For my dissertation I had to consult dozens of different books.
大学毕业
dàxuébìyè
graduate from university (英) {或} college (美)
毕业典礼
bìyèdiǎnlǐ
graduation ceremony
他电脑专业毕业。
Tā diànnǎozhuānyè bìyè。
He graduated in computing.
毕业前，同学们互相交换礼物。
Bìyè qián，tóngxuémen hùxiāng jiāohuàn lǐwù.
Before graduation, students exchange presents with each other.
82届毕业生
bā\'èrjiè bìyèshēng
the class of ‘82
今年夏天他大学就要毕业了。
Jīnnián xiàtiān tā dàxué jiùyào bìyèle.
He graduates from university this summer.
学生快毕业了。
Xuésheng kuài bìyèle.
The students will graduate soon.
老师为毕业生举行了送别晚会。
Lǎoshī wèi bìyèshēng jǔxíngle sòngbié wǎnhuì。
The teachers held a farewell banquet for the graduating students.
眼下正是大学生毕业找工作的时候。
Yǎnxià zhèngshì dàxuéshēng bìyè zhǎo gōngzuò de shíhou。
Now is the time when university graduates start looking for work.
毕业
Bìyè
graduate
毕业生到处寻找工作机会，但粥少僧多。
Bìyèshēng dàochù xúnzhǎo gōngzuò jīhuì，dàn zhōushǎo sēngduō。
Recent graduates are looking everywhere for work, but there aren\'t enough jobs to go round.
等她毕了业就顶用了。
Děng tā bì le yè jiù dǐngyòng le。
She\'ll be a help when she finishes school.
毕生事业
bìshēng shìyè 
lifework; work of a lifetime
他毕生从事影业。
Tā bìshēnɡ cónɡshì yǐnɡyè。 
He worked in the cinema all his life.
凡考试不及格者均不能毕业
毕业后分到工厂工作

bìshēng shìyè

If you compare with the past, actually our standard of living has improved.

Bìyè shí，lǎoshī gěi Xiǎo Míng de kǎoyǔ zhōng yǒu zhème yíjùhuà：“Gāishēng cōngmíng dàn búhàoxué”。
When graduating, there was a sentence in the comments that the teacher gave Xiaoming: &quot;this student is smart but not willing to study.&quot;

Zhuānkēshēng bùjǐn yào miànduì sānnián de xuéfèiwèntí，háiyào miànduì bìyèhòu jiùyènán de wèntí。
College students not only have to face three years\' tuition, but also have to deal with the difficulties of finding a job after graduation.

Bìyè wǎnhuì shàng tóngxuémen de xiàoliǎn，zhìjīn hái kèyìn zài tā de jìyì lǐ。
The smiles of his classmates at the graduation party are engraved in his mind.
虽然不是有意的，但是毕竟是做了错事，他站在那愧怍难安。
Suīrán búshì yǒuyì de，dànshì bìjìng shì zuò le cuòshì，tā zhànzài nà kuìzuò nánān。
He sits ashamed over an unintentional mistake.
这次的法规厘定已毕，请大家等待颁布。
Zhècì de fǎguī lídìng yǐbì，qǐng dàjiā děngdài bānbù。
This time the rules had already been trimmed, and prescribed. Please wait for it to be announced.
婚礼礼毕，请大家入席。
Hūnlǐ lǐbì，qǐng dàjiā rùxí。
The wedding ceremony is over.  Please take a seat.
毕业后的第三个年头儿，我们搞了一次同学聚会。
Bìyè hòu de dìsāngè niántóur，wǒmen gǎo le yícì tóngxué jùhuì。
Three years after we graduated, we organized a reunion.
到明年的年中，我们就该毕业了。
Dào míngnián de nián zhōng，wǒmen jiù gāi bìyè le。
We shall graduate in the middle of next year.
重新拼缀修补过的感情，毕竟还是有裂痕的。
Chóngxīn pīnzhuì xiūbǔ guò de gǎnqíng，bìjìng háishi yǒu lièhén de。
Their pieced and patched emotions still have problems after all.
大军已经整装完毕，时刻准备共赴戎机！
Dàjūn yǐjing zhěngzhuāng wánbì，shíkè zhǔnbèi gòngfù róngjī！
The soldiers are fully equipped, they are ready to join the battle at any time.
他从神学院毕业后就一直担任神职工作。
Tā cóng shénxuéyuàn bìyè hòu jiù yìzhí dānrèn shénzhí gōngzuò。
He has been doing clerical work since his graduation from theological college.
他毕业论文的题目是《试论新闻工作的艺术性》。
Tā bìyè lùnwén de tímù shì《Shìlùn xīnwén gōngzuò de yìshùxìng》。
The title of his thesis is &quot;Some Opinions on the Artistic Quality of Journalism&quot;.
这座碑林里的大部分石碑都已经拓印完毕。
Zhèzuò bēilín lǐ de dàbùfen shíbēi dōu yǐjing tuòyìn wánbì。
Rubbings have been made from the majority of stone tablets here.
班长通知我们，今天他要填发毕业证书，要求每个人都必须到场。
Bānzhǎng tōngzhī wǒmen，jīntiān tā yào tiánfā bìyèzhèngshū，yāoqiú měigèrén dōu bìxū dàochǎng。
The monitor has informed us that everyone must be present to fill in the diplomas which will issued to us.
暑假后我们就大四了，毕业为期不远了！
Shǔjià hòu wǒmen jiù dàsì le，bìyè wéiqī bùyuǎn le！
We\'ll become seniors after the summer vacation. Graduation is not far away!
毕业后能找到一份好工作是我目前唯一的心愿。
Bìyè hòu néng zhǎodào yífèn hǎogōngzuò shì wǒ mùqián wéiyí de xīnyuàn。
My only wish at present is to find a good job after graduation.
小王刚从学校毕业就进入一家跨国公司担任文秘。
Xiǎo Wáng gāng cóng xuéxiào bìyè jiù jìnrù yìjiā kuàguó gōngsī dānrèn wénmì。
Xiao Wang worked for a international company as a secretary after graduating from college.
对于刚考入大学的人来说，毕业总是遥遥无期的。
Duìyú gāng kǎorù dàxué de rén láishuō，bìyè zǒngshì yáoyáo wúqī de。
Graduation seems so far away for those who have just been admitted to university.
毕业后，他就一直从事务工行业。
Bìyè hòu，tā jiù yìzhí cóngshì wùgōng hángyè。
He began to be engaged in construction work since graduating from college.
本周五之前你务须将毕业论文交给老师。
Běnzhōuwǔ zhīqián nǐ wùxū jiāng bìyèlùnwén jiāogěi lǎoshī。
You must hand in your thesis before this Friday.
小王是2001年从戏校影视表演专业毕业的。
Xiǎo Wáng shì èrlínglíngyī nián cóng xìxiào yǐngshì biǎoyǎn zhuānyè bìyè de。
Xiao Wang graduated form the drama school in 2001 majoring in stage performance.
同学们毕业十年了，今天才得以相聚。
Tóngxuémen bìyè shínián le，jīntiān cái déyǐ xiāngjù。
The class have been able to reunite 10 years after graduation.
职校毕业生成为今年企业争抢的香饽饽。
Zhíxiào bìyèshēng chéngwéi jīnnián qǐyè zhēngqiǎng de xiāngbobo。
The graduates of technical schools are welcomed in today\'s job market.
作为学校的毕业生，我们理应了解校史。
Zuòwéi xuéxiào de bìyèshēng，wǒmen lǐyīng liǎojiě xiàoshǐ。
As graduates of the school, we should know better about its history.
警校毕业后他就当了一名刑事警察。
Jǐngxiào bìyè hòu tā jiù dāng le yìmíng xíngshì jǐngchá。
He became a criminal policeman after graduating from the Police Academy.
小张大学毕业后放弃高薪工作回家修地球。
Xiǎo Zhāng dàxué bìyè hòu fàngqì gāoxīn gōngzuò huíjiā xiūdìqiú。
Xiao Zhang gave up a well-paid job and went back home to till the earth after graduating from university.
虽然我在大学修读的是法律专业，可毕业后却当了一名会计。
Suīrán wǒ zài dàxué xiūdú de shì fǎlǜ zhuānyè，kě bìyè hòu què dāng le yìmíng kuàijì。
Though I majored in law at university, I became an accountant after graduation.
一转眼我们都毕业三年了，变化真大啊。
Yì zhuǎnyǎn wǒmen dōu bìyè sān nián le，biànhuà zhēn dà a。
In a flash, our graduation was three years ago, the changes are so big.
大学毕业了，同学们依依惜别，不知何时再相聚。
Dàxué bìyè le，tóngxuémen yīyī xībié，bùzhī héshí zài xiāngjù。
When we graduated from the university, we said goodbye reluctantly to each other without knowing when we would get together again.
预埋件已经全部安装完毕，可以浇筑混凝土了。
Yùmáijiàn yǐjing quánbùānzhuāng wánbì，kěyǐ jiāozhù hùnníngtǔ le。
All the components that need to be buried in advance have been installed so we can start pouring concrete.
他毕生都致力于对藏学的研究。
Tā bìshēng dōu zhìlìyú duì zàngxué de yánjiū。
He has devoted his entire life to research on Zang Studies.
他从厨师学校毕业后进入一家三星级酒店作了掌灶。
Tā cóng chúshī xuéxiào bìyè hòujìn rù yìjiā sānxīngjí jiǔdiàn zuò le zhǎngzào。
After graduating from a cooking school, he became the chef at a three-star hotel.
毕业于职校的他技术娴熟。
Bìyèyú zhíxiào de tā jìshù xiánshú。
He who graduated from a vocational school has a good command of skills.
别看他仅仅毕业于中技，工作能力却很强。
Biékàn tā jǐnjǐn bìyè yú zhōngjì，gōngzuò nénglì què hěn qiáng。
Though he is just a graduate from secondary technical school, he has strong working ability.
专科生不仅要面对三年的学费问题，还要面对毕业后就业难的问题。
Zhuānkēshēng bùjǐn yào miànduì sānnián de xuéfèiwèntí，háiyào miànduì bìyèhòu jiùyènán de wèntí。
College students not only have to face three years\' tuition, but also have to deal with the difficulties of finding a job after graduation.
他毕业后在一家报社工作，专门转译国外新闻。
Tā bìyè hòu zài yìjiā bàoshè gōngzuò，zhuānmén zhuǎnyì guówài xīnwén。
After graduation, he worked for a newspaper office and specialized in translating foreign news.
他从学校毕业后，组织关系便迁到了现在的单位。
Tā cóng xuéxiào bìyè hòu，zǔzhī guānxì biàn qiāndào le xiànzài de dānwèi。
After graduating from school, his membership credential was transferred to his present unit.
他从石油学院一毕业，就被分到了钻井队。
Tā cóng shíyóu xuéyuàn yí bìyè，jiù bèi fēndào le zuànjǐngduì。
After graduating from The Petroleum College, he was assigned to the drilling team.
他毕业后选择了坐机关，荒废了自己在学校学的技术。
Tā bìyè hòu xuǎnzé le zuò jīguān，huāngfèi le zìjǐ zài xuéxiào xué de jìshù。
After the graduation, he chose to work in an office, and wasted the skills he had learned in school.
我一直保留着高中毕业时的纪念册。
Wǒ yìzhí bǎoliú zhe gāo zhōng bìyè shí de jìniàncè。
I have always kept the yearbook bought at my high school graduation.
经过大家轮番地考验，他终于原形毕露。
Jīngguò dàjiā lúnfān de kǎoyàn，tā zhōng yú yuánxíng bìlù。
After everybody tested him several times, he finally showed his true colours.
他想毕业后去当志愿兵。
Tā xiǎng bìyè hòu qù dāng zhìyuànbīng。
He wants to be volunteer soldier after graduation.
现在许多大学毕业生成了自由职业者。
Xiànzài xǔduō dàxué bìyèshēng chéng le zìyóu zhíyè zhě。
Nowadays, many college graduates choose to be freelancers.
他大学毕业后，自愿到穷困的山乡支教，做了一个民办教师。
Tā dàxué bìyè hòu，zìyuàn dào qióngkùn de shānxiāng zhījiào，zuòle yígè mínbàn jiàoshī。
After graduation, he volunteered to be a community-supported teacher in the poor countryside.
人类要善待动物，毕竟我们都生活在同一个生物圈里。
Rénlèi yào shàndài dòngwù，bìjìng wǒmen dōu shēnghuó zài tóng yīgè shēngwùquān lǐ。
Man should be kind to animals because, after all, we are all living in the same biosphere.
他本科毕业。
Tā běnkēbìyè。
He graduated with a bachelor\'s degree.
和过去相比，我们的生活水平毕竟有了提高。
Hé guòqù xiāngbǐ，wǒmende shēnghuóshuǐpíng bìjìng yǒule tígāo。
If you compare with the past, actually our standard of living has improved.
她毕业于牛津大学法律系。
Tā bìyèyú Niújīndàxué fǎlǜxì。
She graduated in law from Oxford University.
我正为毕业论文搜集材料。
Wǒ zhèngwèi bìyèlùnwén sōujícáiliào。
I\'m in the process of gathering material for my dissertation.
为了写毕业论文，我参考了几十本书。
Wèile xiě bìyèlùnwén，wǒ cānkǎole jǐshíběnshū。
For my dissertation I had to consult dozens of different books.

近几年，本科毕业生喜欢去国外完成硕士学位。
My graduation project is about the origin and regulation of stem cells.
我的毕业设计是关于干细胞调节的起源的。

上大学不是高中毕业生的唯一选择，比如他们可以去工作，可以到职业学校学习。
Because of the economic crisis, many talented but underemployed college graduates are working as delivery people or laborers.
由于经济危机，很多富有才华的大学毕业生学非所用，从事送货或者其他体力工作。

她将在毕业典礼作感人的告别演讲。

您的账户将在下周审核完毕。
We have lost communication since we graduated.
毕业后，我们就失去了联系。

毕业之后，他单枪匹马建立了一家自己的公司。
Employment conditions for newly graduated students are generally bleak.
应届毕业生总体就业形势黯淡。

你能想象一个大学毕业生会那样天真幼稚么？

我们绝不会放弃这个计划，毕竟他们已经在上面花了太多的时间。

他是个坚定的共产主义者，把毕生精力都献给了社会主义事业。

attempt suicide; commit suicide

寻短见

万一他有个三长两短
wànyī tā yǒu gè sānchángliǎngduǎn

他的讲话简短扼要
短简

dash man; sprinter

To reduce time wasted on the journey, I usually don\'t take the slow train.

Zhè tiáo lù zuì duǎn。
This is the shortest way.

The woman who lost the car keys had to hot-wire her van.

那名丢失了汽车钥匙的妇女只能用短路方式启动她的货车。

Tōngcháng gèng lèyì fēnjū de Lùyìsī hé Huòdùn sī zuòle liǎng cì duǎnzàn de huìmiàn。
通常更乐意分居的路易斯和霍顿斯做了两次短暂的会面。
我们要尽量使用短句，但是句意一定要完整。
Wǒmen yào jìnliàng shǐyòng duǎnjù，dànshì jùyì yídìng yào wánzhěng。
We use short sentences as much as we can, but make sure that every sentence is integral in meaning.
独语句由名词或偏正短语构成，句式特别。
Dúyǔjù yóu míngcí huò piānzhèng duǎnyǔ gòuchéng，jùshì tèbié。
The one-word sentence is a special type of sentence with only a noun or a phrase forming the sentence.
他写文章喜欢用短句。
短短几句话包蕴着对祖国深深的爱恋。
to take a verse from the Bible
从圣经中摘录的短句
All these ideas are compacted into two relatively short sentences.
Suǒyǒu zhèxiē yìjiàn bèi yāsuō chéng liǎng gè xiāngduì jiào duǎn de jùzi。
所有这些意见被压缩成两个相对较短的句子。
A conjunction is a part of speech that connects two words, phrases or clauses together.
Liánjiē guānxi shì yǔyán zhōng liánjiē liǎng gè cíyǔ、 duǎnyǔ huò cóngjù de bùfen。
连接关系是语言中连接两个词语、短语或从句的部分。
An attribute can be a word, phrase or clause that modifies a noun.
修饰语可以是修饰名词的一个词、短语或者是从句。
自寻短见
zìxúnduǎnjiàn
attempt suicide; commit suicide
她万般无奈，只好自寻短见。
Tā wànbānwúnài，zhǐhǎo zìxúnduǎnjiàn。
She took her own life: there was no alternative. or As a last resort she took her own life.
见识短浅
jiànshí duǎnqiǎn
lacking knowledge and experience; shallow
老娘们儿就是头发长见识短，没什么大本事。
Lǎoniángmenr jiùshì tóufàcháng jiànshíduǎn，méi shénme dà běnshì。
Married women are lacking in knowledge and experience, and have no abilities.
她见医生走出手术室，急忙上前问长问短。
Tā jiàn yīshēngzǒuchū shǒushùshì，jímángshàngqián wènchángwènduǎn。
She asked the surgeon a lot of questions after he came out of the operating room.
寻短见

All these ideas are compacted into two relatively short sentences.
Suǒyǒu zhèxiē yìjiàn bèi yāsuō chéng liǎng gè xiāngduì jiào duǎn de jùzi。
所有这些意见被压缩成两个相对较短的句子。
Red has the longest wavelength of visible light, and violet the shortest.
Hóngsè yōngyǒu zuìcháng de kějiànguāng de bōcháng，lán zǐsè shì zuì duǎn de。
红色拥有最长的可见光的波长，蓝紫色是最短的。
我最喜欢这把镶有宝石的短剑。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan zhè bǎ xiāng yǒu bǎoshí de duǎnjiàn。
The short sword with a gem on it is my favorite.
腰间挂一把短剑。
开幕词的写作要点是：短小简洁，表达祝福和希望。
Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.
这首诗简短而含蓄。
Zhèshǒushī jiǎnduǎn ér hánxù。

在短期内
zài duǎnqī nèi
in a short time; in a brief space of time

duǎnqī dàikuǎn
short-term loan
短期轮训
duǎnqī lúnxùn
short-term training in rotation
短期周转资金
duǎnqī zhōuzhuǎn zījīn
short-term revolving fund
见识短浅
jiànshí duǎnqiǎn
lacking knowledge and experience; shallow
短缺产品
duǎnquē chǎnpǐn
products in short supply
资金短缺
zījīn duǎnquē
short of funds
短少一页。
Duǎnshǎo yí yè。
There is one page missing.
短途运输
duǎntú yùnshū
short-distance transport; short haul
短纤维棉花
duǎn xiānwéi miánhuā

duǎn xiānwéi qiēduànqì

shēncái duǎnxiǎo
of small stature
短小的序幕
duǎnxiǎo de xùmù
a brief prologue
短效口服避孕药
duǎnxiào kǒufú bìyùn yào
contraceptive pills with a short-term effect
她的一生是短暂而光荣的一生。
Tā de yìshēng shì duǎnzàn ér guāngróng de yìshēng。
Her life was short but glorious.
英雄气短，儿女情长。
Yīngxióngqìduǎn，érnǚqíngcháng。
Brief is the spirit of a hero, but love between man and woman is long (said of a man who turns from duty for the sake of love).
短(中，长)期放款
duǎn（ zhōng，cháng）qī fàngkuǎn。
short-term (medium-term, long-term) loan
分词短语
fēncí duǎnyǔ
participial phrase
今夏超短裙又风靡京沪了。
Jīn xià chāoduǎnqún yòu fēngmǐ Jīng Hù le。
Miniskirts have become fashionable again in Beijing and Shanghai this summer.
提高效率，缩短工期。
Tígāo xiàolǜ，suōduǎn gōngqī。
Increase efficiency and shorten the time limit for the project.
短褂儿
duǎnguàr
short gown
缩短制作过程
suōduǎn zhìzuò guòchéng
shorten the process of manufacture
这首诗简短而含蓄。
Zhèshǒushī jiǎnduǎn ér hánxù。
The poem is brief and pregnant with meaning.
绳子太短，不合用。
Shéngzi tài duǎn，bùhéyòng。
The rope is too short to be of any use.
做母亲的对孩子护短没什么好处。
Zuò mǔqīn de duì háizi hùduǎn méi shénme hǎochu。
It does no good to a child to have his faults shielded by his mother.
别把头发剪得太短了。
Bié bǎ tóufà jiǎn de tài duǎn le。
Don\'t cut the hair too short.
他的发言简短有力。
Tā de fāyán jiǎnduǎn yǒulì。
His speech was brief and forceful.
这件大衣稍微短一点，你将就着穿吧。
Zhèjiàn dàyī shāowēi duǎn yìdiǎn，nǐ jiāngjiù zhe chuān ba。
This coat may be a bit too short for you, but perhaps you could make do with it.
这篇文章可长可短，你看着办吧。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngkě chángkě duǎn，nǐ kàn zhe bàn ba。
You can make this article either long or short, as you see fit.
文字虽短，可内容不错。
Wénzì suī duǎn，kě nèiróngbúcuò。
It\'s a short piece of writing, but it\'s meaningful in content.
这张纸两边长短不齐。
Zhèzhāng zhǐ liǎngbiān chángduǎn bùqí。
The two edges of this piece of paper aren\'t even in length.
抹掉这个短语。
Mǒdiào zhège duǎnyǔ。
Cross out this phrase.
目光短浅
mùguāng duǎnqiǎn
short-sighted
时间太短，工程难于完成。
Shíjiān tài duǎn，gōngchéngnán yú wánchéng。
It\'s hard to finish the project in such a short time.
能源短缺
néngyuán duǎnquē
energy shortage
短训班办了三期。
Duǎnxùnbān bàn le sān qī。
The short-term training class has been run three times.
这两根筷子长短不齐。
Zhè liǎnggēn kuàizi chángduǎn bùqí。
These two chopsticks are not of equal (or uniform) length.
快爬到山顶时，大家都感到气短。
Kuài pádào shāndǐngshí，dàjiā dōu gǎndào qìduǎn。
By the time we got near the top of the hill, we were all out of breath.
失败并没有使他气短。
Shībài bìngméiyǒu shǐ tā qìduǎn。
He was not discouraged by failure.
亲热地问长问短
qīnrè de wènchángwènduǎn
make warmhearted inquiries (about sb.\'s health, etc.)

hùxiāng xuéxí，qǔchángbǔduǎn

Zhè pùzi mài dōngxi lǎoshì quējīnduǎnliǎng。

文章虽短却很有力。
Wénzhāng suī duǎn què hěn yǒulì。

wànyī tā yǒu gè sānchángliǎngduǎn

chángduǎn shìdù

在她身上找不出一点让人家说长道短的地方。
Zài tā shēnshàng zhǎo bu chū yìdiǎn ràng rénjia shuōchángdàoduǎn de dìfang。
There was not a single thing about her that one could find fault with.

suōduǎn xuézhì

suōduǎn jùlí

有所长必有所短。
Yǒu suǒ cháng bì yǒu suǒ duǎn。
Where you are strong on one thing, you are weak on another.
夏天天长夜短。
Xiàtiān tiānchángyèduǎn。
In summer the days are long and the nights short.
她万般无奈，只好自寻短见。
Tā wànbānwúnài，zhǐhǎo zìxúnduǎnjiàn。

围着他问长问短
wéi zhe tā wènchángwènduǎn 
gather round him, asking all sorts of questions
她见医生走出手术室，急忙上前问长问短。
Tā jiàn yīshēngzǒuchū shǒushùshì，jímángshàngqián wènchángwènduǎn。
She asked the surgeon a lot of questions after he came out of the operating room.
他不时长吁短叹，无精打采的。
Tā bùshí chángxūduǎntàn，wújīngdǎcǎi de。
He kept sighing and looked very downcast.
小小说只摄取生活中的一两个镜头，通过极简短的情节集中表现某个主题。
Xiǎoxiǎoshuō zhǐ shèqǔ shēnghuó zhōng de yì liǎnggè jìngtou，tōngguò jí jiǎnduǎn de qíngjié jí zhōng biǎoxiàn mǒu gè zhǔtí。
Short fiction has a simple plot, picks up only one or two scenes from life and focuses on a single theme.
现在又兴超短裙了。
Xiànzài yòu xīngchāoduǎnqún le。
Miniskirts are coming into fashion again.
长(短)袖
cháng（duǎn）xiù
long (short) sleeves
这条绳子太短，再续上一截儿吧。
Zhè tiáo shéngzi tài duǎn，zài xù shàngyì jiér ba。

duǎnqī xùnliànbān

yǎnguāngduǎnqiǎn

这样短的期限，要了我的命，也完成不了定额。

yìchángyìduǎn

yǐ wǒ zhī cháng，gōngdí zhī duǎn

suōduǎn zàitú shíjiān

bùzhēng yírìzhīduǎncháng

zhōuqī duǎn，shōuyì kuài

duǎnqī zūyuē

打短工
dǎ duǎngōng

画时圆，写时方；寒时短，热时长。—— 打一字。(谜底：日）
Huà shí yuán，xiě shí fāng; hán shí duǎn，rè shí cháng。—— Dǎ yí zì。（mídǐ：rì）
When drawn it is round, but when written it is square; in cold weather it is short, and in hot weather long. —A character. (Answer: the character 日 &quot;sun, day&quot;)

jiēduǎn
rake up sb.\'s faults, shortcomings or weaknesses

duǎnkù

chángxūduǎntàn

duǎnzàn

埃博拉传染病的潜伏期短，死亡率高。
Ābólāchuánrǎnbìng de qiánfúqī duǎn，sǐwánglǜ gāo。
Ebola is can be fatal, and once contracted it takes a short time for the symptoms to show.
我习惯用笔形输入法来编辑手机短信。
Wǒ xíguàn yòng bǐxíng shūrùfǎ lái biānjí shǒujī duǎnxìn.
I am used to typing text messages in Chinese via the forms of strokes, and their combination.
长筒袜配短裙是今年流行的穿法。
Chángtǒngwà pèi duǎnqún shì jīnnián liúxíng de chuānfǎ。
A pair of stockings paired with a short skirt is popular this year.
他这篇短评清新而不落常套。
Tā zhèpiān duǎnpíng qīngxīn ér búluò chángtào。
This notice of his is fresh, yet still conventional.
我刚刚编辑了一条超长的短信。
Wǒ gānggāng biānjí le yìtiáo chāocháng de duǎnxìn。
I\'ve just written a super-long short message.
他这是矬子里拔将军，短中取长。
Tā zhè shì cuózi lǐ bá jiāngjūn，duǎn zhōng qǔcháng。
He is trying to select a general from dwarfs; that is to say, making the best of poor resources.
每到农闲，他们就外出打短工。
Měi dào nóngxián，tāmen jiù wàichū dǎ duǎngōng。
When the farm work is out of season, they will go and look for odd jobs.
突然遭受压力或打击时，出现短时间的“情感倒错”是正常的。
Tūrán zāoshòu yālì huò dǎjī shí，chūxiàn duǎn shíjiān de“qínggǎn dàocuò”shì zhèngcháng de。
Temporary insanity is normal after the shock experienced in a great trauma.
每逢冬至点，白天的时间是一年之中最短的。
Měiféng dōngzhì diǎn，báitiān de shíjiān shì yìnián zhī zhōng zuì duǎn de。
The day when the sun passes the winter solstice is the shortest of the year.
独语句由名词或偏正短语构成，句式特别。
Dúyǔjù yóu míngcí huò piānzhèng duǎnyǔ gòuchéng，jùshì tèbié。
The one-word sentence is a special type of sentence with only a noun or a phrase forming the sentence.
你用尺子量一下这块布的短长。
Nǐ yòng chǐzi liáng yíxià zhèkuài bù de duǎncháng。
Please measure the length of the cloth with a ruler.
这次买回来的白菜，又短秤了。
Zhècì mǎi huílái de báicài，yòu duǎnchèng le。
I was given short weight again when I bought the cabbage.
他是一个身材短粗的男人，但是穿着却非常讲究。
Tā shì yígè shēncái duǎncū de nánrén，dànshì chuānzhuó què fēicháng jiǎngjiu。
He is a man of stout figure but is very fastidious about his clothing.
《三岔口》这出戏主要由两个演员进行短打表演。
《Sānchàkǒu》zhèchūxì zhǔyào yóu liǎnggè yǎnyuán jìnxíng duǎndǎ biǎoyǎn。
The play features scenes of hand-to-hand fighting between two actors wearing jacket and trousers.
中国戏曲中的武生分为长靠和短打两种。
Zhōngguó xìqǔ zhōng de wǔshēng fēn wéi chángkào hé duǎndǎ liǎng zhǒng。
In Chinese drama, there are two kinds of martial roles: one using long weapons and the other which is good at fighting with bare hands.
他一身短打装扮，干净利索。
Tā yìshēn duǎndǎ zhuāngbàn，gānjìng lìsuo。
He looks very neat in Chinese-style jacket and trousers.
我最喜欢这把镶有宝石的短剑。
Wǒ zuì xǐhuan zhè bǎ xiāng yǒu bǎoshí de duǎnjiàn。
The short sword with a gem on it is my favorite.
我们要尽量使用短句，但是句意一定要完整。
Wǒmen yào jìnliàng shǐyòng duǎnjù，dànshì jùyì yídìng yào wánzhěng。
We use short sentences as much as we can, but make sure that every sentence is integral in meaning.
演员在这个短剧中的表演非常到位。
Yǎnyuán zài zhège duǎnjù zhōng de biǎoyǎn fēicháng dàowèi。
The actors performed very well in this short play.
这些玉米长势不好，短撅撅的。
Zhèxiē yùmǐ zhǎngshì bùhǎo，duǎnjuējuē de。
This corn doesn\'t grow well. It\'s too short.
这件衣服穿在身上短撅撅的，应该换一件了。
Zhèjiàn yīfu chuān zài shēnshàng duǎnjuējuē de，yīnggāi huàn yíjiàn le。
The coat has shrunk, you\'d better buy another one.
我想在进行长篇创作之前先写几个短篇。
Wǒ xiǎng zài jìnxíng chángpiān chuàngzuò zhīqián xiān xiě jǐgè duǎnpiān。
I\'m considering writing a few short novels before proceeding to long ones.
我们不能只搞短期行为，应该有更为长远的考虑。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ gǎo duǎnqī xíngwéi，yīnggāi yǒu gèng wéi chángyuǎn de kǎolǜ。
We should not just set our eyes on short-term interests, but should instead be far-sighted.
工作时间请不要穿这样的短裙。
Gōngzuò shíjiān qǐng búyào chuān zhèyàng de duǎnqún。
Don\'t wear that kind of mini-skirt to work, please.
具体会议时间请发短信息通知我。
Jùtǐ huìyì shíjiān qǐng fā duǎnxìnxī tōngzhī wǒ。
Please send me a text message about when the meeting will be held.
今年非常流行紫色的短袖衫。
jīnnián fēicháng liúxíng zǐsè de duǎnxiùshān。
Purple short-sleeve T-shirts are popular this year.
天气冷了，不要再穿短袖了。
Tiānqì lěng le，búyào zài chuān duǎnxiù le。
It\'s getting cold, don\'t wear short-sleeved shirts any more.
小明在学校运动会上夺得了短跑金牌。
Xiǎo Míng zài xuéxiào yùndònghuì shàng duódé le duǎnpǎo jīnpái。
Xiaoming won the gold medal for sprinting in the school sports meeting.
一群迁徙的大雁飞落到湖边做短暂的停留。
Yì qún qiānxǐ de dàyàn fēiluò dào húbiān zuò duǎnzàn de tíngliú。
A flock of wild geese landed by the lake for a short stay.
走高速公路可以缩短旅途时间。
Zǒu gāosù gōnglù kěyǐ suōduǎn lǚtú shíjiān。
The trip will be shortened if we drive on the expressway.
由于高压线短路造成这个地区大面积停电。
Yóuyú gāoyāxiàn duǎnlù zàochéng zhège dìqū dàmiànjī tíngdiàn。
Due to a short circuit in the high-tension wire, power has been cut over a large area.
把这么重的任务交给我办，我是绠短汲深啊！
Bǎ zhème zhòng de rènwù jiāogěi wǒ bàn，wǒ shì gěngduǎnjíshēn a！
I cannot measure up to such a big task. As the saying goes, &quot;The spirit is willing, but the flesh is weak&quot;.
他靠给人打短工过活。
Tā kào gěi rén dǎ duǎngōng guòhuó。
H amide his living doing odd jobs.
用绘图板画图直接缩短了画画的时间，提高了工作效率。
Yòng huìtúbǎn huàtú zhíjiē suōduǎn le huàhuà de shíjiān，tígāo le gōngzuò xiàolǜ。
Drawing board software shortens drawing time and raises working efficiency.
这个火筷子做的太短了，取煤的时候很容易烫到手！
Zhège huǒkuàizi zuò de tài duǎn le，qǔméi de shíhou hěnróngyì tàng dào shǒu！
This pair of fire tongs is too short. One might burn one\'s hands while fetching coal!
面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。
Miànduì dírén de jìngōng，jiāngjūn yǐ jìqióng zhìduǎn，wúnéng wéilì。
The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy\'s attack.
老人在一起时总会说些家长里短。
Lǎorén zài yìqǐ shí zǒnghuì shuō xiē jiācháng lǐduǎn。
When old people meet, they like to talk about domestic trifles.
你把那件紧身儿的短褂放哪了？
Nǐ bǎ nà jiàn jǐnshēnr de duǎnguà fàngnǎ le？
Where did you leave your tight shirt?
我们不能井中观天，目光短浅。
Wǒmen bùnéng jǐng zhōng guāntiān，mùguāng duǎnqiǎn。
We can not watch the sky from inside the well and be short-sighted.
她娴熟地发着短信，把手机按键按得不住地咔嗒响。
Tā xiánshú de fā zhe duǎnxìn，bǎ shǒujī ànjiàn àn de búzhù de kādāxiǎng。
She is sending text messages with unerring skill, the keys are being tapped.
开幕词的写作要点是：短小简洁，表达祝福和希望。
Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.
店里的苹果已经亏短了，需要补货！
Diàn lǐ de píngguǒ yǐjing kuīduǎn le，xūyào bǔhuò！
The apples in the store are insufficient so we need to purchase more.
今晚他心血来潮，一口气写下了好几首短诗。
Jīnwǎn tā xīnxuè láicháo，yì kǒu qì xiěxià le hǎo jǐ shǒu duǎnshī。
He has been seized by a whim tonight and is writing several short poems at one sitting.
老娘们儿就是头发长见识短，没什么大本事。
Lǎoniángmenr jiùshì tóufàcháng jiànshíduǎn，méi shénme dà běnshì。
Married women are lacking in knowledge and experience, and have no abilities.
他脖子短，不适合穿立领的毛衣。
Tā bózi duǎn，bú shìhé chuān lìlǐng de máoyī。
Having a short neck, he is not suitable to wear a turtle neck sweater.
连体婴儿大多数都寿命很短。
Liántǐ yīngér dà duōshù dōu shòumìng hěnduǎn。
Most conjoined twins have a very short life-span.
纸短情长，我仅在这里敬祝你曼福。

The letter can not carry my feelings. I just wish you long-lasting happiness.
目光短浅的乱砍滥伐行为，破坏了植被，造成了水土流失。

The company didn\'t think about whether everyone could finish such formidable tasks in such a short time when they assigned them.
为了缩短路上所花的时间，我一般不买普客票。

速冻蔬菜还是不如新鲜菜口感好。

xiānmíng de duìzhào

xiānmíng de jiézòu
strongly accented rhythms

zhǔtí xiānmíng

xiānmíng de shídài yìnjì 
a marked imprint of the times
一篇记叙文最终是靠一句句话组成的，因此，大家在语言表达上要注意准确、鲜明、生动、形象。
Yì piān jìxùwén zuì zhōng shì kào yíjùjù huà zǔchéng de，yīncǐ，dàjiā zài yǔyán biǎodá shàng yào zhùyì zhǔnquè、xiānmíng、shēngdòng、xíng xiàng。

marked contrast

Quick-frozen vegetables taste worse than fresh ones.
妈妈总是早上五点多钟的时候到菜场去买鲜菜。

Mother always goes to the food market around five in the morning to buy fresh vegetables.

腊月没有新鲜的蔬菜，于是妈妈就腌菜给我们吃。

即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。

Sichuan style food, with its spicy and delicious taste, has won many people\'s love.
人们爱喝春茶，是喜欢那新鲜的味道。

Spring tea has a fresh taste and that is why people love to drink it.
姐姐带来了新鲜的春菇。
Jiějie dàilái le xīnxiān de chūngū。
My sister brings fresh spring mushrooms.
这个战士不顾头上滴淌着鲜血，继续向前冲。
Zhège zhànshì búgù tóushàng dītǎng zhe xiānxuè，jìxù xiàng qián chōng。
The soldier kept charging ahead despite the blood dripping from his head.
用电炒锅做出来的饭菜，味道鲜美。
Yòng diànchǎoguō zuò chūlái de fàncài，wèidào xiānměi。

即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。
Jíshǐ zài dōngjì，wǒmen yě kěyǐ chī dào xīnxiān de dòngzicài。
Even in winter, fresh vegetables are still available because we can plant them in greenhouses.
听说多吃新鲜的蔬菜水果，可以美容防老。
Tīngshuō duō chī xīnxiān de shūcài shuǐguǒ，kěyǐ měiróng fánglǎo。
Eating fresh vegetables and fruits can have the effect of making one look young and beautiful.
这只烤鸡肥嫩鲜美，真是好吃！
Zhèzhī kǎojī féinèn xiānměi，zhēnshi hǎochī！
This lightly roasted chicken tastes delicious.
教师节那天，全班同学为张老师奉上了一束鲜花。
Jiàoshījié nàtiān，quánbān tóngxué wèi Zhāng lǎoshī fèngshàng le yí shù xiānhuā。
On Teachers\' Day, the whole class offered a bunch of flowers to Professor Zhang.
他们把这些经过复选的水果装进了保鲜袋。
Tāmen bǎ zhèxiē jīngguò fùxuǎn de shuǐguǒ zhuāngjìn le bǎoxiāndài。
They put fruit that has passed the double selection process into freshness-maintaining bags.
由于志愿填报不当，高考生高分落榜现象并不鲜见。
Yóuyú zhìyuàn tiánbào búdàng，gāokǎoshēng gāofēn luòbǎng xiàn xiàng bìng bùxiānjiàn。
It\'s not rare that some candidates for the university entrance examination get high marks but fail to be admitted to a university because they fill in the application form inappropriately.
瓜架上垂着一根根鲜嫩的黄瓜。
Guājià shàng chuí zhe yìgēngēn xiānnèn de huángguā。
Fresh cucumbers hang down from the frame.
他衣着光鲜，风度翩翩。
Tā yīzháo guāngxiān，fēngdù piānpiān。
He is dressed in a bright new suit and looks very handsome.
为新中国的成立而牺牲的战士们用自己的鲜血铸就了我们的国魂。
Wèi xīn Zhōngguó de chénglì ér xīshēng de zhànshìmen yòng zìjǐ de xiānxuè zhùjiù le wǒmen de guóhún。
Those soldiers sacrificed for the new nation have founded the national spirit with their blood.
现在海归派人员越来越多，这将给我国的科技发展注入新鲜的血液。
Xiànzài hǎiguīpài rényuán yuèláiyuè duō，zhè jiāng gěi wǒguó de kējì fāzhǎn zhùrù xīnxiān de xuèyè。
Now there are more students who have returned and they will infuse new blood into technology development in China.

The oyster tastes fresh and tender.

Though fermented oyster is dried meat, it is still quite delicious.

Hǎixiāndiàn lǐ yǒu hébàng chūshòu。
Clams are sold in a seafood shop.
周末我们一起去吃河鲜吧！
Zhōumò wǒmen yìqǐ qù chī héxiān ba！
Let\'s eat river fish this weekend.
在怀柔可以吃到鲜美的虹鳟。
Zài Huáiróu kěyǐ chīdào xiānměi de hóngzūn。
You can eat delicious rainbow trout in Huairou.
这道汤里放了鸡精，味道鲜美多了。
Zhè dào tāng lǐ fàng le jījīng，wèidào xiānměi duō le。
This soup tastes much more delicious with a kind of chicken powder seasoning.
我国东北边境集居着很多朝鲜族。
Wǒ guó dōngběi biānjìng jíjū zhe hěnduō Cháoxiǎnzú。
Many people of Korean ethnicity gather and live together near our northeastern border.
妈妈端出一碗新鲜的水果浆汁给奶奶喝。
Māma duānchū yìwǎn xīnxiān de shuǐguǒ jiāngzhī gěi nǎinai hē。
Mother serves grandma a bowel of fresh juice.
我国的吉林、辽宁两省与朝鲜接邻。

Jilin and Liaoning Province share borders with North Korea.

这些用保鲜膜包着的菜是精菜。

The stewed mushroom soup in this restaurant is very delicious .
这个牌子的蔻丹在指甲上保持的时间较久，颜色也鲜亮，许多小姑娘都很喜欢。
Zhège páizi de kòudān zài zhǐjiǎ shàng bǎochí de shíjiān jiào jiǔ，yánsè yě xiānliàng，xǔduō xiǎogūniang dōu hěnxǐhuan。
The nail polish of this brand, having long persistence and bright color, is many girls\' favorite.
大熊猫不吃枯竹，所以你必须喂它新鲜的竹子。

他一拳把我的眉弓打破了，鲜血直流。
