The sudden bad news damped the joyous atmosphere.
Tūrán chuánlái de huàixiāoxī dǎpòle kuàilè de qìfēn。
突然传来的坏消息打破了快乐的气氛。
At worst, a poor rating can put a company out of business.
Zuì huài de kěnéng shì，pínggū guò dī huì shǐ gōngsī pòchǎn。
最坏的可能是，评估过低会使公司破产。
能办出这种事的人准是个坏种。
Néng bànchū zhèzhǒng shì de rén zhǔn shì gè huàizhǒng。
A person who could do this must be a bad egg.
对这种坏人可不能手软。
Duì zhèzhǒng huàirén kě bùnéng shǒuruǎn。
We must not be soft on such scoundrels.
你干这种坏事，早晚吃枪子儿。
Nǐ gàn zhèzhǒng huàishì，zǎowǎn chī qiāngzir。
Do evil things like this, and you will be shot dead some day.
现在这种坏现象已经是蔓草难除了。
Xiànzài zhèzhǒng huài xiàn xiàng yǐjing shì màncǎo nánchú le。
The bad phenomenon is engrained, and will be hard to eradicate.
这种坏人死有余辜。
Zhèzhǒng huàirén sǐyǒuyúgū。
Death\'s too good for people like that.
这种现象的好坏，也没有明确的临界点进行判断。
Zhèzhǒng xiàn xiàng de hǎohuài，yě méiyǒu míngquè de línjièdiǎn jìnxíng pànduàn。
Whether this phenomenon is good or bad, there is no clear critical point to judge.
这种武器有极大的破坏性。
Zhèzhǒng wǔqì yǒu jídà de pòhuàixìng。
This kind of weapon has great destructiveness.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn zhìshǐ zhèzhǒng zhíwù zāoshòu huǐmièxìng pòhuài。
Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
这种坏人该一枪崩了他。
我最怕你跟那种蔫儿坏的人打交道。
这种做法太坏了
绝不能让这种刁悍的坏人得逞
From a yeasayer\'s point of view, the situation is not bad
从乐天派的观点来看，这种局势还不坏。
The general appearance of sluggishness alarmed his friends.
Nàzhǒng dāizhì de yàngzi xiàhuàile tā de péngyǒumen。
那种呆滞的样子吓坏了他的朋友们。
She spends her time frivolously enjoying the easy life of a rich and spoiled girl.
Tā qīngfú de guòzhe tā nàzhǒng fùyǒu de、 bèi rén chǒnghuài de shūshì rìzi。
她轻浮地过着她那种富有的、被人宠坏的舒适日子。
This kind of life can prove disruptive and uncomfortable.
Zhè zhǒng shēnghuó bèi zhèngmíng shì pòhuàixìng de，ràng rén gǎndào bù shūfu。
这种生活被证明是破坏性的，让人感到不舒服。
This new product is rustproof, dustproof, and unbreakable.
这种新产品防锈，防尘并且摔不坏。
Smokers always try to make a case for smoking eventhough it is a bad habit.
Jǐnguǎn xīyān shì gè huài xíguàn， xīyānzhě què zǒng shìtú wèi xīyān zhǎo zhǒngzhǒng biànjiě。
尽管吸烟是个坏习惯，吸烟者却总试图为吸烟找种种辩解。
A good tiding will not be attractive on this occasion, while a bad one just contrary.
这种场合中好消息不会引人注意，但坏消息则恰恰相反。
裸装运输玻璃器材很容易把器材摔坏。
Luǒzhuāng yùnshū bōli qìcái hěnróngyì bǎ qìcái shuāihuài。
Unwrapped glass equipment is easily broken in transport.
He kissed off his bad luck and started to gamble.
Tā shěqìle tā de huài yùnqi， kāishǐ dǔbó。
他舍弃了他的坏运气，开始赌博。
If I didn\'t have bad luck I wouldn\'t have any luck at all.
Wǒ zhǐyǒu huàiyùnqi。
我只有坏运气。
The Resistance sabotaged railroad operations during the war.
Dǐkàng yùndòng chéngyuán zài zhànzhēng qījiān pòhuài tiělùyùnshū。
抵抗运动成员在战争期间破坏铁路运输。
Cats do not affect the luck of anyone whose path has been crossed.
猫从任何人面前经过，都不会影响到其运气好坏。
The frame of the painting was damaged by the movers.
Huàkuàng bèi bānyùngōng nònghuài le。
画框被搬运工弄坏了。
My father looks down his nose at spoiled professional athletes.
Wǒ de fùqīn kànbùqǐ bèi guànhuàile de zhíyè yùndòngyuán。
我的父亲看不起被惯坏了的职业运动员。
We were lucky enough to travel without any problems with the weather.
我们真够走运的，在旅行过程中没有遇到一点儿坏天气。
局部坏死
júbù huàisǐ
local necrosis
牙坏死
yá huàisǐ
dental necrosis
这个作恶多端的坏蛋，死了都没人给他收尸！
Zhège zuòè duōduān de huàidàn，sǐ le dōu méi rén gěi tā shōushī！
This rascal who committed numerous crimes won\'t have anyone pick up his dead body after his death!
这种坏人死有余辜。
Zhèzhǒng huàirén sǐyǒuyúgū。
Death\'s too good for people like that.
这个络子坏了，线总缠死到里面，你拿去修修吧。
Zhège luòzi huài le，xiàn zǒng chánsǐ dào lǐmian，nǐ náqù xiūxiū ba。
This spindle is broken. The thread always tangles there. Please have it repaired.
The nerve is dead.
Shénjīng huàisǐ。
神经坏死。
Nasir crawled out of his destroyed house, leaving his dead relatives behind.
Nàxī\'ěr páchū bèi huǐhuài de fángzi，ér sǐqù de qīnrén méiyǒu chūlái。
纳西尔爬出被毁坏的房子，而死去的亲人没有出来。
使坏水
shǐ huàishuǐ
play evil tricks; use deceit
蔫儿不唧地冒坏水
niānrbùjī de mào huàishuǐ
be full of tricks though quiet
别信她！ 这个女人可是一肚子坏水！
Bié xìn tā！Zhège nǚrén kěshì yídùzi huàishuǐ！
Don\'t trust her. She\'s full of craft and guile.
这里的下水管道坏掉了，积水已经很深了。
Zhèlǐ de xiàshuǐ guǎndào huàidiào le，jīshuǐ yǐjing hěnshēn le。
The sewer pipe here is broken and there is already too much accumulated water.
暖水壶的内胆好像是坏了，开水放进去凉得很快。
Nuǎnshuǐhú de nèidǎn hǎo xiàng shì huài le，kāishuǐ fàngjìnqù liáng de hěnkuài。
The glass liner of the vacuum flask seems to be broken, the boiling water will get cold quickly.
洪水毁坏了铁路。
Hóngshuǐ huǐhuài le tiělù。
The flood damaged the railway.
今年的洪水冲坏了无数桑田，真让人痛心。
Jīnnián de hóngshuǐ chōnghuài le wú shù sāngtián，zhēn ràng rén tòngxīn。
This year, the flood has damaged innumerable mulberry fields, which is quite distressing.
目光短浅的乱砍滥伐行为，破坏了植被，造成了水土流失。
Mùguāng duǎnqiǎn de luànkǎn lànfá xíngwéi，pòhuài le zhíbèi，zàochéng le shuǐtǔ liúshī。
Short-sighted action of lumbering in a destructive manner destroys vegetation, and causes soil erosion.
水龙头不出水了，是不是坏了？
Shuǐlóngtou bùchūshuǐle，shìbúshì huài le？
There isn\'t any water coming out of the tap, is it broken?
还好，这场大水没有把堤坝冲坏。
Hái hǎo，zhè chǎngdàshuǐ méiyǒu bǎ dībà chōnghuài。
Fortunately, the flood did not break the dyke.
这人一肚子坏水，跟他交往可得小心点。
一肚子坏水(满脑子阴谋诡计)。
喝生水坏肚子。
被洪水冲坏的公路已经修复。
破坏地面覆被会造成水土流失。
The flood washed out the road.
洪水冲坏了道路。
I used a cheap plastic liner to protect my carpet from water damage.
Wǒ yòngle yí gè liánjià de sùliào hùtào lái bìmiǎn shuǐ nònghuài wǒ de dìtǎn。
我用了一个廉价的塑料护套来避免水弄坏我的地毯。
Rain eroded the terraces.
Yǔshuǐ chōnghuàile tītián。
雨水冲坏了梯田。
What a pity, all the fruit has gone bad.
真可惜，所有的水果都坏了。
This vessel is broken and the water in it is leaking.
这个容器坏了，里面的水在往外漏。
I think the water broke my phone.
Wǒ rènwéi wǒ de diànhuà jìn shuǐ suǒyǐ huài le。
我认为我的电话进水所以坏了。
It is important not to break the outer skin of the fruit when cooking it.
Pēngrèn shuǐguǒ shí，zhùyì búyào pòhuài tā de wài biǎopí。
烹饪水果时，注意不要破坏它的外表皮。
The fins of the ships were badly damaged after the storm.
Fēngbào zhōng，zhè tiáo chuán de shuǐpíngduò zāodào yánzhòng sǔnhuài。
风暴中，这条船的水平舵遭到严重损坏。
Don\'t go into waters less than 20 feet deep, or the hull might get damaged.
Bú yào shǐrù shēndù bùzú èrshí yīngchǐ de shuǐyù，fǒuzé de huà，chuánké kěnéng huì bèi sǔnhuài。
不要驶入深度不足20英尺的水域，否则的话，船壳可能会被损坏。
Water is drawn over the disc but does not get close enough to the roots to damage them.
Shuǐ sǎzàile cípán shàng，dàn méiyǒu shèn dào lǐmiàn nònghuài cípán。
水洒在了磁盘上，但没有渗到里面弄坏磁盘。
包庇坏人坏事
bāobì huàirénhuàishì 
harbour evildoers and cover up their evil deeds
他净干坏事，现在可遭报应了。
Tā jìng gàn huàishì，xiànzài kě zāo bàoyìng le。
He\'s getting paid back for all the bad things he\'s done.
在一定的条件下坏事能够变成好事。
Zài yídìng de tiáojiàn xià huàishì nénggòu biànchéng hǎo shì。
Under given conditions, bad things can be turned into good things.
把她干的那些坏事给大伙抖搂抖搂。
Bǎ tā gàn de nàxiē huàishì gěi dàhuǒ dǒulou dǒulou。
Let everyone know all the wicked things she has done.
鼓捣别人去干坏事
gǔdao bié rén qù gàn huàishì
incite people to do evil
这些坏事是谁鼓动你干的？
Zhèxiē huàishì shì shuí gǔdòngnǐ gàn de?
Who put you up to all these dirty tricks?
怙恶不悛，继续做坏事
hù\'èbùquān，jìxù zuò huàishì
remain impenitent and keep up one\'s evildoing
向坏人坏事作斗争
xiàng huàirén huàishì zuò dòuzhēng
struggle against evildoers and evil deeds
急躁只能坏事。
Jízào zhǐ nénghuài shì。
Impetuosity will only make things worse.
坏事了！
Huài shì le！
Something terrible has happened.
坏事做绝
huàishì zuòjué 
perpetrate every kind of villainy
你干这种坏事，早晚吃枪子儿。
Nǐ gàn zhèzhǒng huàishì，zǎowǎn chī qiāngzir。
Do evil things like this, and you will be shot dead some day.
他尽干违法的坏事，早晚有一天会翻船！
Tā jìn gàn wéifǎ de huài shì，zǎowǎn yǒu yìtiān huì fānchuán！
He will be caught one day for all his bad deeds.
改业跳槽对年轻人来说未必是坏事。
Gǎiyè tiàocáo duì niánqīngrén láishuō wèibì shì huàishì。
Occupational changes and job-hopping may not be a bad thing for the young.
这些虚伪的官绅背地里做尽了坏事。
Zhèxiē xūwěi de guānshēn bèidìlǐ zuòjìn le huàishì。
This hypocritical bureaucrat has done many bad things secretly.
你别光火了，她是好心做坏事。
Nǐ bié guānghuǒ le，tā shì hǎoxīn zuò huàishì。
Don\'t be so angry, her mistake was made out of her good intentions.
他做了坏事，心中惶悚，生怕被人知道。
Tā zuò le huàishì，xīn zhōng huángsǒng，shēngpà bèi rén zhīdào。
He panicked because he thought others might learn of the illegal acts he committed.
公众要勇敢地揭批坏人坏事。
Gōngzhòng yào yǒnggǎn de jiēpī huàirén huàishì。
The public should expose and criticize evil deeds and people fearless.
亮丑不是坏事，能够刺激我们改正缺点。
Liàngchǒu búshì huàishì，nénggòu cìjī wǒmen gǎizhèng quēdiǎn。
Revealing mistakes is not a bad thing. It can stimulate us to correct our shortcomings.
他已经在这座山上作了两年山大王，干了很多抢劫的坏事。
Tā yǐjing zài zhèzuò shān shàng zuò le liǎng nián shāndàiwang，gàn le hěnduō qiǎngjié de huàishì。
He has been the head of a group of outlaws on this mountain for two years, and has robbed others many times.
他们两个经常聚在一起干坏事，真是“物以类聚，人以群分”！
Tāmén liǎnggè jīngcháng jùzài yìqǐ gàn huàishì，zhēnshì“wùyǐlèijù，rényǐqúnfēn”！
The two of them often get together to plot bad things, like attacking us!
他在巡捕房当过差，不过没做过什么坏事。
Tā zài xúnbǔfáng dāng guò chāi，búguò méi zuòguò shénme huàishì。
He worked in the police station in the former foreign concessions, but he didn\'t do anything wrong.
这件事折衷来看，并不是件坏事。
Zhèjiànshì zhé zhōng láikàn，bìng búshì jiàn huàishì。
Judging from a compromised point of view, this is not totally a bad thing.
他经常指使年幼无知的孩子做坏事。
Tā jīngcháng zhǐshǐ niányòu wúzhī de háizi zuò huàishì。
He often incites the young to mischief.
他太粗心了！ 结果坏了事。
Tā tài cūxīn le！Jiéguǒ huài le shì。
He was so careless that he made a hash of it.
坏人当事，好人倒霉。
Huàirén dāngshì，hǎorén dǎoméi。
When bad people are in control, good people suffer.
喝多了酒，会说昏话，有时也会坏了大事。
Hēduō le jiǔ，huì shuō hūnhuà，yǒushí yě huì huài le dàshì。
One raves after drinking too much wine, and sometimes this can even spoil something important.
这人脾气很坏，容易生事。
Zhèrén píqi hěn huài，róngyì shēngshì。
He has a bad temper and often makes trouble.
他本心并不坏，只是做事方式有问题。
Tā běnxīn bìng búhuài，zhǐ shì zuòshì fāngshì yǒu wèntí。
His motive was not bad, but his way of handling things were wrong.
把事情弄坏
bǎ shìqing nònghuài
make a mess of things
能办出这种事的人准是个坏种。
Néng bànchū zhèzhǒng shì de rén zhǔn shì gè huàizhǒng。
A person who could do this must be a bad egg.
他气急败坏地跑回来把发生的事情告诉我们。
Tā qìjíbàihuài de pǎo huílái bǎ fāshēng de shìqinggàosu wǒmen。
He ran back, panting and dismayed, to tell us what had happened.
清查同这次破坏活动有牵连的人和事
qīngchá tóngzhècì pòhuài huódòngyǒu qiānlián de rén hé shì
investigate the individuals and incidents connected with the sabotage
明人不做暗事，我怎么会背后说你坏话呢？
Míngrén búzuò ànshì，wǒ zěnme huì bèihòu shuō nǐ huàihuà ne？
An honest person doesn’t do shady things. I never spoke evil of you behind your back.
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
这件事看起来是坏事，其实是好事。
他办事公正，为人爽直，对坏人坏事敢于拉下脸来。
发奸擿伏(揭发奸邪和隐秘的坏事)。
背着大伙干坏事。
亏他及时发现，不然就坏事了。
吃一堑，长一智，坏事就能变成好事。
揭批坏人坏事。
结帮干坏事。

不要鼓捣别人干坏事
不能成事，光坏事。

干了坏事，生恐别人知道。
严惩嗾使孩子干坏事的人。
贪财的人难免干坏事。
你又没做坏事，心慌什么？
对坏人坏事决不能心软。
他的本心并不坏，只是把事情办坏了。

好事都让你给搅坏了

警惕坏人撮弄不明真相的群众闹事
a bad case of the gimmies
贪婪的坏事例
up to no good
正干坏事
He still won\'t like to dirty his hands and in all probability he won\'t have to.
他还是不愿意干坏事脏了自己的手，而且他很可能也无需去脏了自己的手。
We all know the feeling that comes with doing wrong.
Wǒmen dōu tǐyànguò zuò huàishì chǎnshēng de gǎnjué。
我们都体验过做坏事产生的感觉。
The majority revere him in spite of all the bad he\'s done

尽管他做过很多坏事，多数人还是都很崇敬他。
The evil deed was past recall.
Huài shì yǐjīng wúfǎ wǎnhuí。
坏事已经无法挽回。
I had paid my dues and cleared my skirt of any wrongdoing.
Wǒ yǐjīng zuòle wǒ yīnggāi zuò de，cóngcǐ jīnpén-xǐshǒu búzài gàn huàishì le。
我已经做了我应该做的，从此金盆洗手不再干坏事了。

Méiyǒu duì rénrén dōu yǒuhài de huàishì；hài yú cǐ zhě lìyú bǐ。
没有对人人都有害的坏事；害于此者利于彼。
He kept wondering profanely why everything bad happened to him.
Tā màmàlielie，yìzhí zài dígū wèishénme suǒyǒu de huàishì zǒngshì luò zài tā tóushàng。

He denied any wrongdoing.
Tā jùjué zuò rènhé huàishì。
他拒绝做任何坏事。
if the worst comes to the worst
如果最坏的事情发生
His confidence brings out the worst in his opponents.
Tā de yǒngqì duì tā de dírén láishuō shì zuì huài de shì。
他的勇气对他的敌人来说是最坏的事。
to reflect badly on sb/sth
对某人/某事有坏影响
My thirst for power has ruined my relationship with my colleagues.
Wǒ duì quánlì de kěwàng pòhuàile wǒ yǔ tóngshì de guānxi。
我对权力的渴望破坏了我与同事的关系。
They concocted a plot to discredit the governor.
Tāmen niēzàole yígè gùshi lái bàihuài zhōuzhǎng de míngyù。
他们捏造了一个故事来败坏州长的名誉。
If your head isn\'t too far in the clouds you may be able to recognize a good thing when you see it.
Rúguǒ nǐ bú shì tèbié ài huànxiǎng，nà nǐ shì nénggòu fēnqīng shìqing de hǎohuài de。
如果你不是特别爱幻想， 那你是能够分清事情的好坏的。
Apparently it didn\'t do much harm.
显然，这件事没有很大的坏处。
The once elegant temple lay in virtual ruin.
Céngjīng zhuāngyán de sìmiào shìshíshàng zhèng chǔyú huǐhuài zhuàngtài。
曾经庄严的寺庙事实上正处于毁坏状态。
I don\'t see the situation quite as negatively as you do.
Wǒ rènwéi shìqing méi nǐ xiǎngxiàng de nàme huài。
我认为事情没你想象的那么坏。
The jealous colleague decided to flaw the project plans.
Zhè míng jídù de tóngshì juédìng gěi zhèxiē xiàngmù jìhuà gǎo pòhuài。
这名嫉妒的同事决定给这些项目计划搞破坏。
包庇坏人坏事
bāobì huàirénhuàishì 
harbour evildoers and cover up their evil deeds
向坏人坏事作斗争
xiàng huàirén huàishì zuò dòuzhēng
struggle against evildoers and evil deeds
公众要勇敢地揭批坏人坏事。
Gōngzhòng yào yǒnggǎn de jiēpī huàirén huàishì。
The public should expose and criticize evil deeds and people fearless.
坏人当道，好人受害。
Huàirén dāngdào，hǎorén shòuhài。
When evildoers are in power, good people suffer.
坏人当事，好人倒霉。
Huàirén dāngshì，hǎorén dǎoméi。
When bad people are in control, good people suffer.
我们决不冤枉一个好人，也决不放过一个坏人。
Wǒmen jué bùyuānwang yí ge hǎorén，yě jué bùfàngguò yígè huàirén。
We will never wrong a single good person nor let off a single bad one.
不要受坏人拉拢。
Búyào shòu huàirén lālǒng。
Don\'t get roped in by bad people.
破坏人权
pòhuài rénquán
violate human rights
对这种坏人可不能手软。
Duì zhèzhǒng huàirén kě bùnéng shǒuruǎn。
We must not be soft on such scoundrels.
面对坏人不要卑躬曲膝。
Miànduì huàirén búyào bēigōngqūxī。
臭氧层不断被破坏，人类的生存环境受到威胁。
Chòuyǎngcéng búduàn bèi pòhuài，rénlèi de shēngcún huánjìng shòudào wēixié。
As the ozone gradually becomes damaged, humankind\'s survival is threatened.
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。

Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
我们要锁好门窗，谨防坏人溜门撬锁。
Wǒmen yào suǒhǎo ménchuāng，jǐnfáng huàirén liūmén qiàosuǒ。
We should lock doors and windows in order to prevent house-breaking.
严查违禁药品，不能让坏人逍遥法外。
Yánchá wéijìn yàopǐn，bùnéng ràng huàirén xiāoyáo fǎwài。

他在影片中扮坏人。
Tā zài yǐngpiàn zhōng bànhuàirén。
He played the villain in the film.
凡坏人没有好下场。
Fán huàirén méiyǒu hǎoxiàchǎng。
Bad people always come to a sticky end.
他和坏人勾在一起。
Tā hé huàirén gōuzài yìqǐ。
He\'s got in with some bad people.
这种坏人死有余辜。
Zhèzhǒng huàirén sǐyǒuyúgū。
Death\'s too good for people like that.
讲别人坏话
jiǎngbiérén huàihuà
speak ill of others
那些说我坏话的人是在侵害我的名誉权！
Nàxiē shuō wǒ huàihuà de rén shì zài qīnhài wǒ de míngyùquán！

他这人真可恨，老在背后说别人的坏话。

He\'s a most hateful person, always saying nasty things behind people\'s back.
巡抚大人好坏不分，不算清官。
Xúnfǔ dàrén hǎohuài bùfēn，búsuàn qīngguān。
The imperial inspector cannot be called a good official because he cannot tell good from bad.
轮椅上的摇把坏了，你找人修一下吧 。

gǔdao bié rén qù gàn huàishì

Wǒmen de léidá zài pòhuài fāshēng zhīqián zhēnchá dàole dírén de fēijī。
我们的雷达在破坏发生之前侦查到了敌人的飞机。

Xiǎngxiǎng yí gè jùrén kěnéng zàochéng de dàpòhuài bā。

The bad news be a bitter blow for those people who are still searching for their relatives.
Duìyú réng zài xúnzhǎo qīnshǔ de rén láishuō，tāmen hěnnán jiēshòu huàixiāoxī。
对于仍在寻找亲属的人来说，他们很难接受坏消息。
The teenager was ordered to pay compensation for the damage to the car.
Zhège niánqīngrén bèi yāoqiú zhīfù chēliàng sǔnhuài de péichángjīn。
这个年轻人被要求支付车辆损坏的赔偿金。
Men, with their engineering skills, ruined Florida\'s Everglades.
Rénmen yòng tāmen de gōngchéng jìnéng pòhuàile Fóluólǐdázhōu de zhǎozédì。
人们用他们的工程技能破坏了佛罗里达州的沼泽地。
How does one discern between what is right or wrong?
Yí gè rén rúhé cáinéng qù biànmíng shìfēi hǎohuài ne？
一个人如何才能去辨明是非好坏呢？
The sidewalk deformed during the earthquake.
Rénxíngdào zài dìzhèn qījiān shòudào pòhuài。
人行道在地震期间受到破坏。
Oil prices fell sharply, then rose a little on renewed fear of damage to the oil fields.
Suízhe qìyóujiàgé de dàfú xiàjiàng，rénmen yòu kāishǐ dānxīn duì yóutián de pòhuài le。
随着汽油价格的大幅下降，人们又开始担心对油田的破坏了。
No one rides dodgem cars at the amusement park anymore because only one is still working.
游乐园里没人玩碰碰车了，因为只有一辆还没坏。
There is a common misconception that war has obsoleted the peace progress.
人们普遍错误地认为战争已经破坏了和平进程。
Cats do not affect the luck of anyone whose path has been crossed.
猫从任何人面前经过，都不会影响到其运气好坏。
This woman moved to another city, trying to get rid of her bad reputation.
这个女人搬到另一个城市，试图摆脱自己的坏名声。
People should not keep exploiting natural resources without thinking about the environmental damages that causes.
人们开发自然资源的同时不应忽略破坏环境的代价。
The twelfth-century building was destroyed during the Turkish occupation.
Zài Tǔ\'ěrqírén zhànlǐng qījiān，nà zuò shí\'èr shìjì de jiànzhù zāodàole huǐhuài。
在土耳其人占领期间，那座12世纪的建筑遭到了毁坏。
His idea could help meet the common criticism that turbines are both noisy and a blot on the landscape.
Tā de xiǎngfǎ fúhé dàduōshù rén de guāndiǎn，nà jiùshì wōlúnjī shì yíjiàn yòu chǎo yòu pòhuài zìránměi de dōngxi。
他的想法符合大多数人的观点，那就是涡轮机是一件又吵又破坏自然美的东西。
In the body free radicals are high-energy particles that ricochet wildly and damage cells.
Réntǐ nèi de zìyóujī shì gāo néngliàng lìzǐ，yòngyú húluàn chōngzhuàng hé pòhuài de xìbāo。
人体内的自由基是高能量粒子，用于胡乱冲撞和破坏的细胞。
讲别人坏话
jiǎngbiérén huàihuà
speak ill of others
好话坏话都要让人讲完。
Hǎohuà huàihuà dōuyào ràng rén jiǎngwán。
One should let others finish what they have to say whether it sounds pleasant or unpleasant.
他这人真可恨，老在背后说别人的坏话。
Tā zhè rén zhēn kěhèn，lǎo zài bèihòu shuō biérén de huàihuà。
He\'s a most hateful person, always saying nasty things behind people\'s back.
那些说我坏话的人是在侵害我的名誉权！
Nàxiē shuō wǒ huàihuà de rén shì zài qīnhài wǒ de míngyùquán！
Those speaking evil of me infringe on my right of reputation.
明人不做暗事，我怎么会背后说你坏话呢？
Míngrén búzuò ànshì，wǒ zěnme huì bèihòu shuō nǐ huàihuà ne？
An honest person doesn’t do shady things. I never spoke evil of you behind your back.
他总是指名道姓地说人家坏话。
Tā zǒngshì zhǐmíng dàoxìng dì shuō rénjia huàihuà。
He always mention names when speaking ill of others.
他总是背着父母说他们的坏话。
Tā zǒngshì bèizhe fùmǔ shuō tāmende huàihuà。
He is always speaking badly of his parents behind their backs.
他好话坏话一并听。
Tā hǎohuà huàihuà yíbìng tīng.
He\'s prepared to hear things he doesn\'t want to hear as well as that which is more welcome.
他从不说老婆坏话。
Tā cóngbù shuō lǎopó huàihuà.
He never speaks ill of his wife.
要杜绝人为损坏公用电话的现象。
Yào dùjué rénwéi sǔnhuài gōngyòng diànhuà de xiàn xiàng。
Stop the damage of public telephones.
我家的话机坏了，需要去买一台新的。
Wǒjiā de huàjī huài le，xūyào qù mǎi yìtái xīn de。
Our telephone is broken. We need to buy a new one.
喝多了酒，会说昏话，有时也会坏了大事。
Hēduō le jiǔ，huì shuō hūnhuà，yǒushí yě huì huài le dàshì。
One raves after drinking too much wine, and sometimes this can even spoil something important.
不能光听好话，不听坏话。
有人在背后讲你的坏话。
I don\'t like Peter. He is always talking behind everybody\'s back.
我不喜欢彼特，他总是讲每个人的坏话。
Her mom told the kid he shouldn\'t speak ill of others.
她妈妈告诉那个小男孩，不该说别人的坏话。
to speak ill of sb
说某人的坏话
Don\'t speak badly about someone who is not here.
Búyào shuō bú zài zhèli de rén de huàihuà。
不要说不在这里的人的坏话。
It is unfair to paint someone black based on their religion.
Lìyòng zōngjiào lái shuō tāmen de huàihuà shì bù gōngpíng de。
利用宗教来说他们的坏话是不公平的。
She badmouths her husband everywhere.
Tā dàochù shuō tā zhàngfu de huàihuà。
她到处说她丈夫的坏话。
When my shoes wear out I go to Wally\'s Shoe Shop to get them re-soled.
鞋穿坏的话，我就会去Wally\'s鞋店把鞋再换个底。
My phone\'s battery has gone bad.
Wǒ diànhuà de diànchí huài le。
我电话的电池坏了。
After hearing the bad news, his voice adopted a sad tone.
Tīngdào nà tiáo huàixiāoxī zhīhòu，tā shuōhuà de shēngyīn dōu biànle，tīng qǐlái dàizhe yìsī āichóu。
听到那条坏消息之后，他说话的声音都变了，听起来带着一丝哀愁。
I think the water broke my phone.
Wǒ rènwéi wǒ de diànhuà jìn shuǐ suǒyǐ huài le。
我认为我的电话进水所以坏了。
My phone busted when I dropped it.
Wǒ de diànhuà shuāi dào dìshàng，chèdǐ huài le。
我的电话摔到地上，彻底坏了。
Don\'t go into waters less than 20 feet deep, or the hull might get damaged.
Bú yào shǐrù shēndù bùzú èrshí yīngchǐ de shuǐyù，fǒuzé de huà，chuánké kěnéng huì bèi sǔnhuài。
不要驶入深度不足20英尺的水域，否则的话，船壳可能会被损坏。
损坏东西要赔，是我们解放军的老规矩。
Sǔnhuài dōngxi yào péi，shì wǒmen jiěfàngjūn de lǎo guīju。
To pay compensation for damage done is an old rule in our PLA.
损坏的东西我一定照价奉赔。
Sǔnhuài de dōngxi wǒ yídìng zhàojià fèngpéi。
I will pay for what I have damaged.
我们对任何东西都要用鼻子嗅一嗅，鉴别其好坏。
Wǒmen duì rènhé dōngxi dōuyào yòngbízi xiùyixiù，jiànbié qí hǎohuài。
We should take a sniff at everything and distinguish the good from the bad.
我把你东西弄坏了，可我已经赔了你钱，这事儿就算扯平了。
It would needlessly bring badness into the world.
Zhè jiāng bú bìyào de bǎ huài dōngxī dàidào shìshàng lái。
这将不必要地把坏东西带到世上来。
It was the boy\'s fault, he\'d spoilt everything.
Zhè shì nàgè nánhái de guòcuò，tā nòng huài le suǒyǒu de dōngxi。
这是那个男孩的过错，他弄坏了所有的东西。

他的想法符合大多数人的观点，那就是涡轮机是一件又吵又破坏自然美的东西。
All they left were a few bruised apples which nobody wanted.
Tāmen liúxià de quánbù dōngxi jiùshì yìxiē méi rén yuànyì yào de pènghuài de píngguǒ。
他们留下的全部东西就是一些没人愿意要的碰坏的苹果。
He\'s not going to be frightened unless we\'ve got something he can\'t argue away.
Tā búhuì bèi xiàhuài，chúfēi wǒmen néng zhǎodào yìxiē tā wúfǎ biànjiě de dōngxi。
他不会被吓坏，除非我们能找到一些他无法辩解的东西。
That bad guy put those sheets, pillowcases, towels, and whatnots in his girlfriend\'s luggage and drove her away.
那个坏男人把一堆床单啊，枕套啊，毛巾啊，等等东西塞进他女朋友的箱子然后把她赶走了。
这个火剪已经坏掉了，夹不起碳来了。
Zhège huǒjiǎn yǐjing huàidiào le，jiábùqǐ tàn lái le。
This pair of fire tongs has been broken, it is no longer useful for holding coal.
这里的下水管道坏掉了，积水已经很深了。
Zhèlǐ de xiàshuǐ guǎndào huàidiào le，jīshuǐ yǐjing hěnshēn le。
The sewer pipe here is broken and there is already too much accumulated water.
火花塞都坏掉了，你还想把车子发动起来？！
Huǒhuāsāi dōu huàidiào le，nǐ hái xiǎng bǎ chēzi fādòng qǐlái？！
You want to start the car when the spark plug is broken?!
改掉坏习气
gǎidiào huài xíqì 
correct bad habits
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
睡懒觉的坏习惯我已经改掉了。
Shuì lǎnjiào de huàixíguàn wǒ yǐjing gǎidiào le。
I\'ve given up the bad habit of getting up late.
电梯忽然掉了下来，吓坏了等电梯的人们。

The elevator suddenly dropped, scaring the people in it.
把十恶不赦的坏家伙收拾掉。

决赛前，坏掉的篮球网已经换成新的了。
The bananas were decaying on the table.

桌子上的香蕉坏掉了。

Zài shíwù huàidiào zhī qián yào yòng wán tāmen。

My homemade bread stales very quickly.

我自制的面包很快就坏掉了。

我正在努力戒掉这个坏习惯。
I decided to break away from my bad habits.

A big block of ice fell down from the roof and broke my car.

We\'ve broken the boom and lost a sail bag over the side.

我们弄坏了起重臂，使得一个帆袋从船的一侧掉落到海里。
Well, I\'ve probably heard worse, but have blocked them from my memory.
Wǒ kěnéng tīngdào guò gèng huài de xiāoxi，dàn wǒ yǐjīng nǔlì bǎ tāmen cóng wǒ de jìyìzhōng mǒdiào le。
我可能听到过更坏的消息，但我已经努力把它们从我的记忆中抹掉了。
一点坏处也没有。
Yìdiǎn huàichù yě méiyǒu。
There\'s no harm in it at all. or There\'s nothing bad about it.
从坏处着想，往好处努力。
Cóng huàichù zhuóxiǎng，wǎng hǎochu nǔlì。
Prepare for the worst; strive for the best.
多喝绿茶没坏处。
Duō hē lǜchá méi huàichù.
There\'s no harm in drinking more green tea.
缺乏睡眠对身体有坏处。
Quēfá shuìmián duì shēntǐ yǒu huàichù.
It\'s bad for you not to get enough sleep.
发现他的绝命书之后，可把全家急坏了，到处找他！
Fāxiàn tā de juémìngshū zhīhòu，kě bǎ quánjiā jíhuài le，dàochù zhǎo tā！
After finding his suicide note, all the family were driven crazy and looked for him everywhere.

chǔxīnjīlǜ de pòhuài gémìngduìwu de tuánjié
be bent on undermining the unity of the revolutionary ranks
坏处
吸烟有很多坏处。
让坏人无处遁藏。
让坏人成为过街老鼠，无处藏身
Apparently it didn\'t do much harm.
显然，这件事没有很大的坏处。
I see no harm in drinking a little red wine.
我觉得喝点红酒没什么坏处。
Nothing bad will come of drinking this.
Hē zhège bú huì yǒu huàichù。
喝这个不会有坏处。
There is no harm in writing English.
Xiě yīngyǔ méiyǒu huàichù。
写英语没有坏处。
There is no harm in disciplining your children.
Yánjiā guǎnjiào nǐ de háizi méiyǒu huàichù。
严加管教你的孩子没有坏处。
break out the foul weather gear
从船上贮藏处取出坏天气船具来使用
His wife is the worst and most insupportable wife since Xanthippe.
他的妻子是自赞蒂普以来最坏、最无法相处的妻子。

Nàxiē lǎo jiànzhù chǔyú xiǔ huài de zhuàngtài。

The garbage disposal was broken.

垃圾处理器坏了。

The beauty of tobacco doesn\'t compare with its devasting effects.

包庇坏人坏事
bāobì huàirénhuàishì 
harbour evildoers and cover up their evil deeds
向坏人坏事作斗争
xiàng huàirén huàishì zuò dòuzhēng
struggle against evildoers and evil deeds
公众要勇敢地揭批坏人坏事。
Gōngzhòng yào yǒnggǎn de jiēpī huàirén huàishì。
The public should expose and criticize evil deeds and people fearless.
败坏名誉
bàihuài míngyù 
discredit; defame
道德败坏
dàodé bàihuài 
morally degenerate
败坏风俗
bàihuài fēngsú 
corrupt morals; exert a bad moral influence
败坏社会风气
bàihuài shèhuì fēngqì 
corrupt social values
他净干坏事，现在可遭报应了。
Tā jìng gàn huàishì，xiànzài kě zāo bàoyìng le。
He\'s getting paid back for all the bad things he\'s done.
他当着面恭维你，背地里净使坏。
Tā dāng zhe miàn gōngwéi nǐ，bèidìlǐ jìng shǐhuài。
He flatters you to your face while playing dirty tricks behind your back.
在一定的条件下坏事能够变成好事。
Zài yídìng de tiáojiàn xià huàishì nénggòu biànchéng hǎo shì。
Under given conditions, bad things can be turned into good things.
铁证如山，那个坏家伙不得不低头认罪。
Tiězhèngrúshān，nàge huài jiāhuo bùdébùdītóu rènzuì。
Confronted with ironclad evidence the scoundrel had to plead guilty.
坏得不得了
huài de bùdéliǎo 
be very bad; couldn\'t be worse
彻头彻尾的坏蛋
chètóuchèwěi de huàidàn 
an out-and-out villain
别把孩子宠坏了。
Bié bǎ háizi chǒnghuài le。
Don\'t spoil the child.
有人在背后出坏点子。
Yǒu rén zài bèihòu chū huài diǎnzi。
Someone is directing the show from behind the scenes.
那本坏书是什么时候出笼的？
Nà běn huài shū shì shénme shíhou chūlóng de? 
When did that filthy book come out?
处心积虑地破坏革命队伍的团结
chǔxīnjīlǜ de pòhuài gémìngduìwu de tuánjié
be bent on undermining the unity of the revolutionary ranks
庄稼长得好坏，也要看活儿的粗细。
Zhuāngjia zhǎng de hǎohuài，yě yào kàn huór de cūxì。
Whether the crops grow well or not depends also on how the work is done.
作最坏的打算
zuò zuì huài de dǎsuàn 
be prepared for the worst
坏人当道，好人受害。
Huàirén dāngdào，hǎorén shòuhài。
When evildoers are in power, good people suffer.
坏人当事，好人倒霉。
Huàirén dāngshì，hǎorén dǎoméi。
When bad people are in control, good people suffer.
提防恐怖主义分子的破坏
dīfáng Kǒngbùzhǔyì fènzǐ de pòhuài 
guard against sabotage by terrorists
改掉坏习气
gǎidiào huài xíqì 
correct bad habits
盯住这个坏蛋。
Dīngzhù zhège huàidàn。
Keep a close watch on the scoundrel.
一开头她吓坏了，后来才定下神来。
Yì kāitóu tā xiàhuài le，hòulái cái dìngxià shén lái。
At first she was terrified, then she pulled herself together.
把她干的那些坏事给大伙抖搂抖搂。
Bǎ tā gàn de nàxiē huàishì gěi dàhuǒ dǒulou dǒulou。
Let everyone know all the wicked things she has done.
可把我饿坏了。
Kě bǎ wǒ èhuài le。
I feel famished. or I\'m starving.
他三下两下就把那个坏蛋放倒了。
Tā sān xià liǎng xià jiù bǎ nà gè huàidàn fàngdǎo le。
With just a few blows, he knocked the hooligan down to the ground.
我们决不冤枉一个好人，也决不放过一个坏人。
Wǒmen jué bùyuānwang yí ge hǎorén，yě jué bùfàngguò yígè huàirén。
We will never wrong a single good person nor let off a single bad one.
把好的和坏的分开
bǎ hǎo de hé huài de fēnkāi
sort out the good ones from the bad
这座在战争中惨遭破坏的城市已经复原。
Zhèzuò zài zhànzhēng zhōng cǎnzāo pòhuài de chéngshì yǐjing fùyuán。
The city, which was destroyed in the war, has been restored.
睡懒觉的坏习惯我已经改掉了。
Shuì lǎnjiào de huàixíguàn wǒ yǐjing gǎidiào le。
I\'ve given up the bad habit of getting up late.
这四个坏家伙勾搭上了。
Zhè sì gè huàijiāhuǒ gōuda shàng le。

鼓捣别人去干坏事
gǔdao bié rén qù gàn huàishì

这些坏事是谁鼓动你干的？
Zhèxiē huàishì shì shuí gǔdòngnǐ gàn de?

别把孩子惯坏了。
Bié bǎ háizi guànhuài le。
Don\'t spoil the child.
损坏东西要赔，是我们解放军的老规矩。
Sǔnhuài dōngxi yào péi，shì wǒmen jiěfàngjūn de lǎo guīju。
To pay compensation for damage done is an old rule in our PLA.
还好，这场大水没有把堤坝冲坏。
Hái hǎo，zhè chǎngdàshuǐ méiyǒu bǎ dībà chōnghuài。
Fortunately, the flood did not break the dyke.

hù\'èbùquān，jìxù zuò huàishì

shēntǐ huài

Tā wèikǒu huài le。
He has lost his appetite.
一点坏处也没有。
Yìdiǎn huàichù yě méiyǒu。

Cóng huàichù zhuóxiǎng，wǎng hǎochu nǔlì。

讲别人坏话
jiǎngbiérén huàihuà

坏事了！

Something terrible has happened.

Tā tài cūxīn le！Jiéguǒ huài le shì。
He was so careless that he made a hash of it.
使坏水
shǐ huàishuǐ

niānrbùjī de mào huàishuǐ

我们都饿坏了，得尽先解决吃饭问题。

他这人真可恨，老在背后说别人的坏话。

他为人刻薄，人缘儿很坏。

Tā píqi hěn huài，érqiě mánbùjiǎnglǐ。
He\'s bad-tempered and wilful.
这台机器坏了，没治了。
Zhètái jīqì huài le，méizhì le。

mínɡshēnɡ hěn huài

他本心并不坏，只是做事方式有问题。

他有个坏习惯，就是当众扣鼻牛儿。

He has a bad habit, picking his nose in public places.

Zhèjiàn cíqì de biānjiǎo bèi kēhuài le。

这次车祸使得车体完全被损坏了。
Zhècì chēhuò shǐdé chētǐ wánquán bèi sǔnhuài le。
The car\'s body was completely destroyed after the accident.
你干这种坏事，早晚吃枪子儿。
Nǐ gàn zhèzhǒng huàishì，zǎowǎn chī qiāngzir。
Do evil things like this, and you will be shot dead some day.
臭氧层不断被破坏，人类的生存环境受到威胁。
Chòuyǎngcéng búduàn bèi pòhuài，rénlèi de shēngcún huánjìng shòudào wēixié。
As the ozone gradually becomes damaged, humankind\'s survival is threatened.
我家的窗机坏了，爸爸决定换个分体式的壁挂机。
Wǒjiā de chuāngjī huài le，bàba juédìng huàn gè fēntǐshì de bìguàjī。
Our window air conditioner is broken, so my father has decided to replace it with a separate hanging air conditioner.
现在社会上吹喇叭抬轿子的人太多了，风气都被搞坏了。
Xiànzài shèhuìshàng chuī lǎbā tái jiàozi de rén tài duō le，fēngqì dōu bèi gǎohuài le。
So many people flatter each other nowadays that the atmosphere of society has been ruined.
这个瓷瓶已经坏了，你们应该尽快更换新的，以免漏电伤人。
Zhège cípíng yǐjing huài le，nǐmen yīnggāi jìnkuài gēnghuàn xīn de，yǐmiǎn lòudiàn shāngrén。
This insulation is damaged. You should change it for a new one as soon as possible so as to prevent people from being hurt by the leakage of electricity.
有的红酒需要倒装，你小心别弄坏了。
Yǒu de hóngjiǔ xūyào dàozhuāng，nǐ xiǎoxīn bié nònghuài le。

我的自行车蹬子坏了。
Wǒ de zìxíngchē dēngzi huài le。
My bicycle pedals are broken.
由于这座地面站遭到了破坏，附近的无线通讯都中断了。
Yóuyú zhèzuò dìmiànzhàn zāodào le pòhuài，fùjìn de wúxiàn tōngxùn dōu zhōng duàn le。
This ground station has been destroyed, so wireless communication nearby has completely broken down.
看你凶神恶煞的样子，都把孩子吓坏了。
Kàn nǐ xiōngshén èshà de yàngzi，dōu bǎ háizi xià huài le。
You look so frightening, and the kids are really scared.
小强被娇惯坏了，稍有不如意就会发泼。
Xiǎo Qiáng bèi jiāoguàn huài le，shāo yǒu bùrúyì jiùhuì fāpō。
Xiao Qiang was spoilt to such an extent that he made a scene whenever he felt unhappy.
他尽干违法的坏事，早晚有一天会翻船！
Tā jìn gàn wéifǎ de huài shì，zǎowǎn yǒu yìtiān huì fānchuán！
He will be caught one day for all his bad deeds.
他绘图用的放大器坏了。
Tā huìtú yòng de fàngdàqì huài le。
His magnifying glass is broken.
这台放像机已经坏了，应该去修理一下了。
Zhètái fàng xiàng jī yǐjing huài le，yīnggāi qù xiūlǐ yíxià le。
This videotape player is broken, we should get it fixed.
损坏的东西我一定照价奉赔。
Sǔnhuài de dōngxi wǒ yídìng zhàojià fèngpéi。
I will pay for what I have damaged.
造成沙尘暴的主要原因是地面覆被严重破坏。
Zàochéng shāchénbào de zhǔyào yuányīn shì dìmiàn fùbèi yánzhòng pòhuài。
The main cause of sand storms is that vegetation has been badly damaged.
改业跳槽对年轻人来说未必是坏事。
Gǎiyè tiàocáo duì niánqīngrén láishuō wèibì shì huàishì。
Occupational changes and job-hopping may not be a bad thing for the young.
新买的台灯隔天就坏了。
Xīnmǎi de táidēng gétiān jiù huài le。
The new reading lamp broke two days after I bought it.
要杜绝人为损坏公用电话的现象。
Yào dùjué rénwéi sǔnhuài gōngyòng diànhuà de xiàn xiàng。
Stop the damage of public telephones.
我的心情坏到极点了，吃什么都寡淡无味。
Wǒ de xīnqíng huàidào jídiǎn le，chī shénme dōu guǎdàn wúwèi。
I was in such a terrible mood that everything was tasteless to me.
官风好坏直接影响了老百姓对政府的信任程度。
Guānfēng hǎohuài zhíjiē yǐngxiǎng le lǎobǎixìng duì zhèngfǔ de xìnrèn chéngdù。
Officials\' style of work has a direct influence towards the common people\'s confidence in the government.
这些虚伪的官绅背地里做尽了坏事。
Zhèxiē xūwěi de guānshēn bèidìlǐ zuòjìn le huàishì。
This hypocritical bureaucrat has done many bad things secretly.
你别光火了，她是好心做坏事。
Nǐ bié guānghuǒ le，tā shì hǎoxīn zuò huàishì。
Don\'t be so angry, her mistake was made out of her good intentions.
这家的少爷从柜上支走很多钱，他父亲都气坏了。
Zhèjiā de shǎoye cóng guì shàng zhīzǒu hěnduō qián，tā fùqīn dōu qì huài le。
He drew a large sum of money from the store, which made his father extremely angry.
这家银行门口的柜员机坏了。
Zhèjiā yínháng ménkǒu de guìyuánjī huài le。
The ATM beside the door of the bank is out of order.
你知道如何判断钢琴音色的好坏吗？
Nǐ zhīdào rúhé pànduàn gāngqín yīnsè de hǎohuài ma？
Do you know how to judge piano timbre?
我家的话机坏了，需要去买一台新的。
Wǒjiā de huàjī huài le，xūyào qù mǎi yìtái xīn de。
Our telephone is broken. We need to buy a new one.
他满肚子坏点子，是个害人精。
Tā mǎndùzi huài diǎnzi，shì gè hàirénjīng。
He has a bellyful of evil ideas, and is a scoundrel.
能办出这种事的人准是个坏种。
Néng bànchū zhèzhǒng shì de rén zhǔn shì gè huàizhǒng。
A person who could do this must be a bad egg.
他做了坏事，心中惶悚，生怕被人知道。
Tā zuò le huàishì，xīn zhōng huángsǒng，shēngpà bèi rén zhīdào。
He panicked because he thought others might learn of the illegal acts he committed.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn zhìshǐ zhèzhǒng zhíwù zāoshòu huǐmièxìng pòhuài。
Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
喝多了酒，会说昏话，有时也会坏了大事。
Hēduō le jiǔ，huì shuō hūnhuà，yǒushí yě huì huài le dàshì。
One raves after drinking too much wine, and sometimes this can even spoil something important.
这个火剪已经坏掉了，夹不起碳来了。
Zhège huǒjiǎn yǐjing huàidiào le，jiábùqǐ tàn lái le。
This pair of fire tongs has been broken, it is no longer useful for holding coal.
这台机器的机体已经损坏，无法修复。
Zhètái jīqì de jītǐ yǐjing sǔnhuài，wúfǎ xiūfù。
The body of this machine has been damaged beyond repair.
这里的下水管道坏掉了，积水已经很深了。
Zhèlǐ de xiàshuǐ guǎndào huàidiào le，jīshuǐ yǐjing hěnshēn le。
The sewer pipe here is broken and there is already too much accumulated water.
你不要被事情的假相所蒙敝，掉入坏人的陷阱里。
Nǐ búyào bèi shìqing de jiǎ xiàng suǒ méngbì，diàorù huàirén de xiànjǐng lǐ。
Keep yourself from being misled by the disguises of bad people, so you won\'t fall into their traps.
他和这帮流氓在一起的时间长了，渐染了一些坏的习气。
Tā hé zhè bāng liúmáng zài yìqǐ de shíjiān cháng le，jiànrǎn le yìxiē huài de xíqì。
Having been together with this group of hooligans, he has developed some bad habits.
发现他的绝命书之后，可把全家急坏了，到处找他！
Fāxiàn tā de juémìngshū zhīhòu，kě bǎ quánjiā jíhuài le，dàochù zhǎo tā！
After finding his suicide note, all the family were driven crazy and looked for him everywhere.
我的牙齿坏了，要去口腔科做检查！
Wǒ de yáchǐ huài le，yào qù kǒuqiāngkē zuò jiǎnchá！
My tooth doesn\'t feel well. I\'ll have an examination in the department of stomatology.
我做的这个箱子很牢实，不会轻易坏的。
Wǒ zuò de zhège xiāngzi hěnláoshí，búhuì qīngyì huài de。
The box I made is sturdy and durable.
他现在已经坏到了老鼠过街人人喊打的地步了。
Tā xiànzài yǐjing huàidào le lǎoshǔ guòjiē rénrén hǎndǎ de dìbù le。
They are now so evil that they are like rats scampering in the street which everybody wants to beat up.
这个络子坏了，线总缠死到里面，你拿去修修吧。
Zhège luòzi huài le，xiàn zǒng chánsǐ dào lǐmian，nǐ náqù xiūxiū ba。
This spindle is broken. The thread always tangles there. Please have it repaired.
亮丑不是坏事，能够刺激我们改正缺点。
Liàngchǒu búshì huàishì，nénggòu cìjī wǒmen gǎizhèng quēdiǎn。
Revealing mistakes is not a bad thing. It can stimulate us to correct our shortcomings.
我们要锁好门窗，谨防坏人溜门撬锁。
Wǒmen yào suǒhǎo ménchuāng，jǐnfáng huàirén liūmén qiàosuǒ。
We should lock doors and windows in order to prevent house-breaking.
裸装运输玻璃器材很容易把器材摔坏。
Luǒzhuāng yùnshū bōli qìcái hěnróngyì bǎ qìcái shuāihuài。
Unwrapped glass equipment is easily broken in transport.
现在这种坏现象已经是蔓草难除了。
Xiànzài zhèzhǒng huài xiàn xiàng yǐjing shì màncǎo nánchú le。
The bad phenomenon is engrained, and will be hard to eradicate.
山上的毛猴儿有的时候下山破坏果树。
Shān shàng de máohóur yǒu de shíhou xiàshān pòhuài guǒshù。
Monkeys on the mountain sometimes descend and destroy fruit trees.
他在倒车的时候不小心撞坏了路边的咪表。
Tā zài dàochē de shíhou bùxiǎoxīn zhuànghuài le lùbiān de mībiǎo。
He carelessly bumped into the parking meter alongside the road while backing his car.
那些说我坏话的人是在侵害我的名誉权！
Nàxiē shuō wǒ huàihuà de rén shì zài qīnhài wǒ de míngyùquán！
Those speaking evil of me infringe on my right of reputation.
明人不做暗事，我怎么会背后说你坏话呢？
Míngrén búzuò ànshì，wǒ zěnme huì bèihòu shuō nǐ huàihuà ne？
An honest person doesn’t do shady things. I never spoke evil of you behind your back.
目光短浅的乱砍滥伐行为，破坏了植被，造成了水土流失。
Mùguāng duǎnqiǎn de luànkǎn lànfá xíngwéi，pòhuài le zhíbèi，zàochéng le shuǐtǔ liúshī。
Short-sighted action of lumbering in a destructive manner destroys vegetation, and causes soil erosion.
他当面佞笑背后使坏，真是个小人！
Tā dāngmiàn nìngxiào bèihòu shǐhuài，zhēnshì gè xiǎorén！
He sycophantically smiles to your face, but then stabs you in the back. He\'s an absolutely villain.
她曾经是个有名的女伶，后因嗓子坏了而退出了舞台。
Tā céngjīng shì gè yǒumíng de nǚlíng，hòu yīn sǎngzi huài le ér tuìchū le wǔtái。
She used to be a famous actress, but she left the stage because she lost her voice.
暖水壶的内胆好像是坏了，开水放进去凉得很快。
Nuǎnshuǐhú de nèidǎn hǎo xiàng shì huài le，kāishuǐ fàngjìnqù liáng de hěnkuài。
The glass liner of the vacuum flask seems to be broken, the boiling water will get cold quickly.
厨房的排气扇坏了，扇叶怎么都不转！
Chúfáng de páiqìshàn huài le，shànyè zěnme dōu búzhuàn！
The ventilator in the kitchen is broken, the vanes don\'t turn freely.
她今天心情很坏，回到家难免把儿子排揎了一通儿。
Tā jīntiān xīnqíng hěnhuài，huídào jiā nánmiǎn bǎ érzi páixuān le yítòngr。
She is in bad mood, it\'s natural that she scolds her son.
这种武器有极大的破坏性。
Zhèzhǒng wǔqì yǒu jídà de pòhuàixìng。
This kind of weapon has great destructiveness.
荧光灯的启动器坏了，难怪灯不亮。
Yíngguāngdēng de qǐdòngqì huài le，nánguài dēng búliàng。
The starter of the fluorescent lamp has broken, no wonder the lamp failed.
这个车轮子的气门芯坏了，根本就打不进气去。
Zhège chēlúnzi de qìménxīn huài le，gēnběn jiù dǎbújìnqì qù。
The valve tube of the tire has broken, I can\'t pump any gas into it at all.
他刻苦练习冰球，不知用坏了多少球刀。
Tā kèkǔ liànxí bīngqiú，bùzhī yònghuài le duōshǎo qiúdāo。
He practices ice hockey hard, nobody knows how many hockey blades he has worn out.
我这个箱子的屈戌儿坏了。
Wǒ zhège xiāngzi de qūxūr huài le。
The metal fastening of my box is broken.
热膨胀效应经常会造成一些机器的损坏。
Rèpéngzhàng xiàoyìng jīngcháng huì zàochéng yìxiē jīqì de sǔnhuài。
Heat effect often leads to damage to some machines.
今年的洪水冲坏了无数桑田，真让人痛心。
Jīnnián de hóngshuǐ chōnghuài le wú shù sāngtián，zhēn ràng rén tòngxīn。
This year, the flood has damaged innumerable mulberry fields, which is quite distressing.
他已经在这座山上作了两年山大王，干了很多抢劫的坏事。
Tā yǐjing zài zhèzuò shān shàng zuò le liǎng nián shāndàiwang，gàn le hěnduō qiǎngjié de huàishì。
He has been the head of a group of outlaws on this mountain for two years, and has robbed others many times.
纪念碑的上部已经被严重损坏，需要进行修补了。
Jìniànbēi de shàngbù yǐjing bèi yánzhòng sǔnhuài，xūyào jìnxíng xiūbǔ le。
The upper part of the monument has been seriously broken, and needs to be repaired.
这台摄像机的摄像管损坏了，要更换一个新的。
Zhètái shè xiàng jī de shè xiàng guǎn sǔnhuài le，yào gēnghuàn yígè xīn de。
The vidicon of this video camera is broken. We need a new one.
乱砍乱伐会破坏整个自然环境的生态平衡。
Luànkǎn luànfá huì pòhuài zhěnggè zìrán huánjìng de shēngtài pínghéng。
Indiscriminate felling of trees will destroy the ecological balance of nature.
十年动乱期间，曾有许多艺术品遭到毁坏。
Shí nián dòngluàn qījiān，céng yǒu xǔduō yìshùpǐn zāodào huǐhuài。
Many works of art were destroyed during the ten years of turmoil.
好像收报机坏了，无法收报！
Hǎo xiàng shōubàojī huài le，wúfǎ shōubào！
It seems that the telegraph receiver is broken and can\'t receive telegraphs.
这个作恶多端的坏蛋，死了都没人给他收尸！
Zhège zuòè duōduān de huàidàn，sǐ le dōu méi rén gěi tā shōushī！
This rascal who committed numerous crimes won\'t have anyone pick up his dead body after his death!
我家的双缸洗衣机已经快坏了。
Wǒjiā de shuānggāng xǐyījī yǐjing kuài huài le。
The double cylinder washing machine at my home is almost broken now.
空凋不知为什么不送风了，是不是坏了？
Kōngtiáo bùzhī wèishénme bú sòngfēng le，shìbushì huài le？
The air-conditioner doesn\'t blow air for some unknown reason. Has it broken down?
他毁坏公物，我们将依法向他索偿。
Tā huǐhuài gōngwù，wǒmen jiāng yīfǎ xiàng tā suǒcháng。
He destroyed some public property, for which we will ask him to compensate according to the law.
别看台风那么有破坏力，台风眼却是异常平静的。
Biékàn táifēng nàme yǒu pòhuàilì，táifēngyǎn què shì yìcháng píngjìng de。
Though typhoons are destructive, a typhoon\'s eye is not.
这座铁索桥遭到了严重的破坏，已经不能使用了。
Zhèzuò tiěsuǒqiáo zāodào le yánzhòng de pòhuài，yǐjing bùnéng shǐyòng le。
The chain bridge has been severely damaged and can\'t be used any longer.
他们两个经常聚在一起干坏事，真是“物以类聚，人以群分”！
Tāmén liǎnggè jīngcháng jùzài yìqǐ gàn huàishì，zhēnshì“wùyǐlèijù，rényǐqúnfēn”！
The two of them often get together to plot bad things, like attacking us!
细菌战的破坏性可能远大于常规战争。
Xìjūnzhàn de pòhuàixìng kěnéng yuǎn dàyú chángguī zhànzhēng。
Biological warfare can cause far more damage than ordinary wars.
电梯忽然掉了下来，吓坏了等电梯的人们。
Diàntī hūrán diào le xiàlái，xiàhuài le děng diàntī de rénmén。
The elevator suddenly dropped, scaring the people in it.
他在巡捕房当过差，不过没做过什么坏事。
Tā zài xúnbǔfáng dāng guò chāi，búguò méi zuòguò shénme huàishì。
He worked in the police station in the former foreign concessions, but he didn\'t do anything wrong.
巡抚大人好坏不分，不算清官。
Xúnfǔ dàrén hǎohuài bùfēn，búsuàn qīngguān。
The imperial inspector cannot be called a good official because he cannot tell good from bad.
压力表坏了，你有时间再去买一只。
Yālìbiǎo huài le，nǐ yǒu shíjiān zài qù mǎi yì zhī。
The pressure gauge is broken. Buy another one when you have time.
轧道车坏了，赶快找人来修。
Zhádàochē huài le，gǎnkuài zhǎo rén lái xiū。
The line inspection trolley has broken down, have it fixed.
车间的轧棉机坏了，你能不能找人修理一下呢。
Chējiān de yàmiánjī huài le，nǐ néngbunéng zhǎo rén xiūlǐ yíxià ne。
The saw tooth-type cotton gin has broken down, can you find someone to fix it?
严查违禁药品，不能让坏人逍遥法外。
Yánchá wéijìn yàopǐn，bùnéng ràng huàirén xiāoyáo fǎwài。
Illegal medicine should be investigated strictly and those who break the law should be punished.
这个房子的檐漏已经损坏了，需要修理一下。
Zhège fángzi de yánlòu yǐjing sǔnhuài le，xūyào xiūlǐ yíxià。
The eaves on the roof have broken, they need repair.
地震把屋子里的羊眼给震坏了。
Dìzhèn bǎ wūzi lǐ de yángyǎn gěi zhènhuài le。
The earthquake broke the screw eye in the house.
窑顶坏了，要抓紧时间修理才不影响生产啊。
Yáodǐng huài le，yào zhuājǐn shíjiān xiūlǐ cái bùyǐngxiǎng shēngchǎn a。
The roof of the cave dwelling is damaged, we should mend it soon so that it won\'t affect production.
轮椅上的摇把坏了，你找人修一下吧 。
Lúnyǐ shàng de yáobǎ huài le，nǐ zhǎo rén xiū yíxià ba。
The crank of the wheelchair is broken, ask someone to repair it.
进贡者玼玼地抱着玉花瓶，生怕不小心摔坏了贡品。
Jìngòngzhě cīcī de bào zhe yùhuāpíng，shēngpà bùxiǎoxīn shuāihuài le gòngpǐn。
The person paying tribute to the emperor holds the jade flower vase carefully, fearing to accidentally break it.
乡里专门组织了护林队保护幼林不被破坏。
Xiāng lǐ zhuānmén zǔzhī le hùlínduì bǎohù yòulín búbèi pòhuài。
The country has organized a designated forest protection brigade to protect young growth from being damaged.
北阳台窗子上的雨搭坏了，要找人修修。
Běi yángtái chuāngzi shàng de yǔdā huài le，yào zhǎo rén xiūxiū。
The rain shelter on the window of the north balcony is broken; we should find someone to repair it.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yào cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshǐlín，fángzhǐ shēngtài zāodào pòhuài。
We should take effective measures to protect the primitive forest and prevent the ecology from damage.
原子武器由于具有极大的破坏性而被禁用。
Yuánzǐ wǔqì yóuyú jùyǒu jídà de pòhuàixìng ér bèi jìnyòng。
Atomic weapons are forbidden because of their hugely destructive effects.
圆盘耙坏了，快去找个人来修一修吧！
Yuánpánpá huài le，kuàiqù zhǎo gè rén lái xiūyixiū ba！
The disc harrow is broken; go and find someone to repair it immediately.
家里的灶火坏了，没办法做饭了。
Jiā lǐ de zàohuǒ huài le，méi bànfǎ zuòfàn le。
The cooking stove at home is broken so that we can\'t cook any more.
他汽车前面的照明灯坏了。
Tā qìchē qiánmiàn de zhàomíngdēng huài le。
The front light of his car is broken.
这件事折衷来看，并不是件坏事。
Zhèjiànshì zhé zhōng láikàn，bìng búshì jiàn huàishì。
Judging from a compromised point of view, this is not totally a bad thing.
车间里的蒸汽锤坏了，导致工程进度放慢。
Chējiān lǐ de zhēngqìchuí huài le，dǎozhì gōngchéng jìndù fàngmàn。
Production has slowed because the steam hammer is broken.
由于整流器坏了，电灯不亮了。
Yóuyú zhěngliúqì huài le，diàndēng búliàng le。
As the rectifier is broken, the electric light can\'t be turned on any more.
被损坏的风车吱吱嘎嘎地响个不停。
Bèi sǔnhuài de fēngchē zhīzhīgāgā de xiǎng gè bùtíng。
The broken windmill is creaking.
小小的跖骨损坏可能会造成严重的后果 。
Xiǎoxiǎo de zhígǔ sǔnhuài kěnéng huì zàochéng yánzhòng de hòuguǒ。
A small damage to the metatarsal bones may have serious consequences.
电脑半天没有反应，我只当它坏了。
Diànnǎo bàntiān méiyǒu fǎnyìng，wǒ zhǐdāng tā huài le。
The computer hasn\'t shown any reactions, so I thought that it was broken.
他总是指名道姓地说人家坏话。
Tā zǒngshì zhǐmíng dàoxìng dì shuō rénjia huàihuà。
He always mention names when speaking ill of others.
你这样粗心，会把文件皱折坏的！
Nǐ zhèyàng cūxīn，huì bǎ wénjiàn zhòuzhé huài de！
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
这台显微镜在装车的时候不小心被损坏了。
Zhètái xiǎnwēijìng zài zhuāngchē de shíhou bùxiǎoxīn bèi sǔnhuài le。
This microscope was accidentally broken after being put in the truck.
老爷子不允许他娶自己心爱的姑娘是怕坏了宗祧。
Lǎoyézi bùyǔnxǔ tā qǔ zìjǐ xīnài de gūniang shì pà huài le zōngtiāo。
The old master didn\'t allow him to marry the girl he loved because that would disrupt the family line.
他的坐椅坏了，今天下午去买了把新的。
Tā de zuòyǐ huài le，jīntiān xiàwǔ qù mǎi le bǎ xīn de。
His chair was broken, so he bought a new one this afternoon.
他第一次开车，就把汽车的反光镜给碰坏了。
Tā dìyícì kāichē，jiù bǎ qìchē de fǎnguāngjìng gěi pèng huài le。
He broke the reflector of his car the first time he drove.
火花塞都坏掉了，你还想把车子发动起来？！
Huǒhuāsāi dōu huàidiào le，nǐ hái xiǎng bǎ chēzi fādòng qǐlái？！
You want to start the car when the spark plug is broken?!
前面路口的交通信号灯坏了。
Qiánmiàn lùkǒu de jiāotōng xìnhàodēng huài le。
The traffic lights at the crossing don\'t work.
这种现象的好坏，也没有明确的临界点进行判断。

hǎo（huài）zhàotou

Gāi shěngchéngdān yuánjiàn Fēizhōu sìgè guójiā de tángchǎng。
The province has undertaken to provide assistance for building sugar refineries in four African countries.
东京是总统此次亚洲之行的第二站。
Dōngjīngshì zǒngtǒngcǐ cì Yàzhōu zhī xíng de dì\'èr zhàn。
Tokyo is the President\'s second stop on his Asia trip.
我叔叔在澳洲拥有一个私人牧场。
Wǒ shūshu zài Àozhōu yōngyǒu yígè sīrén mùchǎng。
My uncle has a farm in Australia.
我们去欧洲参观了几座历史悠久的道院。
Wǒmen qù Ōuzhōu cānguān le jǐ zuò lìshǐ yōujiǔ de dàoyuàn。
We visited some old, historical abbeys in Europe.
出访欧洲五国的考察团已于今日返抵北京。
Chūfǎng Ōuzhōu wǔguó de kǎochátuán yǐ yú jīnrì fǎndǐ Běijīng。
The delegation returned to Beijing after their visit to five European countries.
这个航空公司首度放飞欧洲航线。
Zhège hángkōng gōngsī shǒudù fàngfēi Ōuzhōu hángxiàn。
The airline company launched a European route for the first time.
据报道，欧洲足坛群雄蜂起，精彩赛事接连不断。
Jù bàodào，Ōuzhōu zútán qúnxióng fēngqǐ，jīngcǎi sàishì jiēlián búduàn。
It is reported that European football games are getting more and more exciting as many new stars emerge.
这名钢鼓乐手来自非洲。
Zhè míng gānggǔ yuèshǒu láizì Fēizhōu。
The steel drum player comes from Africa.
黑种人主要分布于非洲等地。
Hēizhǒng rén zhǔyào fēnbùyú Fēizhōu děng dì。
Black people dwell mainly in African.
欧洲有类似于红土的土壤存在。
Ōuzhōu yǒu lèisìyú hóngtǔ de tǔrǎng cúnzài。
In Europe, there exists the soil similar to laterite.
科学家研究了一种生态治理模式能让荒滩变为绿洲。
Kēxuéjiā yánjiū le yìzhǒng shēngtài zhìlǐ móshì néng ràng huāngtān biànwéi lǜzhōu。
Scientists have studied on a zoology fathering mode which can turn deserted bottomland into an oasis.
这首诗的颈联是“三山半落青天外，二水中分白鹭洲。”
Zhèshǒushī de jǐnglián shì“sān shān bànluò qīngtiān wài，èr shuǐ zhōng fēn báilù zhōu。”
The fifth and sixth lines of this poem are, &quot;Three mountains lie far under the blue sky, two lakes divide the white egret island.&quot;
他长了个欧洲人的脸型。
Tā zhǎng le gè Ōuzhōurén de liǎnxíng。
He has a European face.
这次欧洲旅行，我们拍摄了许多关于阿尔卑斯山南麓的风景照片。
Zhècì Ōuzhōu lǚxíng，wǒmen pāishè le xǔduō guānyú Ā\'ěrbēisīshān nánlù de fēngjǐng zhàopiàn。
In the journey to Europe, we took many pictures of the Alps scenery.
从电视新闻中看到，非洲难民营里的孩子真可怜。
Cóng diànshì xīnwén zhōng kàndào，Fēizhōu nànmínyíng lǐ de háizi zhēn kělián。
The African children in refuge camps shown on TV news miserable.
中国残疾人艺术团首访欧洲即获成功。

The first visit of China\'s Art Group of the Disabled to Europe was a success.
参加今天舞会的朋友来自五洲四海。

Friends from all over the world took part in today\'s ball.

Zhōnghuá xióngfēng wēizhèn jiǔzhōu dàdì。
The grand appearance of China thrills the whole world.
叔叔刚刚请人从欧洲带回一枝名贵的渔竿。

Uncle just asked someone to bring back an expensive fishing rod.
台湾、香港、韩国、新加坡被誉为亚洲四小龙。
Táiwān、Xiānggǎng、Hánguó、Xīnjiāpō bèi yùwéi yàzhōu sì xiǎo lóng。
Taiwan, Hong Kong, Korea and Singapore are praised as the four rising powers of Asia.
洲际导弹的杀伤性极强。
Zhōujì dǎodàn de shāshāngxìng jí qiáng。
The intercontinental missiles have extremely strong antipersonnel power.
面对亚洲金融危机，公司拿出了预案，并启动了自保计划。
Miànduì yàzhōu jīnróng wēijī，gōngsī ná chū le yùàn，bìng qǐdòng le zìbǎo jìhuà。
Faced with the Asian financial crisis, the company worked out a preliminary plan and initiated its self-protection scheme.
国家主席前些日子访问了非洲很多国家。
Guójiā zhǔxí qián xiē rìzi fǎngwèn le Fēizhōu hěnduō guójiā。
Over the past few days, the President of China has visited many countries in Africa.
近年，许多非洲国家的综合国力在不断上升。
Jìnnián，xǔduō Fēizhōu guójiā de zōnghé guólì zài búduàn shàngshēng。
Recently, the overall national strength of many African countries has continually increased.
大公国出现于欧洲中世纪封建割据时期。
Dàgōngguó chūxiàn yú ōuzhōu zhōngshìjì fēngjiàngējù shíqī。
The Grand Duchy appeared in the feudal separation period during middle ages in Europe.
亚欧大陆桥是我国连接欧洲的大通道。
Yà‘ōu dàlùqiáo shì wǒguó liánjiē ōuzhōu de dà tōngdào。
The land bridge between Asia and Europe is the main passage connecting China and Europe.
共同市场作为世界一体化程度最高的合作组织，使欧洲各国的经济交往和市场行为日益完善。
Gòngtóngshìchǎng zuòwéi Shìjièyìtǐhuà chéngdù zuìgāo de hézuòzǔzhī，shǐ Ōuzhōugèguó de jīngjìjiāowǎng hé shìchǎngxíngwéi rìyì wánshàn。
As a cooperative organization that represents the highest level of international integration, the common market is gradually improving and perfecting the economic contacts and market behaviors of all European countries.
卢旺达是非洲的一个内陆国。
Lúwàngdá shì Fēizhōu de yígè nèilùguó。
Rwanda is an inland country in Africa.
由于河流的长期冲积，这里形成了一个三角洲地带。
Yóuyú héliú de chángqī chōngjī，zhèli xíngchéngle yígè Sānjiǎozhōudìdài。
Because of the accumulation of sludge over a long period, a delta formed here.
丝绸之路为我国早期与欧洲地区的经济文化交流做出了不可磨灭的贡献。
Sīchóuzhīlù wéi wǒguó zǎoqī yǔ ōuzhōu dìqū de jīngjì wénhuà jiāoliú zuòchūle búkěmómiè de gòngxiàn。
The Silk Road made indelible contributions to the economic and cultural communication between Europe and our country in early years.

For centuries, the Africans traded with the European merchants.

It is his first visit to Europe as the president.

They wear traditional African wedding clothes.

我酷爱冒险，这就是我去年到非洲去的原因。
If you go to Africa, you will probably meet lions or other scary animals on your way.
如果你去非洲，在路上你可能会遇到狮子或者其它吓人的动物。
I\'ll go for a Safari in Africa after my wedding.
婚后我会去非洲旅行。

如果可能一定要来非洲看我，那将是一段难忘的经历。
You shouldn\'t forget your African roots are a part of you.
你不应该忘记你还有一部分非洲血统。
There is a new African restaurant down the street, why don\'t we try it?
街边有一家新开的非洲餐馆，我们去尝尝吧！
Africans have always been victims of racist acts.
非洲人一直都是种族歧视行为的受害者。
I have a lot of African friends and I love them because of their vitality.
我有很多非洲朋友，他们的活力让我为之着迷。
We are trying to face the shortage of food in Africa, but it will take great efforts from everybody.
我们正努力解决非洲的食物匮乏问题，但这需要每个人付出巨大的努力。
Agriculture in Europe and the US is no longer based on traditional methods.
欧洲和美国的农业不在基于传统方式耕种了。
Eurostar does not have a baggage weight limit.
“欧洲之星”没有行李限重的规定。
These funds will ensure some African people at least an economic base.
这些基金至少会保证一部分非洲人获得基本的经济保障。
Shanghai is a great base for traveling in Asia.
上海是进行亚洲之旅的首选出发地。
Many African people have only the basics of survival. It\'s absolutely unbelievable.
很多非洲人只有维持生存的基本条件，这太难以置信了。
Students from all Asian countries can apply to get that scholarship.
来自亚洲所有国家的学生都可以申请那种奖学金。
I love Africa. There, it\'s not strange seeing big scaring lions walking all along the road.
我喜爱非洲。在那儿看到吓人的大狮子走在路上根本不足为奇。
Somebody told me you are going to travel around Asia next Summer, aren\'t you?
有人跟我说你打算明年夏天环游亚洲，是吗？
I\'ve always loved Asia, that\'s why I live in China right now.
我一直对亚洲怀有深厚的感情，这就是我现在居住在中国的原因。
I want to spend more than five years in Asia traveling.
我想至少花五年的时间游遍亚洲。
Recently, Asian food has become very popular.
最近，亚洲食物变得越来越流行了。
My wife is Asian. She was born in Tokyo but when she was five years old their parents moved to Brazil.
我的妻子是亚洲人。她生在东京，但在5岁时随父母搬到了巴西。
When I was in Africa, I had to cross so many huge banks of sand.
在非洲时，我总得穿过很多巨大的沙堆。
Have you ever been to Europe before?
你以前去过欧洲吗？
You might like to join me during my business trip through Asia.
你也许愿意和我一同到亚洲出差。
Last year was really bad for the motor industry in Europe.
去年，欧洲的机动车市场很不景气。
He journeyed for three months around Asia.
他在亚洲旅游了3个月。
We were kicking around Asia all summer.
我们整个夏天都在亚洲漫游。
Lack of food is a problem affecting a lot of African countries.
缺少食物是困扰许多非洲国家的大问题。
Everybody can do something to fight against the mass starvation in Africa.
每个人都能为解决非洲大规模的饥饿问题做点儿贡献。
Plenty of natives became Europeans\' servants.
许多土著居民成了欧洲人的佣人。
The rise of AIDS and other deadly diseases along with armed conflicts and social tension make treating leprosy in Africa difficult.
在非洲，武装冲突、社会动荡外加上艾滋病和其它致命疾病的激增使得治愈麻风病变得非常困难。
It led to a severe lack of food and economic ruin in many areas, especially in Africa.
这在很多地区，尤其是非洲，引发了严重的食物短缺和经济崩溃问题。
Socialism is one important line of political thinking in Europe, as well as liberalism and conservatism.
与自由主义和保守主义一样，社会主义也属于欧洲政治思想体系中的重要一支。
The tales he tells about his life in Africa are mostly true.
他讲自己在非洲的那些经历大都是真的。
This actor is second in the top-ten list of Asia\'s richest men.
这名男演员在亚洲富人前十名的排行榜中名列第二。
There seems to be no cure for Africa\'s social ills.
非洲的社会问题似乎没有任何解决之道。
Long time ago he traveled through Europe without let.
很久以前他曾畅游了欧洲。
The Waldseemuller map is considered the first map of America.
瓦尔德泽米勒所绘制的地图被认为是最早的美洲地图。
He is the president of a small African country.
他是一个非洲小国的总统。
He looks Asian but he is holding a French passport.
他看起来是亚洲人的样子，却持法国护照。
That belongs to the people of Africa.
那个是属于非洲人民的。
When I finish school, I\'ll move to Europe.
我完成学业以后会搬到欧洲去。
Any European could join the ceremony except for the English.
除了英国人，其他国家的欧洲人都可以参加这次典礼。
I traveled around Europe last year.
去年我环游了欧洲。
Germany is part of Continental Europe.
德国是欧洲大陆的一部分。
The restaurant was full of Europeans.
餐馆里全是欧洲人。
Europeans love tropical countries.

She works for the European Languages Department.
她在欧洲语言学系工作。
Many countries in Asia, for example China and Thailand, have a lot of tourists throughout the year.
很多亚洲国家，比如中国、泰国，全年都会接待大量游客。
She took a trip to the far east of Asia.
她踏上了前往亚洲远东的旅程。
This species is only found in South America.
这个物种只存在于南美洲。
They accepted any European but French.
除了法国人，他们接纳其他各国的欧洲人。
When I went to Africa, I had to boil the water before drinking it.
去了非洲后，我必须把水煮沸才可以喝。
This week there will be a broad discussion about the development of some Asian countries.
这个星期，就一些亚洲国家的发展问题会有一场广泛讨论。
While traveling through Asia, I saw many poachers cage tigers.
在亚洲旅行过程中，我看到许多偷猎者将老虎装进了笼子。
She is considered one of the best pop singers in Asia.
她被认为是亚洲最出色的流行歌手之一。

世界上共有七个大洲。
It\'s incredible to think that you are now living on another continent.
很难想象你现在生活在另一个洲呢。
She studied on the continent.
她在欧洲学习过。
We don\'t go to the continent frequently.
我们不经常去欧洲内陆。

亚洲最常见的农作物是水稻。

Asian food is delicious.
亚洲美食很是诱人。

The exploitation of Africa has continued unabated for centuries.

You should write a book about your exploits while living in Asia.
你应把自己在亚洲的奇遇编成一本书。
Europe\'s force has become more powerful since its unification.
统一后的欧洲变得更为强大了。
Germany is a continental European country.
德国是欧洲大陆上的一个国家。
Since the formation of a specialist buyout team in 2000, we have pioneered buyout investment in Asia.
自2000年成立专业收购组以来，我们就一直致力于在亚洲进行收购投资。
In Europe, the health insurance and banking industries use smart cards extensively.
在欧洲，健康保险和银行都在广泛使用智能卡。
Dengue, filariasis, leishmaniasis, onchocerciasis, and American trypanosomiasis (Chagas disease) are other diseases carried by insects.
登革热病、丝虫病、黑热病、盘尾丝虫病及美洲锥虫病（查格斯病）也是由昆虫传播的疾病。
The People\'s Republic of China is situated in the eastern part of the Asian continent on the western coast of the Pacific.
中华人民共和国位于亚洲东部、太平洋西岸。
The cinema is an important sector of the European audio-visual industry.
电影是欧洲视听产业的一个重要组成部分。
Kim\'s gerbera garden is a riot of color every spring.
每年春天，金花园里的非洲菊就开得色彩缤纷，美不胜收。
They\'ve copied the design from the European model.
他们的设计仿照的是欧洲的款式。
This painting is only a copy,  the original hangs in a European museum.
这幅画只是一份赝品，原作挂在欧洲的一家博物馆中。
I\'m going to visit some European countries next summer.
明年夏天我想去几个欧洲国家游玩。

美洲方块舞的鼻祖是英国的莫里斯舞。
The War Dance takes on many different names from North America\'s various tribes.

他讲自己在非洲的那些经历大都是真的。

他是一个非洲小国的总统。

flick the dust off a hat
弹钢琴
tán gāngqín
play the piano
弹琵琶
tán pípá
pluck the pipa
球从篮板上弹回来。
Qiú cóng lánbǎn shàng tán huílái。
The ball rebounded from the backboard.
从跳板上弹起来
cóng tiàobǎn shàng tán qǐlái
leap from the springboard
保险弹簧
bǎoxiǎn tánhuáng
relief spring
失去弹力的橡皮圈
shīqù tánlì de xiàng píquān
a perished rubber band
弹射利病
tánshèlìbìng
pick faults
弹跳力好
tántiàolì hǎo
have a lot of spring
又软又有弹性的地毯
yòu ruǎn yòu yǒu tánxìng de dìtǎn
soft and springy carpets
这种毛弹性大，拉力强。
Zhèzhǒng máo tánxìng dà，lālì qiáng。
This wool possesses high resilience and tensile strength.
球的弹性符合标准。
Qiú de tánxìng fúhé biāozhǔn。
The balls reach the specifications for bounce.
弹指光阴
tánzhǐguāngyīn
time zipping by
弹指又过了三四年。
Tánzhǐ yòu guò le sān sì nián。
So another three or four years quickly passed.
填平弹坑
tiánpíngdànkēng
fill up bomb craters
跳弹轰炸
tiàodàn hōngzhà 
ricochet bombing; skip bombing
投手榴弹
tóu shǒuliúdàn 
throw a hand grenade
投掷标枪 (铁饼、手榴弹)
tóuzhì biāoqiāng（tiěbǐng、shǒuliúdàn）
throw a javelin (discus, hand grenade)
土造手榴弹
tǔzào shǒuliúdàn 
grenades of local make
把子弹推上膛
bǎ zǐdàn tuīshàngtáng
ram a cartridge into the rifle chamber
把子弹退出来
bǎ zǐdàn tuìchūlái 
remove a cartridge from the breech of a gun; unload a gun
瓦斯弹
wǎsī dàn 
gas bomb; gas shell
外层空间导弹
wàicéngkōngjiān dǎodàn 
outer-space missile
枪弹的啸声
qiāngdàn de xiàoshēng
the whistling of bullets
她抱起琵琶，信手弹来，竟十分动听。
Tā bàoqǐ pípá，xìnshǒu tánlái，jìngshífēn dòngtīng。
She took up the pipa and began to play, effortlessly and melodiously.
弹性形变
tánxìngxíngbiàn
elastic deformation
寻的导弹
xúndì dǎodàn
homing missile
哑弹
yǎdàn
dud
饮弹身亡
yǐndàn shēnwáng
be killed by a bullet
她弹的竖琴优雅动听。
Tā tán de shùqín yōuyǎ dòngtīng。
She played the harp beautifully.
炸弹坑
zhàdànkēng
bombcrater; crater
进行真枪实弹的演习
jìnxíngzhēnqiāngshídàn de yǎnxí 
conduct exercises (or manoeuvres) with live ammunition
制导炸弹
zhìdǎo zhàdàn 
guided bomb
掷手榴弹
zhì shǒuliúdàn 
throw a grenade
中程导弹
zhōngchéng dǎodàn 
intermediate-range missile; medium-range missile
步枪子弹
bùqiāngzǐdàn 
rifle bullet
汽枪子弹
qìqiāngzǐdàn 
air-gun pellet
练习子弹
liànxí zǐdàn 
dummy cartridge
导弹自毁
dǎodàn zìhǔi
missile self-destruction
燃烧弹
ránshāodàn
incendiary bomb
弹劾
tánhé
impeach (a public official)
弹性
tánxìng
elasticity; resilience; spring
这个音响炸弹威力十足。
Zhège yīnxiǎngzhàdàn wēilìshízú。
她刚开始学琴，这首曲子弹得半生不熟。
Tā gāng kāishǐ xué qín，zhè shǒu qǔzi tán de bànshēng bùshú。
She just began learning the piano, so she\'s only half-familiar with this tune.
这种新型子弹头能够穿甲。
Zhèzhǒng xīnxíng zǐdàntóu nénggòu chuānjiǎ。
This new type of bullet can pierce armor.
她结婚的时候请了个乐队，吹打弹唱的，特别热闹。
Tā jiéhūn de shíhou qǐng le gè yuèduì，chuīdǎ tánchàng de，tèbié rènào。
She hired a band when getting married and it was very lively with the band playing the instruments.
敌军已经到了弹尽援绝的境地。
Díjūn yǐjing dào le dànjìn yuánjué de jìngdì。
The enemies have run out of ammunition and provisions.
这棵树上的弹孔是那几个猎人留下的。
Zhè kē shù shàng de dànkǒng shì nà jǐgè lièrén liúxià de。
The bullet holes in the tree were made by several hunters.
在这场点球大战中，他所在的球队竟然弹无虚发。
Zài zhèchǎng diǎnqiú dàzhàn zhōng，tā suǒ zài de qiúduì jìngrán dànwú xūfā。
His team made ever kick count during the penalty kick match.
弹着点正好击中目标。
Dànzháodiǎn zhènghǎo jīzhòng mùbiāo。
The point of the impact just shoots the goal.
这个防盗门安有弹子锁。
Zhège fángdàomén ānyǒu dànzǐsuǒ。
This anti-theft door has a spring lock.
他们弹着冬不拉，唱着欢快的民歌。
Tāmen tán zhe dōngbùlā，chàng zhe huānkuài de míngē。
They played the tamboura as they were singing happily.
子弹穿过墙壁，留下了一个洞眼儿。
Zǐdàn chuānguò qiángbì，liúxià le yígè dòngyǎnr。
A bullet went through the wall, leaving a hole on it.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
那个足球撞到墙上之后，又因为反冲力而回弹到了一楼人家的窗玻璃上。
nàge zúqiú zhuàng dào qiáng shàng zhīhòu，yòu yīnwèi fǎn chōnglì ér huítán dào le yī lóu rénjia de chuāng bōli shàng。
Due to the rebounding force, the football hit a window after bouncing against the wall.
这款新型防弹衣穿着很方便。
Zhè kuǎn xīnxíng fángdànyī chuān zhe hěn fāngbiàn。
This new type of bulletproof vest is easy to wear.
这首乐曲是用凤凰琴弹奏出来的。
Zhèshǒu yuèqǔ shì yòng fènghuángqín tánzòu chūlái de。
This piece of music is played with an ancient musical instrument.
他一边弹古琴一边歌吟《阳关三叠》。
Tā yìbiān tán gǔqín yìbiān gēyín《Yángguānsāndié》。
He sang &quot;Yang Guan San Die&quot; while he played the ancient Chinese zither.
这些弹药都是供应舰补给的。
Zhèxiē dànyào dōushì gōngyìngjiàn bǔjǐ de。
These ammunitions are all furnished by the supply vessel.
为了防止海匪的袭击，每个人都荷枪实弹，严阵以待。
Wèile fángzhǐ hǎifěi de xíjī，měigèrén dōu héqiāng shídàn，yánzhèn yǐdài。
Everyone is at attention at their stations with live ammunitions in order to prevent pirate attacks.
核弹爆炸后会产生蘑菇云。
Hédàn bàozhà hòu huì chǎnshēng mógūyún。
Mushroom clouds appear after nuclear explosions.
这是艘导弹护卫艇。
Zhè shì sōu dǎodàn hùwèití。
This is a missile convoy.
他在这个单位一直被人饥弹，实在干不下去了。
Tā zài zhège dānwèi yìzhí bèi rén jīdàn，shízai gàn bú xiàqù le。
He has always been criticized in this company, so he really couldn\'t go on working here any longer.
这种导弹安装了最先进的激光制导设备。
Zhèzhǒng dǎodàn ānzhuāng le zuì xiānjìn de jīguāng zhìdǎo shèbèi。
This missile has been equipped with the most advanced lasers to control and guide it.
老人滑了一跤，僵直地躺在地上难以动弹。
Lǎorén huá le yìjiāo，jiāngzhí de tǎngzài dìshàng nányǐ dòngtán。
The old man lay stiff on the ground after slipping.
敌军发射了三枚空对空导弹。
Díjūn fāshè le sān méi kōng duì kōng dǎodàn。
The enemy launched three air-to-air missiles.
他的弹跳很好，可以抓到篮筐。
Tā de tántiào hěnhǎo，kěyǐ zhuādào lánkuāng。
He bounces high and can catch the ring hoop.
警察在他们的老窝中发现了十几支手枪和几百发子弹。
Jǐngchá zài tāmen de lǎowō zhōng fāxiàn le shí jǐ zhī shǒuqiāng hé jǐ bǎi fā zǐdàn。
The police found more than ten guns, and several hundred bullets in their nest.
我国两弹一星的研制成功大大提升了我国的国际地位。
Wǒ guó liǎngdàn yìxīng de yánzhì chénggōng dàdà tíshēng le wǒguó de guójì dìwèi。
The successful development of the atom bomb, h-bomb and manmade satellites has greatly exalted our country\'s international status.
他感到四肢不能动弹了，可能是中了闷香。
Tā gǎndào sìzhī bùnéng dòngtán le，kěnéng shì zhòng le mènxiāng。
He felt his arms and legs tingling, and knew that he may have inhaled narcotic incense.
她是在苏州长大的，很喜欢听当地的评弹。
Tā shì zài Sūzhōu zhǎngdà de，hěnxǐhuan tīng dāngdì de píngdàn。
She grew up in Suzhou and likes to listen to the local pingtan.
汽油弹是一种杀伤力很大的武器。
Qìyóudàn shì yìzhǒng shāshānglì hěndà de wǔqì。
Gasoline bombs are a weapon high killing power.
我刚开始学琴，只会弹简单的琴曲。
Wǒ gāng kāishǐ xuéqín，zhǐhuì tán jiǎndān de qínqǔ。
I have just begun to learn the piano and I can only play simple compositions.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
我方潜艇遭到了敌军深水炸弹的袭击。
Wǒ fāng qiántǐng zāodào le díjūn shēnshuǐ zhàdàn de xíjī。
Our submarine was attacked by the enemy\'s depth charge.
我这儿有一张弹拨乐的CD，借给你你听听。
Wǒ zhèr yǒu yìzhāng dànbōyuè de CD，jiè gěi nǐ nǐ tīngtīng。
I have a CD with music of plucked-string instruments. You can borrow it from me.
我们班男生的吉他弹唱节目简直太棒了！
Wǒmen bān nánshēng de jítā tánchàng jiémù jiǎnzhí tài bàng le！
The guitar performance given by boys in our class was fantastic.
能在新年音乐会上聆听李云迪弹钢琴，真是一种享受。
Néng zài xīnnián yīnyuèhuì shàng língtīng Lǐ Yúndí tán gāngqín，zhēnshì yìzhǒng xiǎngshòu。
It was very enjoyable to listen to Li Yundi\'s piano playing in the New Year\'s concert.
那个剧场的门是弹簧门。
Nàge jùchǎng de mén shì tánhuángmén。
The theatre has a swinging door.
他的自行车用的是弹簧锁。
Tā de zìxíngchē yòng de shì tánhuángsuǒ。
His bike has a spring lock.
她经常为自己孤苦的命运暗自弹泪。
Tā jīngcháng wèi zìjǐ gūkǔ de mìngyùn ànzì tánlèi。
Tears comes into her eyes when she thinks of her own hard lot.
弹力袜看着很小，其实伸缩性很大。
Tánlìwà kàn zhe hěnxiǎo，qíshí shēnsuōxìng hěndà。
Though they seem to be very small, stretch socks have great elasticity.
NBA篮球运动员们的弹跳力都好得惊人。
NBA lánqiú yùndòngyuánmen de tántiàolì dōu hǎo de jīngrén。
NBA basketball players have an amazing leaping ability.
我们编辑部采用的是弹性工作制。
Wǒmen biānjíbùcǎiyòng de shì tánxìng gōngzuòzhì。
Our editorial department has adopted flexible working time.
在弹性市场中交易的灵活性是由买卖双方共同掌握的。
Zài tánxìng shìchǎng zhōng jiāoyì de línghuóxìng shì yóu mǎimài shuāngfāng gòngtóng zhǎngwò de。
In an elastic market, it is up to both the seller and the buyer to decide whether a transaction takes place.
他没有抵抗住糖衣炮弹的袭击，被犯罪分子拉下了水。
Tā méiyǒu dǐkàng zhù tángyī pàodàn de xíjī，bèi fànzuìfènzǐ lāxià le shuǐ。
He failed to resist the sugarcoated bullet, and was dragged into crime by hardcore criminals.
他被一颗子弹射中了天门，当场毙命。
Tā bèi yì kē zǐdàn shèzhòng le tiānmén，dāngchǎng bìmìng。
He was shot by a bullet in the center of his forehead and was killed instantly.
这批子弹质量真差，这又是一颗瞎火。
Zhè pī zǐdàn zhìliàng zhēn chà，zhè yòushì yì kē xiāhuǒ。
The shells are of poor quality, there is another dud here.
弟弟在弹吉他时不小心弄断了弦子。
Dìdi zài tán jítā shí bùxiǎoxīn nòngduàn le xiánzi。
My brother accidentally broke the string when playing his guitar.
核实验成功了，原子弹爆炸的声音响彻大地。
Héshíyàn chénggōng le，yuánzǐdàn bàozhà de shēngyīn xiǎngchè dàdì。
The nuclear tests succeeded, the sound of the explosion could be heard everywhere.
我国致力于开发巡航导弹，加强国防建设。
Wǒ guó zhìlìyú kāifā xúnháng dǎodàn，jiāqiáng guófáng jiànshè。
Our country is devoted to the development of cruise missiles to strengthen its national defense.
恐怖组织投放了烟雾弹，然后趁着混乱逃跑了。
Kǒngbùzǔzhī tóufàng le yānwùdàn，ránhòu chèn zhe hùnluàn táopǎo le。
The terrorist organization set off a smoke bomb and ran away in the chaos.
第一颗原子弹爆炸的时候，轰动整个瀛寰。
Dìyī kē yuánzǐdàn bàozhà de shíhou，hōngdòng zhěnggè yínghuán。
When the first atomic bomb exploded, the whole world was shocked.
叫他别再弹琴了，这琴声简直就是噪声。
Jiào tā bié zài tánqín le，zhè qínshēng jiǎnzhí jiùshì zàoshēng。
Ask him to stop playing the piano, it is a sheer noise.
为了尽快搞清楚前面的灾情，抗洪部队发射了很多照明弹。
Wèile jǐnkuài gǎo qīngchu qiánmiàn de zāiqíng，kànghóng bùduì fāshè le hěnduō zhàomíngdàn。
In order to figure out the situation of the disaster in front, the troops fighting the flood have launched several flares.
随着山边的一声震响，炸弹被引爆了。
Suí zhe shānbiān de yìshēng zhènxiǎng，zhà dàn bèi yǐnbào le。
With a deafening sound at the side of the hill, the bomb is exploded.
这颗导弹直逼对方领地。
Zhè kē dǎodàn zhíbī duìfāng lǐngdì。
This missile is directly approaching the enemy\'s territory.
你知道，中子弹是谁研发出来的吗？
Nǐ zhīdào，zhōng zǐdàn shì shuí yánfā chūlái de ma？
Do you know who invented the neutron bomb?
这个噩耗无疑于一颗重磅炸弹，让他一时无法接受。
Zhège èhào wúyí yú yì kē zhòngpàng zhàdàn，ràng tā yìshí wúfǎ jiēshòu。
This sad news is undoubtedly like a heavy bomb he can\'t possibly accept within a short period of time.
洲际导弹的杀伤性极强。
Zhōujì dǎodàn de shāshāngxìng jí qiáng。
The intercontinental missiles have extremely strong antipersonnel power.
子母弹是一种大规模杀伤性武器。
Zǐmǔdàn shì yìzhǒng dà guīmó shāshāngxìng wǔqì。
Shrapnel is a weapon of mass destruction.
那次会议上，反对党提出了弹劾总统的议案。
Nà cì huìyì shàng，fǎnduìdǎng tíchū le tánhé zǒngtǒng de yì\'àn。
During that meeting, the opposition party put forward a proposal to impeach the President.
我军利用火箭弹炸毁了敌军的碉堡。
Wǒ jūn lìyòng huǒjiàndàn zhàhuǐ le díjūn de diāobǎo。
Our army destroyed the enemy\'s blockhouse with a rocket bomb.
这根拉力器挂了5根弹簧他还能拉开，可见他的臂力很强呀！
Zhè gēn lālìqì guà le wǔgēn tánhuáng tā hái néng lākāi，kějiàn tā de bìlì hěnqiáng ya！
His arms are strong; he can pull a chest expander with five tension springs.
当天空腾起蘑菇云时，这也意味着氢弹试爆成功了！
Dāng tiānkōng téngqǐ mógūyún shí，zhè yě yìwèizhe qīngdàn shì bào chénggōng le！
The appearance of the mushroom cloud signifies the success of the H-bomb test.
姥姥为了防止小贩缺斤短两，每次出去买菜都要带个弹簧秤。
Lǎolao wèile fángzhǐ xiǎofàn quējīnduǎnliǎng，měicì chūqù mǎicài dōu yào dài gè tánhuángchèng。
Grandma takes a spring balance with her every time she goes to the grocery store, in case the vendors give her short weight.
信号弹的响声格外刺耳。
Xìnhàodàn de xiǎngshēng géwài cì\'ěr。
The signal flare sounds extraordinarily grating.
你少放烟雾弹，我不会再相信你了。
Nǐ shǎo fàng yānwùdàn，wǒ búhuì zài xiāngxìn nǐ le。
Don\'t try to cover it up, I won\'t trust you anymore.
炸弹爆炸了。
Zhàdàn bàozhà le。
The bomb exploded.
原子弹
yuánzǐdàn
atomic bomb
我的腿麻了，动弹不了。
Wǒdetuǐ má le，dòngtánbùliǎo。
My leg has gone to sleep. I can\'t move it.

shàngqiānfā zǐdàn

fángkōng dǎodàn

荷枪实弹的警察在巡逻。
Hèqiāngshídànde jǐngchá zài xúnluó。
Armed police are on the beat.
她钢琴弹得很不错。
Tā gāngqín tánde hěnbúcuò。
She plays the piano very well.
她弹得来钢琴。
Tā tán délái gāngqín.
She can play the piano.
两枚炸弹
liǎngméi zhàdàn
two bombs
他哪里会弹钢琴？
Tā nǎlǐ huì tán gāngqín?
How is he supposed to be able to play the piano?
你要反复练习弹钢琴，毕竟熟能生巧嘛。
Nǐ yào fǎnfù liànxí tán gāngqín，bìjìng shúnéngshēngqiǎo má。
You need to constantly practice the piano. After all, practice makes perfect.
门弹了回来。
Mén tánle huílái。
The door sprang back.
球弹不起来了。
Qiú tán bù qǐláile。
The ball doesn\'t bounce.

tánhuángmén

tánlì kù
stretch trousers (英) {或} pants (美)

tánxìnggōngzuòzhì
flexible working system
法律是没有弹性的。
Fǎlǜ shì méiyǒu tánxìng de。
The law is inflexible.
远程导弹
Yuǎnchéng dǎodàn
long-range missile
子弹打中了靶子。
Zǐdàn dǎzhòngle bǎzǐ。
The bullet hit the target.
胸口中了颗子弹。
Xiōngkǒu zhòngle kē zǐdàn。
He was hit in the chest by a bullet.
炮弹自己不会爆炸。
Pàodàn zìjǐ búhuì bàozhà。

现在我丈夫去世了，我不让任何人来这里同情我。
Her husband had moved in with a younger woman.
她的丈夫和一个比她年轻的女人同居了。
My husband was my biggest critic when we were married.
Zài wǒmen jiéhūn de shíhou，wǒ zhàngfu shì duì wǒ zuì chuīmáoqiúcī de rén。
在我们结婚的时候，我丈夫是对我最吹毛求疵的人。
Her husband seemed to know many of the people who were named, but he replied evasively when asked who they were.
Tā zhàngfu hǎoxiàng rènshi hěnduō bèi rènmìng de rén，dànshì dāng wèn tā tāmen shì shuí shí tā shǎnshuòqící，huídá shuō bú rènshi。

a golf widow
丈夫经常外出打高尔夫球的女人
Her faith in man vanished after she saw her husband cheat on her.

The girls were talking about their husbands in the living room.
Zhèxiē nǚrén zài qǐjūshì lǐ tánlùn tāmen de zhàngfu。
这些女人在起居室里谈论她们的丈夫。
Her husband treats her rough and prevents her from meeting her family.
Tā de zhàngfu duì tā xíngwéi cūbào，bìng zǔzhǐ tā hé tā jiārén jiànmiàn。
她的丈夫对她行为粗暴，并阻止她和她家人见面。
Her husband didn\'t survive Mary long, so she was left to face life alone at an early age.
Mǎlì de zhàngfu méi néng bǐ tā huó de jiǔ，ràng tā zài niánqīng shí jiùděi dúzì yì rén miànduì shēnghuó。
玛丽的丈夫没能比她活得久，让她在年轻时就得独自一人面对生活。
丈母娘给了女婿一个红包当作见面礼。
Zhàngmǔniáng gěi le nǚxù yígè hóngbāo dàngzuò jiànmiànlǐ。
The mother-in-law gave her son-in-law a red envelop filled with money as a gift.
小王一早就到未来丈母娘家下定去了。
Xiǎo Wáng yìzǎo jiù dào wèilái zhàngmǔniáng jiā xiàdìng qù le。
Xiao Wang went to send gift to his future mother-in-law early in the morning.
他丈母娘不喜欢他，经常在他老婆面前说他的不是。
Tā zhàngmǔniáng bùxǐhuan tā，jīngcháng zài tā lǎopó miànqián shuō tā de búshì。
His mother-in-law doesn\'t like him, and always criticizes him in front of his wife.
丈母娘给了女婿一个红包当作见面礼。
Zhàngmǔniáng gěi le nǚxù yígè hóngbāo dàngzuò jiànmiànlǐ。
The mother-in-law gave her son-in-law a red envelop filled with money as a gift.

丈量土地
zhàngliángtǔdì 
measure land; take the dimensions of a field
丈量
丈量(ｌｉáｎɡ)。
The wire is gauged.
Diànxiàn jīngguòle zhàngliáng。
电线经过了丈量。
This is something you need to discuss with your husband.
这件事你应该与丈夫商量一下。
丈夫去当兵了，她每天晚上只能想象丈夫的样子，不知道何时能相见。
Zhàngfū qù dāngbīng le，tā měitiān wǎnshàng zhǐnéng xiǎng xiàng zhàngfū de yàngzi，bùzhīdào héshí néng xiāngjiàn。
As the husband joined the army, she could only see him in her imagination, not knowing when they could meet again.
她丈夫去世后，她代替丈夫主理公司业务。
Tā zhàngfū qùshì hòu，tā dàitì zhàngfū zhǔlǐ gōngsī yèwù。
Since the death of her husband, she has been in charge of the company business.
丈夫死了以后，她改嫁了。
Zhàngfu sǐ le yǐhòu，tā gǎijià le。
She got remarried after her husband\'s death.
她丈夫和隔壁那个女人勾勾搭搭的。
Tā zhàngfū hé gébì nàgè nǚrén gōugoudāda de。
Her husband is carrying on with the woman next door.
你理想中的丈夫是个什么样的人？

What\'s your ideal of what a husband should be?

Nánzǐhàn，dàzhàngfu，yì rén zuò shì yì rén dāng。
A man should have the courage to take the blame for what he does.
大丈夫能屈能伸。
Dà zhàngfu néngqūnéngshēn。
A man among men is he who knows when to eat humble pie and when to hold his head high.
探询丈夫情况的强烈欲望烧炙着我。
Tànxún zhàngfu qíngkuàng de qiángliè yùwàngshāozhì zhe wǒ。
I burned with the desire to ask after my husband.
她跟着丈夫离开了家乡，后来时运不济，他又病死了。
Tā gēn zhe zhàngfū líkāi le jiāxiāng，hòulái shíyùnbùjì，tā yòu bìngsǐ le。
She left home to go with her husband, but as ill luck would have it he fell sick and died.
她怀疑她丈夫有外遇。
Tā huáiyí tā zhàngfu yǒu wàiyù。
She suspected her husband of carrying on with some other woman.
她很羡慕我有这样一个好丈夫。
Tā hěn xiànmù wǒ yǒu zhèyàngyígè hǎo zhàngfu。
She envies me my good husband.
丈夫气概
zhàngfū qìgài 
manliness
她在好友面前哀诉丈夫的不是。
Tā zài hǎoyǒu miànqián āisù zhàngfū de búshì。
She bitterly complained about her husband to her friend.
她以种种的理由贬责自己的丈夫。
Tā yǐ zhǒng zhǒng de lǐyóu biǎnzé zìjǐ de zhàngfū。
She criticized her husband for making all kinds of excuses.
她和丈夫这些年的争吵无非是薄物细故。

The disputes between her, and her husband over all these years have always been about trivial things.
在古代，新娘要由彩轿抬到丈夫家。

她嗔怨丈夫出差回来没给自己带礼物。
Tā chēnyuàn zhàngfū chūchāi huílái méi gěi zìjǐ dài lǐwù。
She complained that her husband didn\'t bring her any gifts when he returned from his business trip.
她的丈夫吃喝嫖赌无所不为，她总是暗自垂泪却没有办法。
Tā de zhàngfū chīhēpiáodǔ wúsuǒ bùwéi，tā zǒngshì ànzì chuílèi què méiyǒu bànfǎ。
Although her husband is as wicked as possible, she could do nothing but weep secretly all the time.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。
Tīngshuō dōngběi zhèngzài xiàxuě，qīzǐ wèi jiāngyào qù nàlǐ chūchāi de zhàngfū zhǔnbèi le yì dǐng fēngxuěmào。
Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.
她年纪轻轻就失去丈夫，到现在已经是40年的孤孀了。

Her husband died when she was young. Now she has been a widow for 40 years.
她含情脉脉地看着丈夫。
Tā hánqíngmòmò de kàn zhe zhàngfū。
She looks at her husband with tender affection.
婆媳关系不好，做丈夫的只能受着夹板气。

When the mother quarreled with her daughter-in-law, the son was caught between two fires.
丈夫走了以后，她每天晚上都用鲛绡偷偷的拭泪。
Zhàngfū zǒu le yǐhòu，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yòng jiāoxiāo tōutōu de shìlèi。
After her husband died young, she secretly wiped away tears with a handkerchief every day.
妻子在究问晚归的丈夫去了哪里。
Qīzǐ zài jiūwèn wǎnguī de zhàngfū qù le nǎlǐ。
The wife is interrogating him as to where her husband went last night.
大丈夫活在世上要顶天立地。
Dàzhàngfū huó zài shìshàng yào dǐngtiān lìdì。
A great man should live in this world with an indomitable spirit.
听闻丈夫出外丧命，这女子只吓得栗然发怔，一语不发。

他在家里很能干活儿，老婆说他是模范丈夫，朋友们则说他像个“男仆”。

男子汉大丈夫要大度点，不要那么小器好不好？

他们之间感情的转捩点是丈夫在外面有了情人。

她婵媛悱恻，思念远在他乡的丈夫。

我丈夫三个月前死于肺癌。
I enjoy it when my husband caresses my back.

There was a certain sense of style and dash that attracted me to my husband.

I dont have anyone here to sypmathize with me now my husband has gone.
