She played the servant to her husband\'s master.
Tā bànyǎn tā zhàngfu de zhǔrén de púrén。
她扮演她丈夫的主人的仆人。
Her husband seemed to know many of the people who were named, but he replied evasively when asked who they were.
Tā zhàngfu hǎoxiàng rènshi hěnduō bèi rènmìng de rén，dànshì dāng wèn tā tāmen shì shuí shí tā shǎnshuòqící，huídá shuō bú rènshi。
她丈夫好像认识很多被任命的人，但是当问他他们是谁时他闪烁其词，回答说不认识。
Her explorer husband resisted all her attempts at domestication.
Tā de màoxiǎnjiā zhàngfu dǐzhì tā zài xùnhuà fāngmiàn de suǒyǒu nǔlì。
她的冒险家丈夫抵制她在驯化方面的所有努力。
In those days a wife had to depend on the mercifulness of her husband.
Zài nàgèshíhòu，qīzǐ bùdébù zhǐwàng qí zhàngfu de kuānhòu。
在那个时候，妻子不得不指望其丈夫的宽厚。
Her husband and mother-in-law tyrannize her.
Tā zhàngfu hé tā pópo nuèdài tā。
她丈夫和她婆婆虐待她。
A wife is usually considered unqualified to testify against her husband.
Yìbān rènwéi，qīzǐ méiyǒu zīgé duì tā zhàngfu zuò búlì de zhèngcí。
一般认为，妻子没有资格对她丈夫做不利的证词。
It used to drive my husband balmy.
Zhè céngjīng lìng wǒ de zhàngfu biàn de wēnróu kě\'ài。
这曾经令我的丈夫变得温柔可爱。
She has been able to live comfortably since her husband died.
Zìcóng tā zhàngfu sǐhòu，tā jīngjì fāngmiàn yìzhí nénggòu guòdeqù。
自从她丈夫死后，她经济方面一直能够过得去。
She looked at her husband crossly.
Tā bù gāoxìng de kànzhe zìjǐ de zhàngfu。
她不高兴地看着自己的丈夫。
She treated her husband bestially.
Tā duì zìjǐ de zhàngfu hěn cūbào。
她对自己的丈夫很粗暴。
Her tirade provoked a counterblast from her husband.
Tā de chángpiān dàlùn jīqǐle tā zhàngfu de qiángliè fǎnduì。
她的长篇大论激起了她丈夫的强烈反对。
She has learned to live with her husband\'s little idiosyncrasies.
Tā yǐjīng xuéhuìle rěnshòu tā zhàngfu de xiǎopǐhào。
她已经学会了忍受她丈夫的小癖好。
Husband and wife co-signed the lease.
Zhàngfu hé qīzǐ gòngtóng qiānshǔle zhè fèn zūyuē。
丈夫和妻子共同签署了这份租约。
Her husband was unfaithful.
Tā zhàngfu bù zhōngchéng。
她丈夫不忠诚。
Adultery is as reprehensible for a husband as for a wife.
Zhàngfu tōngjiān yīng shòudào yǔ qīzǐ tōngjiān xiāngtóng de qiǎnzé。
丈夫通奸应受到与妻子通奸相同的谴责。
Her apparent dominance of her husband was really her attempt to make him pay attention to her.
Tā zhīpèi tā de zhàngfu，qíshí shì xiǎng ràng tā zhòngshì tā。
她支配她的丈夫，其实是想让他重视她。
Her husband disavowed her after 30 years of marriage and six children.
Jiéhūn sānshí nián bìng yǎngyù liù gè háizi zhīhòu，tā zhàngfu yǔ tā líyì。
结婚30年并养育六个孩子之后，他丈夫与她离异。
Her husband reappeared after having left her years ago.
Duō nián qián líkāi tā zhīhòu，tā de zhàngfu yòu chūxiàn le。
多年前离开她之后，她的丈夫又出现了。
She was true to her significant other.
Tā zhōngshí yú tā zhàngfu。
她忠实于她丈夫。
She is sculpting the block of marble into an image of her husband.
Tā zhèngzài yòng yí kuài dàlǐshí diāokè tā zhàngfu de xíngxiàng。
她正在用一块大理石雕刻她丈夫的形象。
She outlived her husband by many years.
Tā bǐ tā zhàngfu duō huóle hěn duō nián。
她比她丈夫多活了很多年。
She nags her husband all day long.
Tā zhěngtiān duì tā zhàngfu lāolāo-dāodāo。
她整天对她丈夫唠唠叨叨。
She condoned her husband\'s occasional infidelities.
Tā kuānshùle tā zhàngfu ǒu\'ěr de bù zhōng。
她宽恕了他丈夫偶尔的不忠。
She badmouths her husband everywhere.
Tā dàochù shuō tā zhàngfu de huàihuà。
她到处说她丈夫的坏话。
She predeceased her husband.
Tā xiānyú tā zhàngfu sǐqù。
她先于她丈夫死去。
Unchivalrously, the husbands who had to provide such innocent indulgences eventually began to count the costs.
Hěn méi nánshì fēngdù de shì，běngāi tǐtiē qiānjiù qīzǐ de zhàngfu zuìhòu kāishǐ jìsuàn sǔnshī。
很没男士风度的是，本该体贴迁就妻子的丈夫最后开始计算损失。
Unassertively, she always follows her husband\'s suggestions.
Bú guòfèn de shuō，tā zǒngshì tīngcóng yú zìjǐ de zhàngfu。
不过份地说，她总是听从于自己的丈夫。
But your husband\'s competence ends there.
dàn nǐ zhàngfu de nénglì jǐn zhǐ yú cǐ。
但你丈夫的能力仅止于此。
丈夫去当兵了，她每天晚上只能想象丈夫的样子，不知道何时能相见。
Zhàngfū qù dāngbīng le，tā měitiān wǎnshàng zhǐnéng xiǎng xiàng zhàngfū de yàngzi，bùzhīdào héshí néng xiāngjiàn。
As the husband joined the army, she could only see him in her imagination, not knowing when they could meet again.
她丈夫去世后，她代替丈夫主理公司业务。
Tā zhàngfū qùshì hòu，tā dàitì zhàngfū zhǔlǐ gōngsī yèwù。
Since the death of her husband, she has been in charge of the company business.
丈夫死了以后，她改嫁了。
Zhàngfu sǐ le yǐhòu，tā gǎijià le。
She got remarried after her husband\'s death.
她丈夫和隔壁那个女人勾勾搭搭的。
Tā zhàngfū hé gébì nàgè nǚrén gōugoudāda de。
Her husband is carrying on with the woman next door.
你理想中的丈夫是个什么样的人？
Nǐ lǐxiǎng zhōng de zhàngfu shì gè shénme yàng de rén?
What\'s your ideal of what a husband should be?
男子汉，大丈夫，一人做事一人当。
Nánzǐhàn，dàzhàngfu，yì rén zuò shì yì rén dāng。
A man should have the courage to take the blame for what he does.
大丈夫能屈能伸。
Dà zhàngfu néngqūnéngshēn。
A man among men is he who knows when to eat humble pie and when to hold his head high.
气焰万丈
qìyàn wànzhàng
be swollen with arrogance
探询丈夫情况的强烈欲望烧炙着我。
Tànxún zhàngfu qíngkuàng de qiángliè yùwàngshāozhì zhe wǒ。
I burned with the desire to ask after my husband.
她跟着丈夫离开了家乡，后来时运不济，他又病死了。
Tā gēn zhe zhàngfū líkāi le jiāxiāng，hòulái shíyùnbùjì，tā yòu bìngsǐ le。
She left home to go with her husband, but as ill luck would have it he fell sick and died.
势焰万丈
shìyàn wàn zhàng
aggressively powerful
她怀疑她丈夫有外遇。
Tā huáiyí tā zhàngfu yǒu wàiyù。
She suspected her husband of carrying on with some other woman.
怒火万丈
nùhuǒ wànzhàng
a towering rage; a fit of violent anger
她很羡慕我有这样一个好丈夫。
Tā hěn xiànmù wǒ yǒu zhèyàngyígè hǎo zhàngfu。
She envies me my good husband.
凶焰万丈
xiōngyàn wànzhàng
swell with aggressive arrogance
社会风气一落千丈。
Shèhuì fēngqì yíluòqiānzhàng。
Morals and manners have declined to an enormous extent.
春耕前要把地丈完。
Chūngēngqián yào bǎ dì zhàngwán。
We must finish measuring the land before spring ploughing.
丈夫气概
zhàngfū qìgài 
manliness
丈量土地
zhàngliángtǔdì 
measure land; take the dimensions of a field
姑丈
gūzhàng
the husband of one\'s father\'s sister; uncle
她在好友面前哀诉丈夫的不是。
Tā zài hǎoyǒu miànqián āisù zhàngfū de búshì。
She bitterly complained about her husband to her friend.
她以种种的理由贬责自己的丈夫。
Tā yǐ zhǒng zhǒng de lǐyóu biǎnzé zìjǐ de zhàngfū。
She criticized her husband for making all kinds of excuses.
她和丈夫这些年的争吵无非是薄物细故。
Tā hé zhàngfū zhèxiē nián de zhēngchǎo wúfēi shì bówù xìgù。
The disputes between her, and her husband over all these years have always been about trivial things.
在古代，新娘要由彩轿抬到丈夫家。
Zài gǔdài，xīnniáng yào yóu cǎijiào táidào zhàngfū jiā。
In ancient times, the bride is carried in a bridal sedan chair to her husband’s home.
眼前苍山如海，他顿感豪情万丈。
Yǎnqián cāngshān rú hǎi，tā dùn gǎn háoqíng wànzhàng。
Seeing the sea-like mountains ahead, he felt bold and unconstrained.
她嗔怨丈夫出差回来没给自己带礼物。
Tā chēnyuàn zhàngfū chūchāi huílái méi gěi zìjǐ dài lǐwù。
She complained that her husband didn\'t bring her any gifts when he returned from his business trip.
她的丈夫吃喝嫖赌无所不为，她总是暗自垂泪却没有办法。
Tā de zhàngfū chīhēpiáodǔ wúsuǒ bùwéi，tā zǒngshì ànzì chuílèi què méiyǒu bànfǎ。
Although her husband is as wicked as possible, she could do nothing but weep secretly all the time.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。
Tīngshuō dōngběi zhèngzài xiàxuě，qīzǐ wèi jiāngyào qù nàlǐ chūchāi de zhàngfū zhǔnbèi le yì dǐng fēngxuěmào。
Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.
她年纪轻轻就失去丈夫，到现在已经是40年的孤孀了。
Tā niánjì qīngqīng jiù shīqù zhàngfū，dào xiànzài yǐjing shì sìshínián de gūshuāng le。
Her husband died when she was young. Now she has been a widow for 40 years.
她含情脉脉地看着丈夫。
Tā hánqíngmòmò de kàn zhe zhàngfū。
She looks at her husband with tender affection.
婆媳关系不好，做丈夫的只能受着夹板气。
Póxí guānxì bùhǎo，zuò zhàngfū de zhǐnéng shòu zhe jiábǎnqì。
When the mother quarreled with her daughter-in-law, the son was caught between two fires.
丈母娘给了女婿一个红包当作见面礼。
Zhàngmǔniáng gěi le nǚxù yígè hóngbāo dàngzuò jiànmiànlǐ。
The mother-in-law gave her son-in-law a red envelop filled with money as a gift.
丈夫走了以后，她每天晚上都用鲛绡偷偷的拭泪。
Zhàngfū zǒu le yǐhòu，tā měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yòng jiāoxiāo tōutōu de shìlèi。
After her husband died young, she secretly wiped away tears with a handkerchief every day.
我姐和我姐丈今天结婚。
Wǒ jiě hé wǒ jiězhàng jīntiān jiéhūn。
My sister is going to marry today.
妻子在究问晚归的丈夫去了哪里。
Qīzǐ zài jiūwèn wǎnguī de zhàngfū qù le nǎlǐ。
The wife is interrogating him as to where her husband went last night.
我们迷失了路途，所以就向一位老丈询问一了下。
Wǒmen míshī le lùtú，suǒyǐ jiù xiàng yíwèi lǎozhàng xúnwèn yí lexià。
We lost our way, so we inquired with an old man on the road.
大丈夫活在世上要顶天立地。
Dàzhàngfū huó zài shìshàng yào dǐngtiān lìdì。
A great man should live in this world with an indomitable spirit.
听闻丈夫出外丧命，这女子只吓得栗然发怔，一语不发。
Tīngwén zhàngfū chūwài sàngmìng，zhè nǚzǐ zhǐ xià de lìrán fāzhēng，yìyǔ bùfā。
Hearing her husband died when going out on business, the woman trembled and was terrified.  She was unable to say a word.
他在家里很能干活儿，老婆说他是模范丈夫，朋友们则说他像个“男仆”。
Tā zài jiā lǐ hěnnéng gànhuór，lǎopó shuō tā shì mófàn zhàngfū，péngyoumen zé shuō tā xiàng gè“nánpú”。
He is capable of doing housework. His wife praises him as a model husband, but friends say that he is a male servant.
男子汉大丈夫，别跟娘们儿一般见识！
Nánzǐhàn dàzhàngfū，bié gēn niángmenr yìbān jiànshí！
Be a man, don\'t take offence at these women!
她虽然被丈夫抛弃了，但她并不愿作伤心的弃妇。
Tā suīrán bèi zhàngfū pāoqì le，dàn tā bìng búyuàn zuò shāngxīn de qìfù。
Although abandoned by her husband, she doesn\'t want to be a sad abandoned wife.
在专业测绘人员的帮助下，村里重新清丈了土地。
Zài zhuānyè cèhuì rényuán de bāngzhù xià，cūn lǐ chóngxīn qīngzhàng le tǔdì。
The village remeasured the land with the help of professional cartographers.
为了欢迎少林寺方丈来访，我们特准备了一桌素筵。
Wèile huānyíng shàolínsì fāngzhàng láifǎng，wǒmen tè zhǔnbèi le yì zhuō sùyàn。
We especially prepared a feast of vegetable dishes to welcome the head of Shaolin Temple.
这个土岗只比平地高出一丈多。
Zhège tǔgǎng zhǐ bǐ píngdì gāochū yí zhàng duō。
This hillock is only ten feet higher than the horizontal land.
小王一早就到未来丈母娘家下定去了。
Xiǎo Wáng yìzǎo jiù dào wèilái zhàngmǔniáng jiā xiàdìng qù le。
Xiao Wang went to send gift to his future mother-in-law early in the morning.
男子汉大丈夫要大度点，不要那么小器好不好？
Nánzǐhàn dàzhàngfū yào dàdù diǎn，búyào nàme xiǎoqì hǎobuhǎo？
A man should be generous. Don\'t be so mean, OK?
男子汉大丈夫不要心路太窄。
Nánzǐhàn dàzhàngfū búyào xīnlù tài zhǎi。
A man should not be narrow-minded.
她刚刚新寡，还没从失去丈夫的阴影中走出来。
Tā gānggāng xīnguǎ，hái méi cóng shīqù zhàngfū de yīnyǐng zhōng zǒu chūlái。
She is newly widowed, and still in the shadow of her husband\'s death.
她万万没想到丈夫递给她一纸修书。
Tā wànwàn méi xiǎngdào zhàngfū dìgěi tā yìzhǐ xiūshū。
It had never occurred to her that her husband would hand her a letter of divorce.
丈夫死后，她也殉节了，只留下一个女儿。
Zhàngfū sǐhòu，tā yě xùnjié le，zhǐ liúxià yígè nǚ\'ér。
After her husband\'s death, she committed suicide, leaving behind a daughter.
姨丈虽然生活在外地，却一直非常疼爱我。
Yízhàng suīrán shēnghuó zài wàidì，què yìzhí fēicháng téngài wǒ。
Although my uncle lives in another place, he dotes upon me all the time.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
小张的岳丈是东北人。
Xiǎo Zhāng de yuèzhàng shì dōngběirén。
Xiaozhang\'s father-in-law is from the Northeast.
他丈母娘不喜欢他，经常在他老婆面前说他的不是。
Tā zhàngmǔniáng bùxǐhuan tā，jīngcháng zài tā lǎopó miànqián shuō tā de búshì。
His mother-in-law doesn\'t like him, and always criticizes him in front of his wife.
按照丈夫的遗愿，烈士夫人将忠骨抛洒到海中。
Ànzhào zhàngfū de yíyuàn，lièshì fūrén jiāng zhōnggǔ pāosǎ dào hǎizhōng。
According to her dead husband\'s wishes, the martyr\'s wife threw his remains into the sea.
他们之间感情的转捩点是丈夫在外面有了情人。
Tāmen zhījiān gǎnqíng de zhuǎnlièdiǎn shì zhàngfū zài wàimiàn yǒu le qíngrén。
The husband acquired a mistress, the turning point in their relationship.
她婵媛悱恻，思念远在他乡的丈夫。
Tā chányuánfěicè，sīniàn yuǎn zài tā xiāng de zhàngfū。
She longs for her husband who is faraway.
男子汉大丈夫危难时候要做到威武不屈！
nánzǐhàn dàzhàngfū wēinàn shíhou yào zuòdào wēiwǔbùqū！
A man should remain unyielding in the face of brutal force!
她爱慕她丈夫。
Tā àimù tā zhàngfu。
She adores her husband.
她比她丈夫大个一两岁。
Tā bǐ tāzhàngfu dàgè yīliǎngsuì。
She\'s about one or two years older than her husband.
她焦急地等待着丈夫归来。
Tā jiāojí de děngdàizhe zhàngfu guīlái.
She waited anxiously for her husband to return.
她有外遇后，就想和丈夫离婚。
Tā yǒu wàiyù hòu，jiù xiǎng hé zhàngfu líhūn。
After having an affair, she wanted to divorce her husband.

She\'s constantly arguing with her husband about the children\'s education.

她的后婚丈夫比前夫勤快多了。

大丈夫志在四方
妻子不是丈夫的附庸

你也不能空手去看你老丈人呀！
丈夫下岗，孩子又有病，这日子太难过了。
旁侧是万丈悬崖。
丈夫调动，妻子也随迁到这里。
怒火万丈。
万丈深渊。
万丈悬崖。
男子汉大丈夫。
丈夫死后，她就转嫁到外村去了。
In the old days she had been harsh and stiff; afraid of her husband and yet arrogantly proud that she had a husband strong and fierce enough to make her afraid.

tuōlí shíjì 
lose contact with reality; be divorced from reality
脱硫原油
tuōliú yuányóu 
sweet crude
毛发脱落
máofà tuōluò 
lose (one\'s) hair
门的把手脱落了。
Mén de bǎshou tuōluò le。
The door handle has come off.
墙上油漆已经脱落了。
Qiángshàngyóuqī yǐjing tuōluò le。
The paint on the wall has peeled off.
蕾铃脱落
lěilíngtuōluò 
shedding of young bolls
那只骆驼刚脱了毛。
Nà zhī luòtuo gāngtuō le máo。
That camel has just shed.
脱帽致敬
tuōmào zhìjìnɡ 
take off one\'s hat in salutation
脱帽默哀
tuōmào mòāi 
bare one\'s head and mourn in silence
脱泡桶
tuōpàotǒng
deaerator
脱色剂
tuōsèjì 
decolourant; decolourizer
我事情太多，脱不开身。
Wǒ shìqinɡ tài duō, tuō bù kāi shēn。 
I have so much to do that I just can\'t get away.
他跳上一辆汽车脱了身。
Tā tiào shàngyí liàngqìchē tuō le shēn。
He jumped into a car and made his escape.
他用力一扔，石块脱手飞了出去。
Tā yònglì yì rēng，shíkuài tuōshǒu fēi le chūqù。
With a powerful fling he sent the stone flying.
这些货不好脱手。
Zhè xiē huò bùhǎo tuōshǒu。
These goods are difficult to dispose of.
严重脱水
yánzhòngtuōshuǐ 
serious dehydration
这部小说脱胎于民间传说。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō tuōtāi yú mínjiān chuánshuō。
This novel has been developed out of a folk story.
脱胎漆器
tuōtāi qīqì 
bodiless lacquerware
得到脱胎换骨的改造
Dédào tuō tāihuàngǔ de gǎizào 
cast off one\'s old self and take on a new self; make a change in one\'s very nature
动如脱兔
dònɡrútuōtù 
as quick as a fleeing hare
经过抢救，孩子脱险了。
Jīngguò qiǎngjiù，háizi tuōxiǎn le。
The child was out of danger after the emergency treatment.
这本书脱销了。
Zhèběnshū tuōxiāo le。
The book is out of stock. or The book is sold out.
脱氧剂
tuōyǎnɡjì

脱离危险
tuōlí wēixiǎn 
out of danger

wúfǎ jiětuō de kùnjìng
an inextricable dilemma
脱离险境
tuōlí xiǎnjìnɡ
be out of danger
脱离现实
tuōlí xiànshí
be divorced from reality; be unrealistic
你休想逃脱。
Nǐ xiūxiǎnɡ táotuō。
Don\'t imagine you can get away.
挣脱枷锁
zhèngtuō jiāsuǒ 
throw off the shackles
脱肛
tuōgāng
prolapse of the anus
逃脱
táotuō
succeed in escaping; make good one\'s escape; get clear of
脱漏一针
tuōlòu yì zhēn
drop a stitch (in knitting)

Nàxiē zuìfàn de biànhùshì shènzhì kěyǐ bāngzhù shārénfàn táotuō zuìzé。
Criminal defense lawyers can help convicts escape punishment for their crimes.
她的诗超凡脱俗，高出侪辈许多。
Tā de shī chāofán tuōsú，gāochū cháibèi xǔduō。
Her poems are outstanding, much more so than the works of her contemporaries.
她终于脱离娼门，嫁给了一个老实本分的车夫。
Tā zhōng yú tuōlí chāngmén，jiàgěi le yígè lǎoshi běnfèn de chēfū。
She finally broke away from the brothel and married an honest wagoner.
一眼就能看出来他是个超凡脱俗的人。
Yìyǎn jiùnéng kànchūlái tā shì gè chāofán tuōsú de rén。
One sight of him can tell that he is a man free from vulgarity.
他决定超脱尘网，一意修行。
Tā juédìng chāotuō chénwǎng，yíyì xiūxíng。
He decided to detach himself from the human world, and practice Buddhism.
城门失火，殃及池鱼，这事你也脱离不了干系。
Chéngmén shīhuǒ，yāngjí chíyú，zhèshì nǐ yě tuōlíbùliǎo gānxì。
When the city gate is on fire, the fish in the moat will suffer, you can\'t escape responsibility.
大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。
Dànóngyè tǐxì de jiànlì，shǐ zhège dìqū de nóngmín hěnkuài tuōpín zhìfù。
Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
若是捯根儿的话，他也脱不了干系。
Ruò shì dáogēnr de huà，tā yě tuōbùliǎo gānxì。
He is also responsible for the matter if one insists on finding the root cause.
因为我水平有限，文中肯定多有讹脱，让大家见笑了。
Yīnwéi wǒ shuǐpíng yǒuxiàn，wén zhōng kěndìng duō yǒu étuō，ràng dàjiā jiànxiào le。
Due to my limited ability, there must be errors in the text. I apologize for this.
你要摆脱这种情绪的恶性循环，做一个坚强乐观的人。
Nǐ yào bǎituō zhèzhǒng qíngxù de èxìng xúnhuán，zuò yígè jiānqiáng lèguān de rén。
You should get yourself out of this vicious circle of emotions and become strong and optimistic.
歹徒反绑了她的手，她实在无力争脱。
Dǎitú fǎnbǎng le tā de shǒu，tā shízai wúlì zhēngtuō。
With her arms bound behind her by the criminal, she was too weak to break free.
病人还没有脱离危险，已经被送进观察室进行观察。
Bìngrén hái méiyǒu tuōlí wēixiǎn，yǐjing bèi sòngjìn guāncháshì jìnxíng guānchá。
The patient is still in danger and has been sent to the probationary ward for further observation.
恒牙脱落后是不能再生的。
Héngyá tuōluò hòu shì bùnéng zàishēng de。
Permanent teeth can\'t regenerate after falling off.
今后说话要放活脱些，不可把话说得过死。
Jīnhòu shuōhuà yào fàng huótuō xiē，bùkě bǎ huà shuō de guò sǐ。
Be more flexible in the future, don\'t say things in rigid terms.
他已经机关用尽，最终也没有摆脱破产的命运。
Tā yǐjing jīguān yòngjìn，zuì zhōng yě méiyǒu bǎituō pòchǎn de mìngyùn。
He has exhausted all his means, yet he didn\'t escape the fate of being bankrupt.
她只是松松的挽了个髻子，显得很清新脱俗。
Tā zhǐshì sōngsōng de wǎn le gè jìzi，xiǎnde hěnqīngxīn tuōsú。
She casually wears her hair in a bun, and looks elegant and refined.
我们要摆脱现在的困局就要努力工作！
Wǒmen yào bǎituō xiànzài de kùnjú jiùyào nǔlì gōngzuò！
Only through hard work can we solve our current predicament.
炼狱是个宗教词汇，是洗脱人罪过的地方。
Liànyù shì gè zōngjiào cíhuì，shì xǐtuō rén zuìguò de dìfāng。
Purgatory is a religious word which is a place for people to wash away their sins.
这个螺丝扣已经脱落了，需要重新装一个。
Zhège luósīkòu yǐjing tuōluò le，xūyào chóngxīn zhuāng yí gè。
The thread came off; another needs to be fixed on the screw.
这个楼的落水管随时都有脱落的危险。

The downpipe of this building could fall off at any time.
他终于脱离了苦海，从此免受煎熬。
Tā zhōng yú tuōlí le kǔhǎi，cóngcǐ miǎnshòu jiān\'áo。
He finally got out of the abyss of misery, and will be free from suffering from now on.
这个活儿看着撇脱，真干起来却并不轻松！
Zhège huór kàn zhe piětuō，zhēn gàn qǐlái què bìng bùqīngsōng！
This work looks simple and direct, but it’s not easy at all when you actually do it.
这个男人说话做事太不撇脱了，婆婆妈妈的！
Zhège nánrén shuōhuà zuòshì tài bùpiětuō le，pópómāma de！
This man doesn’t speak in a straightforward manner, he is garrulous.
贫道脱离尘世，现在在武当山隐居。
Píndào tuōlí chénshì，xiànzài zài Wǔdāngshān yǐnjū。
I am isolated from mortal life, and lead a monastic life on Mt. Wudang.

Zài guò liǎng nián nǐ de rǔyá jiùhuì quánbùtuōluò le。
Your baby teeth will fall out in two years time.
她巧妙地甩脱了尾随她的小流氓，然后报了警。
Tā qiǎomiào de shuǎituō le wěisuítā de xiǎoliúmáng，ránhòu bào le jǐng。
She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
他是个通脱的人，不会计较这些小事的。
Tā shì gè tōngtuō de rén，búhuì jìjiào zhèxiē xiǎoshì de。
He is a very open-minded man, and won\'t be particular about these trifles.
您的车祸是在脱保后发生的，所以我们没法对您进行理赔。
Nín de chēhuò shì zài tuōbǎo hòu fāshēng de，suǒyǐ wǒmen méifǎ duì nín jìnxíng lǐpéi。
Your accident happened after your insurance had expired, so we can\'t give you any compensation.
如果你总不参加组织生活或是不交党费，就是自动脱党。
Rúguǒ nǐ zǒng bùcānjiā zǔzhī shēnghuó huòshì bùjiāo dǎngfèi，jiùshì zìdòng tuōdǎng。
If you don\'t participate in group activities or pay your party fees for a long time, you\'ll be considered as having automatically quit the party yourself.
这种商品卖得太快，几天的工夫就脱档了。
Zhèzhǒng shāngpǐn mài de tàikuài，jǐ tiān de gōngfu jiù tuōdàng le。
This commodity sells very well, it went out of stock in just a few days.
脱岗是要扣工资的，还不赶快回去工作。
Tuōgǎng shì yào kòu gōngzī de，hái bùgǎnkuài huíqù gōngzuò。
Your salary will be reduced if you leave your job during working hours, so get back to work quickly.
他勤奋上进，所以组织派他脱岗学习、出去深造。
Tā qínfèn shàngjìn，suǒyǐ zǔzhī pài tā tuōgǎng xuéxí、chūqù shēnzào。
He is diligent and entrepreneurial, so the higher authorities released him from his regular work for further study.
草原上有几匹脱缰的骏马在奔跑。
Cǎoyuán shàng yǒu jǐpǐ tuōjiāng de jùnmǎ zài bēnpǎo。
There are several runaway horses galloping on the prairie.
脱壳而出的小鸡眼睛还睁不开呢！
Tuōké ér chū de xiǎojī yǎnjīng hái zhēngbùkāi ne！
The chicks that have just come out of their eggs couldn\'t even open their eyes!
他的速算能力很强，看过算式后，得数就能脱口而出。
Tā de sùsuàn nénglì hěnqiáng，kànguò suànshì hòu，déshù jiùnéng tuōkǒuérchū。

这些新养殖的花卉有不少已经脱蕾了。

Many of the buds of these newly planted flowers have fallen off before blossoming.
使用这台脱粒机可以大大地提高劳动效率。

病人必须先脱敏，然后才能服用这种药物。

长时间暴露在阳光下，我的后背都有些脱皮了。
Chángshíjiān bàolù zài yángguāng xià，wǒ de hòubèi dōu yǒuxiē tuōpí le。
Long exposure to the sun made my back peel.
突然遭此横祸，他非得脱皮不可。

Suddenly encountering such a terrible misfortune, he must have been seriously hurt.
没想到在关键时刻他来了个金蝉脱壳。

Unexpectedly, he escaped through a crafty scheme at the essential moment.
请你把这篇文章上的脱误之处加以改正。

这片土地经过脱盐就可以种植庄稼了。
Zhè piàn tǔdì jīngguò tuōyán jiù kěyǐ zhòngzhí zhuāngjià le。

这人的下颌骨被打脱臼了，医生正在给他接呢。

这件事故和他脱不了干系。

tuōchū chánɡɡuǐ

Yéye xiǎoshíhou méi qián shàngxué，zhǐhǎo dāng gè fàngniúwá。
My grandfather had to herd cattle when he was young, as he was too poor to go to school.
割鸡焉用牛刀？你留下吧，让小王去处理这件事就可以了。
Gējī yānyòng niúdāo？ Nǐ liúxià ba，ràng Xiǎo Wáng qù chǔlǐ zhèjiànshì jiù kěyǐ le。
Why use an ox-cleaver to kill a chicken? You stay here and let Xiao Wang deal with this.
那几头耕牛正在耕田。
Nà jǐ tóu gēngniú zhèngzài gēngtián。
These farm cattle are ploughing.
你把牛拐棒剔下来，有人专门要买。
Nǐ bǎ niúguǎibàng tī xiàlái，yǒu rén zhuānmén yào mǎi。
Cut the meat from the leg bones, someone wants to buy them.
滚肥的牛犊一定能卖个好价钱。
Gǔnféi de niúdú yídìng néng mài gè hǎo jiàqián。
A round, and fat calf can sell for a high price.
这些牛羊肥得滚瓜流油，牧民们可高兴了。
Zhèxiē niúyáng féi de gǔnguā liúyóu，mùmínmen kě gāoxìng le。
The herdsmen are excited that the flocks of cattle, and sheep are round and fat.
这种药是以猴枣、牛黄为主要原料的中药制剂。
Zhèzhǒng yàoshì yǐ hóuzǎo、niúhuáng wéi zhǔyào yuánliào de zhōng yào zhìjì。
This is a traditional Chinese medical preparation with Houzao, and Niuhuang as the main ingredients.
做事一定要鸡口牛后，努力向前。
Zuòshì yídìng yào jīkǒu niúhòu，nǔlì xiàng qián。
It\'s better be a dog\'s head than a lion\'s tail. We must continuously improve ourselves.
驾犁耕种的神牛，一夜可耕千亩。
Jiàlí gēngzhòng de shénniú，yíyè kě gēng qiān mǔ。
The extraordinary ox, when pulling a sledge-like plough, can plough as much as 1/15  of a hectare of field a night.
这碟酱牛肉可以就饭吃。
Zhè dié jiàngniúròu kěyǐ jiù fàn chī。
This plate of soysauce beef can be eaten with rice.
老牛脾气倔犟，生起气来怎么赶它都不走！
Lǎoniú píqi juèjiàng，shēngqǐqìlái zěnme gǎn tā dōu bùzǒu！
This old ox is very stubborn. Once it is angry, nothing can make it move.
今年他家因为科学养牛成绩突出而被县里评为了科技示范户。
Jīnnián tā jiā yīnwèi kēxué yǎngniú chéngjì tūchū ér bèi xiànlǐ píngwéi le kējì shìfàn hù。
This year, his family was awarded the title of scientific and technological example by the county because of their excellent performance in scientifically raising cattle.
这条牛仔裤是喇叭口的款式，今年很流行。
Zhè tiáo niúzǐkù shì lǎbākǒu de kuǎnshì，jīnnián hěnliúxíng。
Jeans with flared legs are popular this year.
他正赶着牛拉着犁杖犁地呢。
Tā zhèng gǎn zhe niú lā zhe lízhàng lídì ne。
He is just driving the cattle, pulling a plough to plough the field.
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
绿野上有成群的牛羊，真是富饶之地啊。
Lǜyě shàng yǒu chéngqún de niúyáng，zhēnshì fùráo zhī dì a。

她不喜欢那种奶腥味，所以她几乎从不喝牛奶。

这条牛仔裤真耐穿，穿了2年了，还是没变形。

那些水牛总喜欢在泥淖里打滚儿。

在他的众多木工工具中，有一个师父送给他的牛头刨。

这孩子从小就倔，有一股牛性子。

冒牌货
màopáihuò 
an imitation (of a well-known trade mark); pirated goods
你家门牌几号？
Nǐ jiā ménpái jǐ hào? 
What\'s the street number of your house?
优质名牌商品
yōuzhì mínɡpái shānɡpǐn 
famous-brand quality products
创名牌
chuàngmíngpái
establish a brand
名牌香烟
míngpái xiāngyān
a famous brand of cigarettes
名牌产品
mínɡpái chǎnpǐn
best brands of products
名牌大学
míngpái dàxué
a prestigious university
囊括锦标赛上的全部四块金牌
nángkuò jǐnbiāosài shàng de quánbùsì kuài jīnpái
pocket all the four gold medals at the championships
车牌儿
chēpáir
number plate (on a vehicle)
(衣帽间等的)号码牌
（yīmàojiān děng de）hàomǎpái
check
你用什么牌的肥皂？
Nǐ yòngshénme pái de féizào?
What brand of soap do you use?
你的汽车是什么牌的？
Nǐ de qìchē shì shénme pái de?
What make is your car?
一副扑克牌
yí fù pūkèpái
a pack of playing cards
手里有一副好牌
shǒu lǐ yǒu yífù hǎo pái
have a good hand
该你出牌了！
Gāi nǐ chū pái le！
It\'s your turn. or Play your card!
按牌价打八折出售
àn páijià dǎbāzhé chūshòu
goods sold at a discount of 20% off the list prices
外汇牌价
wàihuì páijià
(foreign) exchange quotations
开盘牌价
kāipán páijià
an opening quotation
收盘牌价
shōupán páijià
a closing quotation
推牌九
tuī páijiǔ
play paijiu
许多牌例都已介绍过了。
Xǔduō páilì dōu yǐ jièshàoguò le。
Many different plays have already been described.
隐瞒牌情是一种常用的手段。
Yǐnmán páiqíngshì yì zhǒng chángyòng de shǒuduàn。
Keeping one\'s hand secret is a frequent tactic.
这次参赛的牌手很多。
Zhècì cānsài de páishǒu hěn duō。
There are many participants in this bridge tournament.
她牌艺高超。
Tā páiyì ɡāochāo。
She is a very skillful bridge player.
他的牌证批下来了。
Tā de páizhèngpī xiàlái le。
His licence was approved.
他的牌证表明他是个警察。
Tā de páizhèngbiǎomíngtā shì gè jǐngchá。
The badge he wears shows he is a policeman.
存车牌子
cún chē páizi
tally (for parking a bicycle)
老牌子
lǎopáizi
old brand; well-known brand
拼力夺取金牌
pīnlì duóqǔ jīnpái
go all out to win the gold medal
打桥牌
dǎ qiáopái
play bridge
我们时常玩儿牌。
Wǒmen shícháng wánr pái。
We often play cards.
他今天打牌的手气好得出奇。
Tā jīntiān dǎpái de shǒuqì hǎo de chūqí。
He\'s marvellously lucky at cards tonight.
迫使对方摊牌
pòshǐ duìfāng tānpái
force one\'s opponent to show his hand; force a showdown
门口停着一辆奔驰牌轿车。
Ménkǒu tíng zhe yí liàngbēnchípái jiàochē。
Parked in front of the gate was a Benz sedan.
玩儿牌
wánr pái 
play cards
这牌没洗开。
Zhè pái méi xǐkai。
The cards weren\'t shuffled properly.
他的车子是什么牌子、什么型号的？
Tā de chēzi shì shénme páizi、shénme xínghào de?
What make and model is his car?
邀几个朋友来打桥牌
yāo jǐgè péngyou lái dǎ qiáopái
invite (or ask) some friends over for a game of bridge
我们玩牌的时候，他站在一旁看着。
Wǒmen wán pái de shíhou，tā zhàn zài yìpángkàn zhe。
He stood by watching while we played cards.
咱们玩桥牌，我们俩一头，你们俩一头。
Zánmen wán qiáopái，wǒmen liǎ yìtóu，nǐmen liǎ yìtóu。
Let\'s play bridge, we two against you two.
打桥牌很有意思。
Dǎ qiáopái hěn yǒu yìsi。
Bridge is a lot of fun.
牌子硬
páizi yìng
a trademark of high standing; a prestigious trademark
杂牌货
zápáihuò
goods of an inferior brand
摘取金牌
zhāiqǔ jīnpái
win a gold medal
据说这招牌是一位名书法家写的。
Jùshuō zhè zhāopái shì yíwèi míngshūfǎjiā xiě de。
This signboard is said to have been written by a famous calligrapher.
打着人道主义的招牌
dǎ zhe réndàozhǔyì de zhāopái 
under the signboard of humanitarianism
今天的比赛裁判掏了两张红牌。
Jīntiān de bǐsài cáipàn tāo le liǎng zhāng hóngpái。
The referee showed two red cards in the game today.
为了庆祝春节，村子里搭起了高高的彩牌楼。
Wèile qìngzhù chūnjié，cūnzi lǐ dāqǐ le gāogāo de cǎipáilóu。
The villagers put up a tall archway to celebrate Spring Festival.
那个广告牌在大风中颤忽得很厉害，摇摇欲坠。
Nàge guǎnggàopái zài dàfēng zhōng chànhū de hěnlìhai，yáoyáoyùzhuì。
That large billboard shook in the strong wind.
他获得了上届奥运会撑竿跳高的金牌。
Tā huòdé le shàngjiè àoyùnhuì chēnggān tiàogāo de jīnpái。
He was the winner of the Pole Vault in the previous Olympic Games.
经过多年的努力，该品牌已经驰誉全国了。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，gāi pǐnpái yǐjing chíyù quánguó le。
After years of hard work, the brand earned a good reputation all over the country.
爸爸出牌特慢，其他人都着急了。
Bàba chūpái tèmàn，qítārén dōu zháojí le。
Father was very slow to show his cards, which made others  impatient.
在新产品上市的初始，一定要把创牌子作为首要任务。
Zài xīn chǎnpǐn shàngshì de chūshǐ，yídìng yào bǎ chuàngpáizi zuòwéi shǒuyào rènwù。
As a new product starts to enter the market, the priority is to establish the brand.
创作词时，我们要依据词牌的格式和要求。
Chuàngzuò cí shí，wǒmen yào yījù cípái de géshì hé yāoqiú。
When writing ci poems, we should follow the pattern and requirements of the name of the tunes to which ci poems are composed.
有些词牌对词韵的要求是相当严格的。
Yǒuxiē cípái duì cíyùn de yāoqiú shì xiāngdāng yángé de。
Some kinds of poems are very strict about rhyming.
由于质量问题，这种隐形眼镜护理液倒牌子了。
Yóuyú zhìliàng wèntí，zhèzhǒng yǐnxíng yǎnjìng hùlǐyè dǎo páizi le。
Due to its poor quality, the contact lens solution lost its credibility.
这个警示牌提示司机，此路段要保持低速行驶。
Zhège jǐngshìpái tíshì sījī，cǐ lùduàn yào bǎochí dīsù xíngshǐ。
This caution sign reminds drivers to keep a slow speed.
这几个老人每天斗牌，消磨时间。
Zhè jǐgè lǎorén měitiān dòupái，xiāomó shíjiān。
These old men play poker every day to pass the time.
他的对家牌技高超，赢了不少钱。
Tā de duìjiā páijì gāochāo，yíng le bùshǎo qián。
The person across from him is a very skilled poker player and, not surprisingly, turned out to be the biggest winner in the game, taking home a lot of money.
小明在学校运动会上夺得了短跑金牌。
Xiǎo Míng zài xuéxiào yùndònghuì shàng duódé le duǎnpǎo jīnpái。
Xiaoming won the gold medal for sprinting in the school sports meeting.
由于临场发挥失利，他没能拿到金牌，令人扼腕叹息。
Yóuyú línchǎng fāhuī shīlì，tā méi néng ná dào jīnpái，lìngrén èwàn tànxī。
What a pity that, due to underperforming, he failed to win the gold medal.
有人说，翻牌公司的出现是改革中的倒退。
Yǒu rén shuō，fānpái gōngsī de chūxiàn shì gǎigé zhōng de dàotuì。
Some people believe that government bodies turning into companies is a step backwards.
打牌输了就要被刮鼻子。
Dǎpái shū le jiùyào bèi guābízi。
Losers will receive a scrape on the nose.
大宅门里的贵妇们每天就是打打牌，看看戏。
Dàzháimén lǐ de guìfùmen měitiān jiùshì dǎdǎ pái，kànkàn xì。
Everyday activities of the female elite include; playing cards, and watching operas.
请大家按照号牌儿，依次领取节日礼品。
Qǐng dàjiā ànzhào hàopáir，yīcì lǐngqǔ jiérì lǐpǐn。
Everyone get your festive gift one by one according to your number plates, please.
他的护具是名牌，花了不少钱。
Tā de hùjù shì míngpái，huā le bùshǎo qián。
His protective outfits are name brands, which has cost a lot of money.
他尽日玩牌喝酒，不务正业。
Tā jìnrì wánpái hējiǔ，búwù zhèngyè。
He drinks and plays cards every day, and never attends to his proper duties.
这个品牌是同类产品中最有技术实力的，因而在市场上它已据有半壁江山。
Zhège pǐnpái shì tónglèi chǎnpǐn zhōng zuì yǒu jìshù shílì de，yīnér zài shìchǎng shàng tā yǐ jùyǒu bànbì jiāngshān。
This brand is the most competitive product among all similar products, therefore it occupies half of the market.
那个牌子的酸奶，菌落总数符合国家标准。
Nàge páizi de suānnǎi，jūnluò zǒngshù fúhé guójiā biāozhǔn。
As to that brand of yoghurt, the total number of its bacterial colonies meets the state standard.
桥牌的开叫是有一系列规则的。
Qiáopái de kāijiào shì yǒu yíxìliè guīzé de。
The bidding of bridge has a series of rules.
以她的考分，绝对可以上那个名牌大学。
Yǐ tā de kǎofēn，juéduì kěyǐ shàng nàge míngpái dàxué。
With her results in the exam, she can definitely go that famous university.
她成绩这么优秀，可以说考上一所名牌大学是没问题的。
Tā chéngjì zhème yōuxiù，kěyǐ shuō kǎoshàng yìsuǒ míngpái dàxué shì méi wèntí de。
She does exceedingly well in her studies and should have no problem being admitted to a prestigious university.
这个牌子的蔻丹在指甲上保持的时间较久，颜色也鲜亮，许多小姑娘都很喜欢。
Zhège páizi de kòudān zài zhǐjiǎ shàng bǎochí de shíjiān jiào jiǔ，yánsè yě xiānliàng，xǔduō xiǎogūniang dōu hěnxǐhuan。
The nail polish of this brand, having long persistence and bright color, is many girls\' favorite.
他很讲究衣着品位，连裤腰带都是名牌的。
Tā hěnjiǎngjiū yīzháo pǐnwèi，lián kùyāodài dōushì míngpái de。
He shows good taste in clothes; even his waist belts are of a famous brand.
我们经常在修表、配钥匙的摊位上见到“立等可取”的牌子。
Wǒmen jīngcháng zài xiūbiǎo、pèiyàoshi de tānwèi shàng jiàndào“lìděng kěqǔ”de páizi。
We often see board written with &quot;wait a minute, and you can get it&quot; in front of stalls for watch-repairing, and key-making.
他亮牌子后我们才知道他的真实身份。
Tā liàngpáizi hòu wǒmen cái zhīdào tā de zhēnshí shēnfèn。
It was not until he showed his cards that we knew his true identity.
爸爸从商店买了一双名牌溜冰鞋给她。
Bàba cóng shāngdiàn mǎi le yìshuāng míngpái liūbīngxié gěi tā。
Father bought her a pair of famous brand skates in a store.
这块牌匾是由满文写成的，我看不懂。
Zhèkuài páibiǎn shì yóu mǎnwén xiěchéng de，wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
The inscribed board is written in Man language, which I cannot understand.
这是一支靡坚不摧的王牌军队。
Zhè shì yìzhī míjiān bùcuī de wángpái jūnduì。
This is a perfect victory army.
她不会玩扑克牌，对于伙伴们说的各种玩法，她完全不摸头。
Tā búhuì wán pūkèpái，duìyú huǒbànmen shuō de gèzhǒng wánfǎ，tā wánquán bùmōtóu。
She doesn’t know how to play cards, and is in a loss as to the kinds of ways her friends talk about.
这个牌子的冰淇淋添加了过多的凝固剂。
Zhège páizi de bīngqílín tiānjiā le guòduō de nínggùjì。
The ice cream of this brand has too much coagulant.
他在商场买了一套名牌棋具。
Tā zài shāngchǎng mǎi le yítào míngpái qíjù。
He bought a famous brand of chess set from the shopping mall.
我们省在这次全运会上拿了12枚金牌。
Wǒmen shěng zài zhècì quányùnhuì shàng ná le shí\'èr méi jīnpái。
Our province got twelve gold medals in the National Games.
这个品牌的红酒都有一个严密的软木塞。
Zhège pǐnpái de hóngjiǔ dōu yǒu yígè yánmì de ruǎnmùsāi。
This brand of red wine of this brand all has air tight corks.
这座高档商城里，出售很多种名牌服装。
Zhèzuò gāodàng shāngchéng lǐ，chūshòu hěnduō zhǒng míngpái fúzhuāng。
Famous brands of clothing are sold in this high-grade shopping center.
他穿的那件深黄色西装，一看就是名牌货。
Tā chuān de nà jiàn shēn huángsè xīzhuāng，yí kàn jiùshì míngpáihuò。
At first sight, you can see that the dark yellow suit he\'s wearing is of a famous brand.
剧场门外的水牌上刚写出梅兰芳的演出预告，票就被抢购一空了。
Jùchǎng ménwài de shuǐpái shàng gāng xiěchū Méi Lánfāng de yǎnchū yùgào，piào jiù bèi qiǎnggòuyìkōng le。
The moment the announcement of Mei Lanfang\'s performance was written on the billboard outside the theater, tickets sold out in a rush.
昨天晚上我们通宿打牌直到天亮。
Zuótiān wǎnshàng wǒmen tōngxiǔ dǎpái zhídào tiānliàng。
We played cards the whole night last night.
头家出牌太慢了，我有些不耐烦。
Tóujiā chūpái tài màn le，wǒ yǒuxiē bú nàifán。
The opponent on my left was too slow in discarding cards, so I got a little impatient.
今天的戏一定精彩，因为是梅兰芳先生挂头牌。
Jīntiān de xì yídìng jīngcǎi，yīnwèi shì Méi Lánfāng xiānshēng guà tóupái。
Today\'s opera will definitely be wonderful, because Mr. Mei Lanfang is the leading actor.
他可以根据汽车后面的图记认清车子的品牌。
Tā kěyǐ gēnjù qìchē hòumiàn de tújì rènqīng chēzi de pǐnpái。
He can tell a car\'s brand according to the sign on the back.
与外货相比较，我们的国产品牌也并不差！
Yǔ wàihuò xiāng bǐjiào，wǒmen de guóchǎn pǐnpái yě bìng búchà！
Our national brands are not worse than those foreign ones!
由于汽车尾牌破损严重，他被交警拦了下来。
Yóuyú qìchē wěipái pòsǔn yánzhòng，tā bèi jiāojǐng lán le xiàlái。
Since the tailboard of the car was seriously broken, he was stopped by the traffic policeman.
听说这个品牌有款去痘洗面奶效果不错。
Tīngshuō zhège pǐnpái yǒu kuǎn qùdòu xǐmiànnǎi xiàoguǒ búcuò。
It is said this kind of facial foam can treat acne very effectively.
这个牌子的手机下端一般有红外或蓝牙接口。
Zhège páizi de shǒujī xiàduān yìbān yǒu hóngwài huò lányá jiēkǒu。
This brand\'s cell phones usually have their IR, or Bluetooth interface in its the lower end.
弟弟新买了一部价值五千元的海鸥牌像机。
Dìdi xīn mǎi le yíbù jiàzhí wǔqiān yuán de hǎiōupái xiàng jī。
My sister bought a new &quot;sea-gull&quot; camera which cost him 5000 yuan.
商场正在进行名牌消毒柜八折优惠活动。
Shāngchǎng zhèngzài jìnxíng míngpái xiāodúguì bā shé yōuhuì huódòng。
The mall is giving a 20% discount on some brand-name sterilizers.
这种牌子的鞋粉我还是第一次见到。
Zhèzhǒng páizi de xiéfěn wǒ háishi dìyīcì jiàndào。
It is the first time for me to see shoe powder of this brand.
他们四个人正在休息室里打牌呢。
Tāmen sì gè rén zhèngzài xiūxishì lǐ dǎpái ne。
The four of them are playing cards in the lounge.
这个牌子的杀虫剂是悬浊液，你别搞错了。
Zhège páizi de shāchóngjì shì xuánzhuóyè，nǐ bié gǎo cuò le。
The pesticide of this brand is a kind of turbid liquid. Pay attention not to mistake it with others.
爸爸从商场买回了一台万利达牌的影碟机。
Bàba cóng shāngchǎng mǎihuí le yìtái wànlìdápái de yǐngdiéjī。
Father bought a Wanlida video disk player from the shop.
从小他就有把重要的事都记在月份牌儿上的习惯。
Cóng xiǎo tā jiù yǒu bǎ zhòngyào de shì dōu jìzài yuèfèn páir shàng de xíguàn。
Since young, he has had a habit of writing important things on a calendar.
杂牌军在战斗中也能发挥重要作用。
Zápáijūn zài zhàndòu zhōng yě néng fāhuī zhòngyào zuòyòng。
Inferior troops can play an equally important part in battles.
欺骗消费者就是砸自己的牌子。
Qīpiàn xiāofèizhě jiùshì zá zìjǐ de páizi。
Tricking consumers ruins a company\'s reputation.
他因为看错了站牌，所以花了很多时间等车。
Tā yīnwèi kàncuò le zhànpái，suǒyǐ huā le hěnduō shíjiān děng chē。
He made a mistake when looking at the stop sign, so that it took him a long time to get his bus.
他总是买正牌商品。
Tā zǒngshì mǎi zhèngpái shāngpǐn。
He always buy certified goods.
主裁和第四官员商量着什么，然后掏出了红牌。
Zhǔcái hé dìsì guānyuán shāngliang zhe shénme，ránhòu tāo chū le hóngpái。
他远远地就看到那家保险公司的招牌。
Tā yuǎnyuǎn de jiù kàndào nàjiā bǎoxiǎn gōngsī de zhāopái。
He saw the big sign of that insurance company from a long distance away.
这个牌子的打字纸平整细腻、适印性好。
Zhège páizi de dǎzìzhǐ píngzhěng xìnì、shìyìnxìng hǎo。
This brand of printing paper is fine, level, and of good quality.
这种牌子的豆腐干有麻辣和孜然两种口味。
Zhèzhǒng páizi de dòufugān yǒu málà hé zīrán liǎngzhǒng kǒuwèi。
Dried bean curd of this brand has two flavors, spice and fennel.
这是一个可以自动变换画面的广告牌。
Zhè shì yígè kěyǐ zìdòng biànhuàn huàmiàn de guǎnggàopái。
This is an advertising board that can automatically change its picture.
这个牌子的葵花子很好吃！
Zhège páizi de kuíhuāzǐ hěnhǎo chī！
Sunflower seeds of this brand are tasty.
我一直使用格兰仕牌微波炉，质量很有保证。
Wǒ yìzhí shǐyòng Gélánshì pái wēibōlú，zhìliàng hěn yǒu bǎozhèng。
I have been using a Galanz oven all along, and can tell you that it is quality-guaranteed.
我家卫生间的卫生设备都是名牌的。
Wǒjiā wèishēngjiān de wèishēngshèbei dōushì míngpái de。

She often adds some potato starch paste when cooking cucumber with shrimp.
这坛子老汤下次腌咸菜时还可以用，不要倒掉。

shàngcài

We still have some of the cabbages laid in for winter at home.
如今，大白菜不再是北方人冬天的当家菜。

Today, Chinese cabbage is no longer the main dish for northern people in winter.

I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.
地窖里有几十斤冬贮大白菜。

The cabbages he bought are all piled up in the cellar.

Each family stores a large amount of cabbage for the winter every year.

shúxí shūcài de zāipéifǎ
have the knack of growing vegetables
不知我这些菜你吃来顺口不顺口？
Bùzhī wǒ zhèxiēcài nǐ chīlái shùnkǒu bú shùnkǒu?
I wonder if my dishes are to your taste.
这盘菜里一丝儿肉也见不着。
Zhè pán cài lǐ yì sīr ròu yě jiàn bu zháo。
Not a single shred of meat can you find in this dish.
这村子四围都是菜地。
Zhè cūnzi sìwéi dōushì càidì。
All around the village are vegetable fields.
饭菜馊了。
Fàncài sōu le。
The food has spoiled. or The food smells a bit off.
菜摊子
càitānzi
vegetable stall (or stand)
三菜一汤
sān cài yì tāng
soup and three other courses
糖甜菜
tánɡtiáncài 
sugar beet
甜菜糖
tiáncài tánɡ 
beet sugar
这个菜甜丝丝儿的。
Zhège cài tiánsīsīr de。
This dish is sweet and delicious.
挑着一担菜
tiāo zhe yí dàn cài 
carrying two baskets of vegetables on a shoulder pole
菜团子
càituánzi 
cornmeal dumpling with vegetable stuffing
腻虫为害蔬菜。
Nìchóngwéihài shūcài。
Aphids are destructive to vegetables.
用篱笆把菜园子围上
yònglíba bǎ càiyuánzi wéi shàng
enclose the vegetable patch with a fence
这个菜味道很好。
Zhège cài wèidao hěn hǎo。
This dish is delicious.
菜瓮
càiwènɡ 
a jar for pickling vegetables
把蔬菜放在自来水龙头下洗涮干净。
Bǎ shūcài fàngzài zìláishuǐ lóngtóu xià xǐshuàn gānjìng。
Give the vegetables a good rinse with running water.
这么多菜我吃不下。
Zhème duō cài wǒ chībuxià。
I can\'t eat all this food.
你这两个菜都不喜欢，拿什么下饭呀？
Nǐ zhè liǎnggè cài dōu bùxǐhuan，ná shénme xiàfàn ya?
If you don\'t like either of the two dishes, what are you going to have with your rice?
这个菜下酒不下饭。
Zhège cài xiàjiǔ bú xiàfàn。
This dish goes well with wine, but not with rice.
这菜不下酒。
Zhè cài bú xiàjiǔ。
This dish doesn\'t go very well with wine.
菜太咸了。
Cài tài xián le。
The dish is too salty.
炒什么菜啊？好香呀！
Chǎo shénme cài a？Hǎo xiāngya！
Mmm! What\'s cooking? It smells delicious.
白菜心
báicàixīn
the heart of a Chinese cabbage
腌菜
yān cài
pickled vegetables; pickles
腌制酱菜
yānzhì jiàngcài
make pickles
一场严霜，把白菜秧儿都给冻坏了。
Yìcháng yánshuāng，bǎ báicàiyāngr dōu gěi dònghuài le。
A severe frost killed the cabbage sprouts.
她头一次上街卖菜，不好意思吆喝。
Tā tóu yícì shàngjiē màicài，bùhǎoyìsi yāohe。
The first time she went out selling vegetables, she was too shy to cry out for customers.
我要了两个菜。
Wǒ yào le liǎnggè cài。
I ordered two dishes.
把菜籽平分一下，给他们一半儿，咱们留一半儿。
Bǎ càizǐ píngfēn yíxià，gěi tāmen yíbànr zánmen liú yíbànr。
Let\'s share the vegetable seeds with them, share and share alike.
把菜吃个一干二净
bǎ cài chī gè yìgān\'èrjìng
eat up all the food
顾客进来，服务引座，递菜单。
Gùkè jìnlái，fúwù yǐn zuò，dì càidān。
The waiters usher customers to their tables and hand them menus.
油菜籽
yóucàizǐ 
rapeseed
这个菜油水太大。
Zhège cài yóushuǐ tài dà。
This dish is too greasy.
菜园子
càiyuánzi
vegetable garden; vegetable farm
四个菜，一个汤，怎么样？
Sì gè cài，yígè tāng，zěnmeyàng?
Four dishes and one soup—what do you think?
菜凉了，蒸一蒸吧。
Cài liáng le，zhēngyizhēng ba。
The food is cold. Let\'s warm it up in the steamer.

zhěnɡzhì fàncài

正宗川菜
zhèngzōngChuāncài 
genuine Sichuan cooking

zhíbāncài

Zhège cài hěn yǒu zīwèi。
This dish tastes good.
菜单
càidān
menu; bill of fare
菜农
càinóng
vegetable grower
上菜
shàngcài
serve the dishes (of food)
一桌菜
yì zhuō cài
a table of dishes
我最喜欢吃妈妈做的热腾腾的饭菜。
Wŏ zuì xǐhuan chī māma zuòde rètēngtēng de fàncài。
我每次炒菜都要放八角茴香。
Wǒ měi cì chǎocài dōuyào fàng bājiǎo huíxiāng。
Every time I cook I use spice.
他喜欢吃白饭就咸菜。
Tā xǐhuan chī báifàn jiù xiáncài.
He likes to have rice and pickles for meals.
剩的饭菜已经变味儿，不能再吃了。
Shèng de fàncài yǐjing biànwèir，bùnéng zài chī le。
The leftovers have gone bad, and cannot be eaten.
我的家乡盛产菠咰菜。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng shèngchǎn bōxúncài。
My hometown is a famous producer of spinach.
妈妈喜欢用不粘锅烧菜。
Māma xǐhuan yòng bùzhānguō shāocài。
My mother loves to cook with a non-stick pan.
别人给您布菜时，一定要表示感谢。
Biérén gěi nín bùcài shí，yídìng yào biǎoshì gǎnxiè。
You should thank the one who served you food at a meal.
我们饭店正在招聘菜案师傅。
Wǒmen fàndiàn zhèngzài zhāopìn càiàn shīfu。
Our restaurant is recruiting new chefs.
工商部门要严厉打击菜霸。
Gōngshāng bùmén yào yánlì dǎjī càibà。
The industry department must play tough with those who dominate the food market.
这么点事都办不成，你真是个菜包子。
Zhème diǎn shì dōu bànbùchéng，nǐ zhēn shì gè càibāozi。
Incapable of nothing, you are like a green vegetable-stuffed bun!
粤式菜点真是好吃。
Yuèshì càidiǎn zhēnshì hǎochī。
The Cantonese dishes, and desserts are very delicious.
家里应该换个新的菜墩子了。
Jiā lǐ yīnggāi huàngè xīn de càidūnzi le。
We should buy a new chopping board.
妈妈正在厨房熬制菜饭。
Māma zhèngzài chúfáng áozhì càifàn。
My mother is cooking vegetable rice in the kitchen.
这只菜鸽还不够肥，再养养吧。
Zhèzhī càigē hái búgòu féi，zài yǎngyǎng ba。
This edible pigeon is not fat enough; let’s keep it a little while longer.
每个月交的饭费里有一半是菜金。
Měigè yuè jiāo de fànfèi lǐ yǒu yíbàn shì càijīn。
Half of the monthly meal expenses are for dishes.
他在自家的院子里开辟了一小块菜圃。
Tā zài zìjiā de yuànzi lǐ kāipì le yì xiǎo kuài càipǔ。
He cleared a little vegetable garden in his yard.
这个村子是靠饲养菜蛇致富的。
Zhège cūnzi shì kào sìyǎng càishé zhìfù de。
This village got rich by keeping edible snakes.
今天午饭的主食是菜团子。
Jīntiān wǔfàn de zhǔshí shì càituánzi。
The main staple food for today’s lunch is vegetable rolls.
这家店专门出售菜秧。
Zhèjiā diàn zhuānmén chūshòu càiyāng。
This store specializes in selling vegetable seedling.
大多数家庭里食用的都是菜子油。
Dàduōshù jiātíng lǐ shíyòng de dōushì càizǐyóu。
Most families use rapeseed oil for cooking.
他买来两包菜籽，准备来年播种。
Tā mǎilái liǎng bāo càizǐ，zhǔnbèi láinián bōzhǒng。
He bought two packages of vegetable seeds to sow next year.
四川省的菜籽产量很高。
Sìchuān Shěng de càizǐ chǎnliàng hěngāo。
Sichuan Province has a large production of rapeseed.
菜籽油和大豆油对人体都有好处。
Càizǐyóu hé dàdòuyóu duì réntǐ dōu yǒuhǎochu。
Rapeseed oil, and soybean oil are good for health.
下面，我将向大家介绍一个清除蔬菜残毒的方法。
Xiàmiàn，wǒ jiāng xiàng dàjiā jièshào yígè qīngchú shūcài cándú de fāngfǎ。
Next, I will show you a method to remove the remaining poisons on the vegetables.
这个菜的原料是长条茄子。
Zhège cài de yuánliào shì chángtiáo qiézi。
The material of this dish is long- thin eggplants.
他买了两棵白菜并放在了自行车的车筐里。
Tā mǎi le liǎng kē báicài bìng fàngzài le zìxíngchē de chēkuāng lǐ。
He bought two cabbages, and put them in his bicycle\'s basket.
他又买了一些白菜种子，准备趁墒种下去。
Tā yòu mǎi le yìxiē báicài zhǒng zi，zhǔnbèi chèn shāng zhòng xiàqù。
He bought some cabbage seeds again, and he plans to grow them when the soil is moist enough.
他没有要炒菜，只吃白饭。
Tā méiyǒu yào chǎocài，zhǐ chī báifàn。
He only ate plain rice.
再过两天这些菜就吃不得了。
Zài guò liǎngtiān zhèxiē cài jiù chībùdé le。
These dishes will go bad after a few days.
翅子是招待贵宾时才选用的菜肴。
Chìzi shì zhāodài guìbīn shí cái xuǎnyòng de càiyáo。
Shark fin is only served when dining with honored guests.
他家的饭菜一天三顿都不重样，这要归功于女主人。
Tā jiā de fàncài yìtiān sān dùn dōu bùchóngyàng，zhè yào guīgōng yú nǚzhǔrén。
Three meals in his home were never served with the same dishes, this should be a credit to the hostess.
炒菜时不小心把水滴溅入油锅中，发出了欻拉欻拉的响声。
Chǎocài shí bùxiǎoxīn bǎ shuǐdī jiànrù yóuguō zhōng，fāchū le chuālā chuālā de xiǎngshēng。
The water drop spattered into the oil in the pan due to my carelessness while cooking.
川菜以其麻辣鲜香的味道得到了众多人的喜爱。
Chuāncài yǐ qí málàxiānxiāng de wèidào dédào le zhòngduōrén de xǐ\'ài。
Sichuan style food, with its spicy and delicious taste, has won many people\'s love.
为了防止蔬菜串花，他做了隔离工作。
Wèile fángzhǐ shūcài chuànhuā，tā zuò le gélí gōngzuò。
He has isolated different kinds of vegetables so as to avoid possible hybridization.
你跑那里去了，这菜都烧的串烟了。
Nǐ pǎo nàlǐ qù le，zhè cài dōu shāo de chuànyān le。
Where have you been? This dish is burning and giving off a smoky smell.
炊事班班长炒的菜可难吃了。
Chuīshìbān bānzhǎng chǎo de cài kě nánchī le。
The dishes made by the monitor of the cookhouse are unpalatable.
野生的刺儿菜营养价值很高。
Yěshēng de cìrcài yíngyǎng jiàzhí hěngāo。
The wild thistle has a very high nutritional value.
成天吃粗菜，今天改个样吧。
Chéngtiān chī cūcài，jīntiān gǎi gè yàng ba。
We eat common vegetables all the time, let\'s have something else for a change today.
今天的青菜可真脆嫩。
Jīntiān de qīngcài kě zhēn cuìnèn。
Today\'s vegetables are very crisp and fresh.
这碟酱菜，真脆生。
Zhè dié jiàngcài，zhēn cuìshēng。
This dish of pickles is crisp and refreshing.
这个翠生生的玉白菜，价值连城。
Zhège cuìshēngshēng de yùbáicài，jiàzhí liánchéng。
The emerald green Chinese cabbage made of jade is very valuable.
我家还存有一些过冬的大白菜。
Wǒjiā hái cúnyǒu yìxiē guòdōng de dàbáicài。
We still have some of the cabbages laid in for winter at home.
知道你是个大肚子，特意为你烧了很多菜。
Zhīdào nǐ shì gè dàdùzi，tèyì wèi nǐ shāo le hěnduō cài。
I have cooked many dishes, because I know you have a great appetite.
今年农民不再一窝蜂似的种大路菜了。
Jīnnián nóngmín búzài yìwōfēng sì de zhòng dàlùcài le。
Farmers didn\'t have to scrambled to plant common vegetables this year.
他们一大清早，就去大棚里摘菜。
Tāmen yídàqīngzǎo，jiù qù dàpéng lǐ zhāicài。
They go to pick vegetables in the green house early in the morning.
冬天，北方很多地区的人喜欢吃大肉炖酸菜。
Dōngtiān，běifāng hěnduō dìqū de rén xǐhuan chī dàròudùnsuāncài。
In North China during the winter many people eat pickle vegetables, and pork stew.
加点蛋黄粉，这道菜就会更好吃。
Jiā diǎn dànhuángfěn，zhè dào cài jiùhuì gèng hǎochī。
This dish would be more delicious with some yolk powder.
本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐。
Běndiàn de dāngjiācài shì mápódòufu。
Ma Po\'s bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.
这把刀子是用来割韭菜的。
Zhèbǎ dāozi shì yònglái gē jiǔcài de。
This pocket knife is used to cut chives.
请把鼠标拖到菜单栏的底端。
Qǐng bǎ shǔbiāo tuōdào càidānlán de dǐduān。
Please drag the mouse to the bottom of the menu bar.
他家地窖子里储藏了很多蔬菜。
Tā jiā dìjiàozi lǐ chǔcáng le hěnduō shūcài。
The cellar in his family stores many vegetables.
用电炒锅做出来的饭菜，味道鲜美。
Yòng diànchǎoguō zuò chūlái de fàncài，wèidào xiānměi。
Food cooked in an electric frying pan is very delicious.
店主亲自为我们介绍这里的特色菜肴。
Diànzhǔ qīnzì wèi wǒmen jièshào zhèlǐ de tèsè càiyáo。
The restaurant owner himself introduced to us their specialties.
我打算把这些剩余的大白菜冬藏起来。
Wǒ dǎsuan bǎ zhèxiē shèngyú de dàbáicài dōngcáng qǐlai。
I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.
地窖里有几十斤冬贮大白菜。
Dìjiào lǐ yǒu jǐ shí jīn dōngzhù dàbáicài。
There are dozens of cabbages stored in winter.
饭菜都端上来了，可他半天不动口。
Fàncài dōu duān shànglái le，kě tā bàntiān bú dòngkǒu。
The food was served, but he refused to eat  for a long while.
把冻肉化开吧，我准备炒菜了。
Bǎ dòngròu huàkāi ba，wǒ zhǔnbèi chǎocài le。
Please defrost the frozen meat for me, I am going to cook it.
即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。
Jíshǐ zài dōngjì，wǒmen yě kěyǐ chī dào xīnxiān de dòngzicài。
Even in winter, fresh vegetables are still available because we can plant them in greenhouses.
这个菜肴的原料是豆腐皮。
Zhège càiyáo de yuánliào shì dòufupí。
The dish is made from the skin of soy-bean milk.
把豆子长时间浸水后，就会长出豆芽菜。
Bǎ dòuzi chángshíjiān jìnshuǐ hòu，jiùhuì zhǎngchū dòuyácài。
Put beans in the water for a long time and out come bean sprouts.
这孩子从小就体弱多病，长得像个豆芽菜。
Zhè háizi cóngxiǎo jiù tǐruò duōbìng，zhǎng de xiàng gè dòuyácài。
The kid has a weak body, he is very thin but tall.
这次买回来的白菜，又短秤了。
Zhècì mǎi huílái de báicài，yòu duǎnchèng le。
I was given short weight again when I bought the cabbage.
他把刚买来的大白菜堆垛在地窖里。
Tā bǎ gāng mǎi lái de dàbáicài duīduòzàidìjiào lǐ。
The cabbages he bought are all piled up in the cellar.
这个餐馆的菜我吃起来很对胃口。
Zhège cānguǎn de cài wǒ chī qǐlai hěn duìwèikǒu。
The dishes in this restaurant are very much to my taste.
他说这白菜概不二价。
Tā shuō zhè báicài gài bùèrjià。
He said he won\'t accept any bargaining for the cabbage.
据说，淮扬菜发轫于先秦时期。
Jùshuō，huáiyángcài fārèn yú xiānqín shíqī。
The Huaiyang dish is said to originate from the pre-Qin period.
这菠菜发涩，不太好吃。
Zhè bōcài fāsè，bùtài hǎochī。
The spinach tastes bitter.
历史上，发菜曾是进奉皇帝的贡品。
Lìshǐ shàng，fàcài céng shì jìnfèng huángdì de gòngpǐn。
In the past, long thread moss was offered to emperors as a tribute.
去买个菜竟然丢了钱包，这事想起来就觉得犯堵！
Qù mǎi gè cài jìngrán diū le qiánbāo，zhè shì xiǎng qǐlai jiù jué de fàndǔ！
It drives me mad to know that he lost his wallet when going to the market.
他们单位饭堂的伙食还不错，饭菜品种挺多的。
Tāmen dānwèi fàntáng de huǒshí hái búcuò，fàncài pǐnzhǒng tǐng duō de。
Their staff restaurant serves nice meals with a lot of variety.
听说多吃新鲜的蔬菜水果，可以美容防老。
Tīngshuō duō chī xīnxiān de shūcài shuǐguǒ，kěyǐ měiróng fánglǎo。
Eating fresh vegetables and fruits can have the effect of making one look young and beautiful.
她做黄瓜虾仁这道菜时，喜欢用一点土豆过滤的粉芡。
Tā zuò huángguā xiārén zhè dào cài shí，xǐhuan yòng yìdiǎn tǔdòu guòlǜ de fěnqiàn。
She often adds some potato starch paste when cooking cucumber with shrimp.
“荷叶粉蒸肉”是一道杭州名菜。
“Héyèfěnzhēngròu”shì yídào Hángzhōu míngcài。
One of the famous dishes in Hangzhou is pork steamed with ground rice flour wrapped in lotus leaves.
你请我吃中国菜，那敢情好！
Nǐ qǐng wǒ chī Zhōngguócài，nà gǎnqíng hǎo！
You treated me to Chinese food, that\'s really great.
我们就着高粱米吃着农家菜。
Wǒmen jiù zhe gāoliángmǐ chī zhe nóngjiācài。
We ate country dishes to go with husked sorghum.
这几名厨师各显神通，亮出了他们的拿手好菜。
Zhè jǐ míng chúshī gèxiǎn shéntōng，liàngchū le tāmen de náshǒu hǎocài。
Each chef shows his own prowess, and makes his special dishes.
我正要跟着他去买菜。
Wǒ zhèngyào gēn zhe tā qù mǎicài。
I am going to accompany him to buy vegetables.
勾芡是改善菜肴的口味、色泽、形态的重要手段。
Gōuqiàn shì gǎishàn càiyáo de kǒuwèi、sèzé、xíngtài de zhòngyào shǒuduàn。
Gouqian, as one step in the Chinese cooking process, is an important means for improving the taste, color and shape of dishes.
青菜剩得不多了，他准备估堆儿卖了。
Qīngcài shèng de bùduō le，tā zhǔnbèi gūduīr mài le。
Without many green vegetables left, he planned to sell them in piles.
《报菜名》是传统相声中一段很精彩的贯口活。
《Bàocàimíng》 shì chuántǒngxiàngshēng zhōng yíduàn hěnjīngcǎi de guànkǒuhuó。
&quot;Reporting the dish names&quot; is an excellent Guankou piece of traditional cross talk.
多吃海白菜对人的健康非常有益。
Duōchī hǎibáicài duì rén de jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Eating sea lettuce frequently is very good for one\'s health.
这道菜很好吃，卖得很好。
Zhè dào cài hěnhǎo chī，mài de hěnhǎo。
This dish is delicious, and sells well.
这道菜，你觉得合胃口吗？
Zhè dào cài，nǐ juédé hé wèikǒu ma？
Is this dish cooked to your taste?
那边山上有一片红丹丹的山菜花。
Nàbiān shān shàng yǒu yípiàn hóngdāndān de shāncàihuā。
There is a large area of flaming red camellia on the mountain beyond.
奶奶最爱吃红果儿淹渍的咸菜。
Nǎinai zuì àichī hóngguǒr yānzì de xiáncài。
Grandma loved haw-pickled cabbage the most.
食用野生的灰菜应注意安全。
Shíyòng yěshēng de huīcài yīng zhùyì ānquán。
When eating wild pigweed, you should pay attention to your safety.
他烧得一手好菜，最拿手的是回锅肉。
Tā shāo de yì shǒu hǎocài，zuì náshǒu de shì huíguōròu。
He is very skilled cook, and he is most adept in cooking double-fried pork.
妈妈买了茴香豆给爸爸做下酒菜。
Māma mǎi le huíxiāngdòu gěi bàba zuò xiàjiǔcài。
Mom has bought some fennel beans for Dad to go with the wine.
用鸡毛菜包的包子是很好吃的。
Yòng jīmáocài bāo de bāozi shì hěnhǎo chī de。

刚吃完这道菜他就极口称赞其色香味俱全。
Gāng chīwán zhè dào cài tā jiù jíkǒu chēngzàn qí sèxiāngwèi jùquán。
The moment he had polished off this dish, he praised its color, smell and taste to the skies.
急火现炸，是做某些菜肴的一种很好的办法。
Jíhuǒ xiànzhá，shì zuò mǒuxiē càiyáo de yìzhǒng hěnhǎo de bànfǎ。
Frying on a hot fire is a good method to make certain dishes.
这个市场虽然不大，但是我市大部分蔬菜都是在此集散。
Zhège shìchǎng suīrán búdà，dànshì wǒ shì dàbùfen shūcài dōushì zàicǐ jísàn。
Although not big, this market is the main concentration and distribution center for our city\'s vegetables.
她家的院子里种满了尖椒，胡萝卜，洋葱等蔬菜。
Tā jiā de yuànzi lǐ zhòngmǎn le jiānjiāo，húluóbo，yángcōng děng shūcài。
In her courtyard, there grow pointed peppers, carrots, onions and other vegetables.
春节期间菜价一直坚俉，实在不是好事情。
Chūnjié qījiān càijià yìzhí jiānwù，shízai búshì hǎo shìqing。
The price of food stayed high all through Spring Festival, which is by no means good news.
海边的人们经常用江蓠做菜。
Hǎibiān de rénmen jīngcháng yòng jiānglí zuò cài。
People who live by the sea often make dishes from  Gracilaria gracilis.
西红柿又叫作番茄，既是蔬菜又可以当水果吃。
Xīhóngshì yòu jiàozuò fānqié，jìshì shūcài yòu kěyǐ dāng shuǐguǒ chī。
In Chinese language, xihongshi (tomato) is also called fanqie, which can be called a vegetable as well as a fruit.
菜园窖肥是一件很麻烦的事。
Càiyuán jiàoféi shì yíjiàn hěnmáfan de shì。
It is time-consuming to make water-logged compost in the vegetable garden.
我在用水浸取甜菜中的糖分。
Wǒ zài yòng shuǐ jìnqǔ tiáncài zhōng de tángfèn。
I am abstracting sugar from beets by immersing them in water.
这杆秤非常精准，买菜的人都用它。
Zhè gǎn chèng fēicháng jīngzhǔn，mǎicài de rén dōu yòng tā。
This kind of lever scale is very exact and is used by many consumers.
大家别光喝酒，就菜呀。
Dàjiā bié guāng hējiǔ，jiù cài ya。
Do not just drink, have some dishes.
今天也没做什么好菜，大家就合着吃点吧。
Jīntiān yě méizuò shénme hǎocài，dàjiā jiùhé zhe chī diǎn ba。
There are not many dishes today; help yourselves.
夏天天气很热，他在用凉菜就酒。
Xiàtiān tiānqì hěnrè，tā zài yòng liángcài jiù jiǔ。
It is very hot in summer, so he drinks with some cold dishes.
多吃空心菜可以补充维生素。
Duō chī kōngxīncài kěyǐ bǔchōng wéishēngsù。
Water spinach can supply vitamins.
妈妈夸许我做的这道菜味道很好。
Māma kuāxǔ wǒ zuò de zhè dào cài wèidào hěnhǎo。
Mom commended my dish as delicious.
我从菜谱上学会了做拉丝苹果。
Wǒ cóng càipǔ shàng xuéhuì le zuò lāsīpíngguǒ。
I have learned to make hot candied apples from the cook book.
她喜欢吃四川菜，喜欢那种辣乎乎的感觉。
Tā xǐhuan chī Sìchuāncài，xǐhuan nàzhǒng làhūhū de gǎnjué。
She likes Sichuan dishes and is fond of the peppery taste.
她做菜很喜欢用辣椒油调味。
Tā zuò cài hěnxǐhuan yòng làjiāoyóu tiáowèi。
She likes flavouring dishes with chili oil.
这坛子老汤下次腌咸菜时还可以用，不要倒掉。
Zhè tánzi lǎotāng xiàcì yān xiáncài shí hái kěyǐ yòng，búyào dàodiào。
This jar of old marinade can be used next time. Don\'t pour it away.
每次出去吃饭的时候，我总是冷碟热菜搭配着点餐。
Měi cì chūqù chīfàn de shíhou，wǒ zǒngshì lěngdié rècài dāpèi zhe diǎncān。
Every time I go out to eat I always order cold, and hot dishes together.
他开了一个冷荤菜小店，由于物美价廉，生意很红火。
Tā kāi le yígè lěnghūncài xiǎodiàn，yóuyú wùměi jiàlián，shēngyì hěnhónghuǒ。
He has opened a store selling cold meet. Because the food is cheap and good, the business is prosperous.
这顿利口的饭菜让我的减肥计划又泡汤了。
Zhè dùn lìkǒu de fàncài ràng wǒ de jiǎnféi jìhuà yòu pàotāng le。
The delicious food made my plan to lose weight fail again.
总吃大鱼大肉不如吃些像莲花白这样的蔬菜对身体有益。
Zǒngchī dàyú dàròu bùrú chī xiē xiàng liánhuābái zhèyàng de shūcài duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
It is helpful for your health to eat vegetables such as brocoli rather than meat, and fish.
在正菜上桌之前，服务员先上了四个凉碟。
Zài zhèngcài shàngzhuō zhīqián，fúwùyuán xiān shàng le sì gè liángdié。
Before the entrees are served, the waiter first serves four cold dishes.
这家餐厅今天的半价菜是卤鸡。
Zhèjiā cāntīng jīntiān de bànjiàcài shì lǔjī。

他尝出这道菜里放的是卤盐。
Tā chángchū zhè dào cài lǐ fàng de shì lǔyán。

这道菜若是浇上卤汁，会更好吃。

这家餐厅的鲁菜很出名，有空来尝尝。

Shūcài lúnzhòng yǒulìyú fángzhǐ tǔrǎng de yíngyǎng chéngfèn liúshī。

那个闷罐儿里腌制着一些白菜。
Nàge mènguànr lǐ yānzhì zhe yìxiē báicài。

他最善于用米豆腐作为原料烹调菜肴了。

He is adept at cooking dishes with rice tofu.
炒这道菜的时候，一定要多放一些绵糖。

Some fine white sugar must be added when cooking this dish.
到福建旅游时，我们吃到了正宗的闽菜。

We ate authentic Fujian cuisine when we were traveling in Fujian.

她喜欢吃木樨肉，每次在餐馆吃饭，总点这个菜。

他喝酒的时候喜欢拿牛筋当下酒菜。

He loves cooking. Preparing meals and dishes is a joy for him.
这盘菜的佐料配搭不太合适，盐放多了。

Yòng qīngyóu chǎo de hūncài hěnhǎo chī。

萝卜是一种秋菜，可以做成很多种食物。

Radishes are a kind of autumn vegetables, which can be made into many different dishes.
如果不是主人一再劝让，他还不好意思动筷吃菜呢。
Rúguǒ búshì zhǔrén yízài quàn ràng，tā hái bùhǎoyìsī dòng kuài chī cài ne。
If the host hadn\'t persuaded him again and again, he would have been too embarrassed to eat.
如果多煮半个小时，这道菜可能会更加入味儿。
Rúguǒ duō zhǔ bàn gè xiǎoshí，zhè dào cài kěnéng huì gèngjiā rùwèir。
The dish will be more tasty if you cook it half an hour longer.
他洗了一把青菜，然后将它们放在筲箕里控水。
Tā xǐ le yìbǎ qīngcài，ránhòu jiāng tāmen fàng zài shāojī lǐ kòngshuǐ。
He washed some vegetables, and put them in a bamboo basket to dry.
这道菜的食料都是普通常见的东西，但经名厨做出，就显得不同凡响了。
Zhè dào cài de shíliào dōushì pǔtōng chángjiàn de dōngxi，dàn jīng míngchú zuòchū，jiù xiǎnde bùtóng fánxiǎng le。
The ingredients of this dish are ordinary foodstuffs, but it is wonderful in the hand of a renowned cook.
他做的饭菜美味适口。
Tā zuò de fàncài měiwèi shìkǒu。
The dishes he made are delicious and suit my taste.
蔬菜暖棚都是用塑料布做的。
Shūcài nuǎnpéng dōushì yòng sùliàobùzuò de。

你把摊放在案板上的这些菜炒了吧。
Nǐ bǎ tānfàng zài ànbǎn shàng de zhèxiē cài chǎo le ba。
Please stir-fry the vegetables spread out on the chopping board.
这个摊主很会做生意，对顾客热情且从不缺斤短两，所以大伙儿都爱买他的菜。
Zhège tānzhǔ hěnhuì zuò shēngyì，duì gùkè rèqíng qiě cóng bùquējīn duǎnliǎng，suǒyǐ dàhuǒr dōu ài mǎi tā de cài。
That vendor knows how to do business. He is always warm to his customers and never gives short weight. That\'s why everybody buys from him.
我决定试着在这块田地里套作两种蔬菜。

I\'ve decided to use interplanting in this field.

好久没吃到如此甜香可口的饭菜了。
Hǎojiǔ méi chīdào rúcǐ tiánxiāng kěkǒu de fàncài le。
I haven\'t had such delicious dishes for a long time.

Wǒ xīn mǎijìn de shūcài dōushì tǒnghuò。

我们一定要把那个在饭菜中投毒的人找出来。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎ nàge zài fàncài zhōng tóudú de rén zhǎo chūlái。
We must find the person who put poison into the food.
每年冬天，家家户户都会囤积大量的大白菜以备过冬。
Měinián dōngtiān，jiājiāhùhù dōuhuì túnjī dàliàng de dàbáicài yǐ bèi guòdōng。
Each family stores a large amount of cabbage for the winter every year.
做菜不要放太多味素，那东西对健康没有益处！
Zuò cài búyào fàng tài duō wèisù，nà dōngxi duì jiànkāng méiyǒu yìchù！
Do not add MSG when cooking the dishes, it is bad for your health.
现在的市民都喜欢食用无公害蔬菜。
Xiànzài de shìmín dōu xǐhuan shíyòng wúgōnghài shūcài。
People like to eat green vegetables today.
菜场的墙上贴着张无头告示，让人看不明白。
Càichǎng de qiángshàng tiēzhe zhāng wútóu gàoshì，ràng rén kàn bùmíngbai。
There is an ambiguous official notice in the food market which confused a lot of people.
今年市场上细菜的品种不少，但价格普遍高于去年。
Jīnnián shìchǎng shàng xìcài de pǐnzhǒng bùshǎo，dàn jiàgé pǔbiàn gāoyú qùnián。
There are more varieties of fine vegetable in the food market this year, but the prices are generally higher compared with those of last year.
妈妈做的菜口味鲜醇，我们全家都很喜欢。
Māma zuò de cài kǒuwèi xiānchún，wǒmen quánjiā dōu hěn xǐhuan。
The dishes cooked by my mother taste fresh and delicious, and are loved by the whole family.
菜场新开了一家专卖冷鲜肉的店铺。
Càichǎng xīnkāi le yìjiā zhuānmài lěngxiānròu de diànpù。
A fresh meat store recently opened in the food market.
一大早菜场内人声嚣杂，生意红火。
Yídàzǎo càichǎng nèi rénshēng xiāozá，shēngyì hónghuǒ。
The food market is very crowded and noisy in the morning.
与外国人用英语对话对他来说是小菜一碟。
Yǔ wàiguórén yòng yīngyǔ duìhuà duì tā láishuō shì xiǎocài yìdié。
It is easy for him to speak English with foreigners.
菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。
Cài lǐ zhǐnéng fàng xiē xiǎowèijīng，duō le búlìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
Don\'t put too much monosodium glutamate in the dishes, as it is bad for your health.
爸爸血脂有点高，应该多吃点蔬菜。
Bàba xuèzhī yǒudiǎn gāo，yīnggāi duōchīdiǎn shūcài。
Dad\'s blood-fat level is a bit high. He should eat more vegetables.
这道菜是阉猪肉做的，你尝尝鲜。
Zhè dào cài shì yānzhūròu zuò de，nǐ chángcháng xiān。
This dish is made of hog meat, have a try!
冬天妈妈做了很多风味独特的腌菜。
Dōngtiān māma zuò le hěnduō fēngwèi dútè de yāncài。
Mother made a lot of delicious pickles in winter.
餐馆最近出售野禽的菜肴，卖得很好。
Cānguǎn zuìjìn chūshòu yěqín de càiyáo，mài de hěnhǎo。
The restaurant sells dishes made of wild fowl, they sell well.
春天到了，河畔的油菜子都开出了小花。
Chūntiān dào le，hépàn de yóucàizǐ dōu kāichū le xiǎohuā。
Spring has arrived, and the rapeseeds along the river bank are blossoming with small flowers.
用油菜籽榨出的油颜色是土黄色的。
Yòng yóucàizǐ zhàchū de yóu yánsè shì tǔhuángsè de。
The oil extracted from rapeseeds is yellowish-brown.
早晨，妈妈专门跑到中心菜场去买油豆腐。
Zǎochén，māma zhuānmén pǎodào zhōng xīn càichǎng qù mǎi yóudòufu。
In the morning, mother went to the central vegetable market especially to buy fried tofu.
妈妈最拿手的一道菜就是炒鱼片儿。
Māma zuì náshǒu de yídào cài jiùshì chǎoyúpiànr。
The dish that mother makes best is stir-fried sliced fish meat.
爷爷这么多年来吃的都是玉米油烹制的菜肴。
Yéye zhème duōniánlái chī de dōushì yùmǐyóu pēngzhì de càiyáo。
Grandpa has been eating dishes cookedcorn oil for many years.
我们饭店的厨师精通粤菜。
Wǒmen fàndiàn de chúshī jīngtōng yuècài。
Our restaurant\'s cook is a master of Guangdong cuisine.
他从小在兰州长大，所以每道菜他都会放些孜然。
Tā cóng xiǎo zài Lánzhōu zhǎngdà，suǒyǐ měi dào cài tā dōuhuì fàng xiē zīrán。

Xuědì shàng qíchē yào géwài xiǎoxīn。

脂砚斋评点了曹雪芹的《红楼梦》。

Zhiyanzhai wrote commentaries on &quot;The Dream of the Red Mansions&quot; written by Cao Xueqin.

Dàxuě píngméng le zhěnggè cūnzhuāng。
Heavy snow covered the whole village.

每年冬天都会有很多游客来这里观赏塞北的雪景。

Every winter many tourists came here to view, and admire the snow covered view of the north Great Wall.
还望法官明察，为我伸雪啊！
Hái wàng fǎguān míng chá，wéi wǒ shēn xuě a！
Mr. Judge, I hope you can investigate this thoroughly and correct my unfair conviction!
不经历些霜雪怎能知道如何面对挫折呢？
Bù jīnglì xiē shuāngxuě zěnnéng zhīdào rúhé miànduì cuòzhé ne？
How can one know how to face setbacks if one hasn\'t gone through troubles?
春天到了，气温开始回升，冰雪也渐渐消溶了。
Chūntiān dào le，qìwēn kāishǐ huíshēng，bīngxuě yě jiànjiàn xiāoróng le。
Spring comes, the temperature rises, and the snow and ice melt gradually.
隔壁邻居家新买了一辆雪佛兰小卧车。
Gébì línjū jiā xīnmǎi le yí liàng xuěfólán xiǎowòchē。
My neighbor has just bought a Chevrolet.

Guò le xiǎoxuě jiéqi tiān jiù yuèláiyuè lěng le。
It is getting colder after the Lesser Snow.
小朋友们玩得真欢，完全顾不上正在下的小雪。
Xiǎopéngyoumen wán de zhēn huān，wánquán gùbúshàng zhèngzài xià de xiǎoxuě。
The children are playing happily and forget about the snow completely.
初春的小雪压弯了新绿的柳树枝。
Chūchūn de xiǎoxuě yāwān le xīnlǜ de liǔshùzhī。
The snow of early spring bends the pale green branches of the willows.
雪在空中旋舞，好像有了灵性。
Xuě zài kōng zhōng xuánwǔ，hǎo xiàng yǒu le líng xìng。
The snow is whirling and wheeling in the sky, as if it is bestowed with some spirit.
雪地上留下了一串脚印。
Xuědìshàng liúxià le yíchuàn jiǎoyìn。
There is a trail of footprints on the snow-covered field.
每年哈尔滨都有雪雕比赛。
Měinián Hāěrbīn dōu yǒu xuědiāo bǐsài。
Every year, there is a snow-carving contest in Harbin.
雪雕树立在城市的中心吸引了很多人。
Xuědiāo shùlì zài chéngshì de zhōng xīn xīyǐn le hěnduō rén。
In the central area of the city, snow sculptures attract many people.
去年我们去雪峰，很多人都说太冷了。
Qùnián wǒmen qù xuěfēng，hěnduōrén dōu shuō tài lěng le。
Last year we went to the snowy mountain. Many people said it was too cold out there.
超市用雪柜储藏冷饮。
Chāoshì yòng xuěguì chǔcáng lěngyǐn。
The supermarket uses a refrigerator to store drinks.
北国的雪景可美了，每年吸引大量游人。
Běiguó de xuějǐng kě měi le，měinián xīyǐn dàliàng yóurén。
The snowscape in north China is so beautiful that it attracts a great number of tourists every year.
他的家乡盛产的雪梨可好吃了。
Tā de jiāxiāng shèngchǎn de xuělí kě hǎo chī le。
The pears grown in his hometown are quite delicious.
妈妈每年都腌制雪里蕻，我们都爱吃。
Māma měinián dōu yānzhì xuělǐhóng，wǒmen dōu ài chī。
We like the pickled vegetable mom makes every year.
北国的冬天，每家门口都可以看见雪罗汉。
Běiguó de dōngtiān，měijiā ménkǒu dōu kěyǐ kànjiàn xuěluóhàn。
In winter, there are snowmen in front of every house in north China.
古人用雪水沏茶，味道很特别。
Gǔrén yòng xuěshuǐ qīchá，wèidào hěn tèbié。
In ancient China, people used melted snow to obtain a special flavor for their tea.
他们在一个雪天分手了。
Tāmen zài yígè xuětiān fēnshǒu le。
They broke up on a snowy day.
在北国的雪线上有很多可爱的小动物。
Zài běiguó de xuěxiànshàng yǒu hěnduō kě\'ài de xiǎodòngwù。
In  north China, there are lots of lovely animals living above the snow line.
雪野四处都是我们的部队。
Xuěyě sìchǔ dōushì wǒmen de bùduì。
Our army is scattered around this snow-covered field.
在一个寒冷的雪夜，我离开了家乡。
Zài yígè hánlěng de xuěyè，wǒ líkāi le jiāxiāng。
On a cold snowy night, I left my hometown.
雪灾使学生不能正常上课。
Xuězāi shǐ xuésheng bùnéng zhèngcháng shàngkè。
The snowstorm stops students from going to class as usual.
她在冬天收集了许多雪水，准备夏天用来降暑。
Tā zài dōngtiān shōují le xǔduō xuěshuǐ，zhǔnbèi xiàtiān yònglái jiàngshǔ。
She collected lots of snow water in winter so as to reduce the heat in summer.
野战部队正在冒着寒冷的雨雪急行军。
Yězhàn bùduì zhèngzài mào zhe hánlěng de yǔxuě jíxíngjūn。
The field troop is marching hurriedly in the cold rain and snow.
她戴上毡帽走进了茫茫的风雪中。
Tā dàishàng zhānmào zǒujìn le mángmáng de fēngxuě zhōng。
She put on her felt hat and walked into the boundless wind and snow.
明天有中雪，我们的计划成为了泡影。
Míngtiān yǒu zhōng xuě，wǒmen de jìhuà chéngwéi le pàoyǐng。
There will be moderate snow tomorrow. Therefore, our plan is impossible to carry out.
今天早晨，周天飘着雪花，很漂亮的。
Jīntiān zǎochén，zhōutiān piāo zhe xuěhuā，hěn piàoliàng de。
This morning, there are beautiful snowflakes all over the sky.
阳春白雪不是谁都能欣赏的。
Yángchūn báixuě búshì shuí dōu néng xīnshǎng de。
Not everyone can enjoy highbrow art and literature.
南极圈里十分寒冷，一片的冰天雪地。
Nánjíquān lǐ shífēn hánlěng，yípiàn de bīngtiānxuědì。
It is frigid at the Antarctic Circle, which is a world of ice and snow.
小明把被雪水弄湿了的帽子放在暖气片上，很快就烘干了。
Xiǎo Míng bǎ bèi xuěshuǐ nòng shī le de màozi fàngzài nuǎnqìpiàn shàng，hěnkuài jiù hōnggān le。
Xiao Ming put his cap, made wet by the snow and water, on the radiator. It soon became dry.

山上点缀着白雪。

low in calories
含卡路里不高的；热量不足的
High calorie food was excepted from the menu since last year.
从去年开始，高卡路里食物就被从菜单上去掉了。
This contains a lot of calories, so we shouldn\'t eat too much.
这种食品的卡路里含量很高，我们不应该吃太多。
The calorie content in this ice cream is very high.
这种冰激凌的卡路里含量很高。
low in calories/salt/fat
低卡路里/盐/脂肪
Most chocolate bars have about 300 calories per bar.
Dàbùfèn qiǎokèlì měi kuài hányǒu dàyuē 300 kǎlùlǐ rèliàng。
大部分巧克力每块含有大约300卡路里热量。

潜水可以尽可能多地消耗卡路里。

Hěn róngyì tōngguò tiáozhěng nǐ měi tiān de Kǎlùlǐ shèrùliàng lái tígāo huò jiàngdī tǐzhòng。
很容易通过调整你每天的卡路里摄入量来提高或降低体重。

Yóuyǒng bàn xiǎoshí jiāng ránshāo diào 108 kǎlùlǐ de rèliàng。
游泳半小时将燃烧掉108卡路里的热量。

this morning (afternoon)

从上午八点工作到下午两点一直没有停歇

The auction will wind up this afternoon.
我用了一下午的时间把煤末做成了这些煤饼。
Wǒ yòng le yíxiàwǔ de shíjiān bǎ méimò zuòchéng le zhèxiē méibǐng。
It took me a whole afternoon to make this coal dust into coal cakes.

我希望通过下午的会议能够消除各方面的歧见。
Wǒ xīwàng tōngguò xiàwǔ de huìyì nénggòu xiāochú gè fāngmiàn de qíjiàn。
I hope to eliminate all kinds of conflicting ideas in the meeting afternoon.
今天下午公司要清库盘点货物。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ gōngsī yào qīngkù pándiǎn huòwù。

Xiàwǔ sān diǎn wǒmen jiāng zhàokāi gōngsī quántǐ huìyì。

今天下午的聚餐，我们吃的是海鲜全席！
Jīntiān xiàwǔ de jùcān，wǒmen chī de shì hǎixiān quánxí！
For the meal this afternoon, we shall eat only sea food!
今天下午的会议要求全员参加。
Jīntiān xiàwǔ de huìyì yāoqiú quányuán cānjiā。
All staff are required to attend the meeting this afternoon.
你把这些散件先收拾起来，咱们下午再接着组装。
Nǐ bǎ zhèxiē sǎnjiàn xiān shōushi qǐlái，zánmen xiàwǔ zài jiē zhe zǔzhuāng。

The store received a shipment of new-style sweaters, which were all sold out in one morning.
下午三点我们在门口取齐。
Xiàwǔ sān diǎn wǒmen zài ménkǒu qǔqí。
We\'ll assemble at the gate at 3 o\'clock in the afternoon.
一直到中午才散会。
Yìzhí dào zhōng wǔ cái sànhuì。
The meeting didn\'t end until noon.
晌午饭
shǎnɡwǔfàn
midday meal; lunch
晌午觉
shǎngwǔjiào
afternoon nap
下午不上班。
Xiàwǔ bú shàngbān。
We\'ll take the afternoon off. or No work this afternoon.

shèwǔ(wǎn)yàn
give a midday (evening) banquet
上午八时
shàngwǔ bā shí
at 8 o\'clock in the morning; at 8 a.m.

Wǒmen jīntiān xiàwǔ wǔ diǎn bàn shōugōng。

睡午觉
shuì wǔjiào
take a nap after lunch

Dìngyú míngtiān shàngwǔ bā diǎn zài lǐtángkāihuì，tècǐ tōngzhī。

Jīntiān xiàwǔ yǒu yì jié tǐyùkè。

睡了个甜美的午觉
shuì le gè tiánměi de wǔjiào 
have a refreshing nap after lunch

Tā shàngwǔ lái tóngwǒ gàobié le。
He came to say good-bye to me this morning.
中午时分雾就散了。
Zhōngwǔ shífēn wù jiù sàn le。
Around midday, the fog lifted.

Měitiān xiàwǔ liù diǎn xiàbān。

Xiàwǔ yǒu chǎngdiànyǐng。

Xiàwǔ jiàn！

wèn gè zǐwǔmǎoyǒu 
get to the bottom of things

He hummed and hawed for quite a while, failing to come out with any convincing argument.

méi hùnchū gè zǐwǔmǎoyǒu

中午封局时，比赛双方共走了40步棋。

每天吃过午饭以后，爷爷都会小憩有倾。

今天下午我无事可做，于是乎上网聊天。

你下午来找我，再不然我去找你。

good morning/afternoon!
早上/下午好！
lunch hour
午餐时间
I had lunch with him last week.
我上个星期跟他一起吃的午饭。
They had a late lunch.
他们午餐吃得比较晚。
to have lunch (with sb)
(与某人)共进午餐
to have sth for lunch
午餐吃某物
to invite sb to lunch
邀请某人共进午餐
to be on one\'s lunch break
在午休
at lunchtime
午休时候
We meet up for lunch once a week.
我们每周会面一次共进午餐。
at midday
在正午
in the middle of the morning
上午10点左右
at midnight
在午夜

我们花了一上午时间来打扫厨房。

他会在明天上午回电话
this morning
今天上午
on Monday morning
星期一上午
at noon
中午
it\'s past midnight
过了午夜

早/午餐高层汇报会

[BRIT] (下午)茶

中午12点

我会一直呆到下午5点30分

Boating competitions are held here during every Dragon Boat Festival.
每年的端午节，我都会用佩兰做些香袋送给朋友。
Měinián de duānwǔjié，wǒ dōuhuì yòng pèilán zuò xiē xiāngdài sònggěi péngyou。
I make some sachets of fragrant orchids and give them to my friends every Dragon Boat Festival.
每年端午节镇子里都要举行赛龙舟活动。
Měinián Duānwǔ Jié zhènzǐ lǐ dōuyào jǔxíng sàilóngzhōu huódòng。
Every dragon boat festival, the town will hold a dragon boat race.
中国南方有端午节喝雄黄酒的风俗。
Zhōngguó nánfāng yǒu duānwǔjié hē xiónghuángjiǔ de fēngsú。
South China has the custom of drinking realgar wine during the Dragon Boat Festival.
小镇端午节赛龙舟的习俗可是由来已久。
Xiǎozhèn duānwǔjié sàilóngzhōu de xísú kěshì yóulái yǐjiǔ。
The custom of dragon boat competitions at the Dragon Boat Festival in this town has a long history.
端午节的空气里弥漫着艾蒿的清香。
Duānwǔjié de kōngqì lǐ mímànzhe àihāo de qīngxiāng。
The air is filled with the scent of Chinese mugwort on Dragon Boat Festival holiday.
五月初五是中国传统的端午节。
Wǔyuè chūwǔ shì Zhōngguó chuántǒng de Duānwǔ Jié。
The Dragon Boat Festival, a traditional Chinese festival, falls on the 5th day of the 5th lunar month.

为了纪念屈原，我们有在重午划龙舟的习俗。
Wèile jìniàn Qūyuán，wǒmen yǒu zài chóngwǔ huá lóngzhōu de xísú。
Dragon Boat Festival is In memory of Quyuan, and we row dragon boats in that day.
赤道、本初子午线是地球重要的经纬线。
Chìdào、běnchūzǐwǔxiàn shì dìqiú zhòngyào de jīngwěixiàn。
The equator and meridian are important quadrants of our earth.
The cope of clouds covering the city cleared up by mid-day.

永志不忘
yǒngzhìbúwàng
will forever bear in mind; will always cherish the memory of sb. or sth.
永志不忘。
永志不忘。
忘我地工作
wàngwǒ de gōngzuò 
work selflessly; work untiringly
他忘我地朝他的目标奋斗着。
Tā wàngwǒ de cháo tā de mùbiāo fèndòuzhe。
He worked selflessly towards his goal.
他忘我地研究诗歌。
Tā wàngwǒ de yánjiū shīgē。
He lost himself in his study of poetry.
他的忘我精神令人佩服。
Tā de wàngwǒjīngshén lìng rén pèifú。
Everyone admired his selflessness.
我永远不会忘记我们初次见面的那一天。
Wǒ yǒngyuǎn búhuì wàngjì wǒmen chūcì jiànmiàn de nàyìtiān。
I\'ll never forget the day we first met.
如果我忘了，请你提醒我一下。
Rúguǒ wǒ wàng le，qǐngnǐ tíxǐngwǒ yíxià。
Please remind me in case I should forget.
我忘了要去机场接我阿姨。
Wǒ wàngle yào qù jīchǎng jiē wǒ āyí 。
I forgot I needed to pick my aunt up at the airport.
调子我记得，可是词儿我忘了。
Diàozi wǒ jì de，kěshì cír wǒ wàng le。
I remember the tune all right, but I\'ve forgotten the words.
别忘了给我打电话。
Bié wàng le gěi wǒ dǎdiànhuà。
Don\'t forget to phone me.
唉呀，我忘记带钱包了！
Āiya，wǒ wàngjì dài qiánbāo le！
Oops! I forgot my wallet.
我忘了带打火机，想找个人对火。
Wǒ wàng le dài dǎhuǒjī，xiǎng zhǎo gè rén duìhuǒ。
He left his lighter at home, so he had to ask someone for a light.
我忘记带凉帽，快被晒晕了。
Wǒ wàngjì dài liángmào，kuài bèi shàiyūn le。
I have forgotten to put on a sun hat, and nearly fainted under the sunshine.
我忘不了的是那段鎏金岁月。
Wǒ wàngbùliǎo de shì nàduàn liújīn suìyuè。
I couldn’t forget the golden period.

Lǎo Lǐ duì érzi shuō：“jiàn nǐ yuèfù shí biéwàng le tì wǒmen wènhòu yíxià qìngjiāgōng”！
Lao Li said to his son, \'\'Don\'t forget to send our regards to your father-in-law&quot;.
他沉浸在往事的追忆中，忘记了我的存在。
Tā chénjìnzài wǎngshìde zhuīyì zhōng，wàngjìle wǒde cúnzài。
He was immersed in his recollection of the past and forgot about my existence.
我忘了带雨伞。
Wǒ wàngle dài yǔsǎn。
I forgot my umbrella.
我忘记了他的样子。
Wǒ wàngjìle tā de yàngzi。
I\'ve forgotten what he looks like.
我忘记了给朋友写信。
Wǒ wàngjìle gěi péngyou xiěxìn。
I forgot to write a letter to my friend.
我忘关烤箱了。
Wǒ wàng guān kǎoxiāng le 。
I left the oven on.
我一辈子也忘不了义母对我的恩情。
Wǒ yíbèizi yě wàngbuliǎo yìmǔ duì wǒ de ēnqíng。
I shall never forget my foster mother\'s loving-kindness to me as long as I live.
我们不会忘记真心实意帮我们的人。
Wǒmen búhuì wàngjì zhēnxīn shíyì bāng wǒmen de rén。
We will never forget those who has offered us sincere and kind help.
该死！ 我又忘了带钥匙了。
Gāisǐ！Wǒ yòu wàng le dài yàoshi le。
Oh, no! I\'ve forgotten my key again.
亏他提醒了我，要不我早忘了。
Kuī tā tíxǐng le wǒ，yàobùwǒ zǎo wàng le。
Luckily he reminded me; otherwise I\'d have forgotten all about it.
嗨呀，你不说我都忘了！
Hāiya，nǐ bùshuō wǒ dōu wàng le！
Damn it, I\'ll forget it if you do not mention it.
你要忘了台词，我提示你。
Nǐ yào wàngle táicí，wǒ tíshì nǐ。
If you forget your lines, I\'ll prompt you.
他长得什么样，我早就忘得没影儿了。
Tā zhǎng de shénme yàng，wǒ zǎo jiù wàng de méi yǐngr le。
I\'ve clean forgotten what he looked like.
有了新友莫忘旧友，这是我们交友的原则。
Yǒu le xīnyǒu mòwàng jiùyǒu，zhè shì wǒmen jiāoyǒu de yuánzé。
While making new friends,never forget the old ones--this is a basic principle of friendship.
这件事我早已淡忘。
Zhèjiànshì wǒ zǎo yǐ dànwàng。
It has long since faded from my memory.
呀，我的钱包忘在家里了！
Ya，wŏ de qiánbāo wàngzài jiālǐ le！
我们不要忘了这个决议的临时性。
Wǒmen búyào wàng le zhège juéyì de línshíxìng。
We shouldn\'t forget that the resolution is provisional.
您的救命之恩我没世不忘！
Nín de jiùmìng zhī ēn wǒ mòshì búwàng！
You saved my life, and I shall will remember that my entire life.
这切骨之仇，我永生难忘。
Zhè qiēgǔ zhī chóu，wǒ yǒngshēng nánwàng。
This is deep hatred, I will never forget it in my whole life.
今生今世我都不会忘记父母的恩情。
Jīnshēngjīnshì wǒ dōu búhuì wàngjì fùmǔ de ēnqíng.
I will remember my parents\' kindness for the rest of my life.
这里的美景令我们流连忘返。
Zhèlǐ de měijǐng lìng wǒmen liúliánwàngfǎn.
The scenery here is so lovely that I don\'t want to go home.
您的恩德，我永世不忘。
Nín de ēndé，wǒ yǒngshì-búwàng。
I will remember your kindness forever.
当时的情景我久久不能忘怀。
Dāngshí de qíngjǐngwǒ jiǔjiǔ bùnéng wànghuái。

那些侵略者坑杀无辜百姓的罪行，我们绝不能忘记。

老师的谆谆训诲我永远不会忘记。

I will always keep the teachers\' instruction in my mind.

分手的那一幕，我永远不会忘记。

I will never forget the scene when we broke up.

我把开会的事给忘了。

我差点儿把这事给忘了。
Wǒ chàdiǎnr bǎ zhè shì gěi wàng le。
I almost forgot that.

I shall never forget this lesson.

I was burning with rage at his words. I haven\'t forgotten them even now.

I was so busy working it simply slipped my mind.

forget

由于他有一笔支出忘了落账，年底时帐目出现了问题。

Because he forgot to enter an expense in an account, he had some problem with the accounts at the end of the year.

Nín de jiùmìng zhī ēn wǒ mòshì búwàng！
You saved my life, and I shall will remember that my entire life.
他说的话让我怒火中烧，至今也难以忘记。
Tā shuō de huà ràng wǒ nùhuǒ zhōng shāo，zhìjīn yě nányǐ wàngjì。
I was burning with rage at his words. I haven\'t forgotten them even now.
那些盘错纠结的往事，总是令人难忘！

How impressive those complex past events are!

Zhèjiànshì fēicháng qiēyào，nǐ kě bié wàng le a！

Lao Li said to his son, \'\'Don\'t forget to send our regards to your father-in-law&quot;.

The child is beside himself with joy. Whenever you praise him, he turns his head.

He stood on the stage, and was at a loss at how to perform.
每次他打麻将赢钱的时候都会高兴得忘其所以。

他躺在温软的床上，忘记了旅途的劳累。

Lying in his warm bed, he forgets his tiredness from  his travels.

I will always keep the teachers\' instruction in my mind.

忘乎所以

An iambic foot consists of an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed syllable as in \'delay\'.
Yìyánggéshī zhōng de yīnbù shì yóu fēi zhòngdú yīnjié hòu gēnzhe yí gè zhòngdú yīnjié zǔchéng de，lìrú“delay\'。
抑扬格诗中的音步是由非重读音节后跟着一个重读音节组成的，例如“delay”。

Tā zài xìn zhōng rèqíng de zànyángle tā。
她在信中热情地赞扬了他。
They do not preach these principles, but they are implicit in the writing.
Tāmen bù xuānyáng zhèxiē yuánzé，dàn tāmen zài zuòpǐn zhōng yǐnhánle。
他们不宣扬这些原则，但他们在作品中隐含了。
He is well known for lying down on the job.
Tā yóuyú zài gōngzuò zhōng diào\'érlángdāng ér chòumíngyuǎnyáng。
他由于在工作中吊儿郎当而臭名远扬。
He deserves to be highly commended for his heroic acts in war.
Tā lǐyīng yīn qí zài zhànzhēng zhōng de yīngyǒng biǎoxiàn ér shòudào gāodù zànyáng。
他理应因其在战争中的英勇表现而受到高度赞扬。
扬言要进行报复
yángyán yào jìnxíngbàofù
threaten to retaliate
他扬言要打断陶陶的腿。
Tā yángyán yào dǎduàn táotáo de tuǐ。
He was spreading it about that he was going to break Taotao\'s legs.
年轻人还是谨言慎行为好，不要太过张扬。
Niánqīngrén háishì jǐnyán shènxíng wéi hǎo，búyào tàiguò zhāngyáng。
It\'s better for young people to watch their steps in doing things and not to be too arrogant.
扬言。
敌人扬言要血洗这座城市。

恐怖分子扬言要杀死所有人质。
发扬民主，拓宽言路。
to threaten to do sth
扬言做某事
The company plans to dock the officers\' pay and is threatening disciplinary action.

公司打算扣减主管工资，并扬言要给与纪律处分。
Words fail me in praise of your company and its workforce.

我无法用言语来赞扬您的公司及全体员工素质。
The room was abuzz over the latest scandal.
Zhè jiān wūzi bèi zuìjìn de liúyán chǎo de fèifèi-yángyáng。
这间屋子被最近的流言炒得沸沸扬扬。
The pamphlet is prefaced by an elegant poem in praise of the author.

这本小册子的引言是一首优美的诗，用来赞扬作者。
英雄美名天下扬。
Yīnɡxiónɡ měimínɡ tiānxià yánɡ。 
A hero\'s good name spreads far and wide.
古代的大侠扬善除恶，个个都是英雄豪杰。

为人民英雄立传扬名。

他的英雄事迹通过新闻媒体在全国到处宣扬。

tweeter
低频扬声器
dīpín yánɡshēnɡqì
woofer
They contain nothing but speakers each set on a foam mounted speaker baffle.
Tāmen jǐnjǐn bāohán yángshēngqì，měi zǔ dōu ānzhuāng zài diàn yǒu pàomò de yángshēngqì fǎnshèbǎn shàng。
它们仅仅包含扬声器，每组都安装在垫有泡沫的扬声器反射板上。
Today, almost every PC comes equipped with a sound card and associated speakers.
今天几乎所有的个人电脑都装有声卡和扬声器。
Triple speakers are hard to come by in this store.
Zài zhèjiā shāngdiàn hěnshǎo chūshòu sānfēn pín yángshēngqì。
在这家商店很少出售三分频扬声器。
These speakers are designed for gaming and deliver stunning bright sound and thumping clear bass.
Zhèxiē yángshēngqì shì wèi bǐsàichǎngdì shèjì de，tāmen nénggòu fāchū jíqí liáoliàng de shēngxiǎng yǐjí dòng shífēn qīngxī de dīyīn。
这些扬声器是为比赛场地设计的，它们能够发出极其嘹亮的声响以及动十分清晰的低音。
The new speakers give me a good clean sound at loud volumes.

新的扬声器的声音让我听起来清晰而响亮。
Can you connect the two loudspeakers?
Nǐ néng bǎ liǎng gè yángshēngqì liánjiē qǐlái ma？
你能把两个扬声器连接起来吗？
He didn\'t have the right connector between the amplifier and the speakers.
