Mào zhe fēiyáng de chénshā，tā gǎnqù kànwàng yíwèi péngyou。
He hurried off to visit a friend even as dust, and sand blew outside.
这个抽水站负责所辖范围内扬水设施的定期检查。
Zhège chōushuǐzhàn fùzé suǒxiá fànwéi nèi yángshuǐ shèshī de dìngqī jiǎnchá。
This pumping station is responsible for periodic checks of pumps in its administrative area.
他在这一带臭名远扬。
Tā zài zhè yídài chòumíng yuǎnyáng。
His bad reputation was known throughout the area.
我们单位刚被评为了窗口单位，受到赞扬。
Wǒmen dānwèi gāng bèi píngwéi le chuāngkǒu dānwèi，shòudào zànyáng。
Our unit has just been praised and awarded the title of &quot;open window unit&quot;.
看他飞扬踔厉，比赛肯定能赢。
Kàn tā fēiyáng chuōlì，bǐsài kěndìng néng yíng。
Judging by his excited state, it is certain that they will win the competition.
据说，淮扬菜发轫于先秦时期。
Jùshuō，huáiyángcài fārèn yú xiānqín shíqī。
The Huaiyang dish is said to originate from the pre-Qin period.
他谱写的这段交响乐，发扬蹈厉令人振奋。
Tā pǔxiě de zhè duàn jiāoxiǎngyuè，fāyáng dǎolì lìngrén zhènfèn。
The short symphony he composed is really inspiring.
玄奘法师一生都致力于弘扬法旨。
Xuán Zàng fǎshī yìshēng dōu zhìlìyú hóngyáng fǎzhǐ。
Xu Zang devoted all his life to promoting the ideas of Buddhist doctrines.
我军士气高扬，敌军萎靡不振。
Wǒ jūn shìqì gāoyáng，díjūn wěimí búzhèn。
Our soldiers are in high spirits while the enemy is in low spirits.
我们要高扬法制民主的旗帜。
Wǒmen yào gāoyáng fǎzhì mínzhǔ de qízhì。
We should vigorously carry forward the flags of the legal system and democracy.
他读起课文来，声音宏亮，语气抑扬顿挫。
Tā dúqǐ kèwén lái，shēngyīn hóngliàng，yǔqì yìyáng dùncuò。
He reads loud, and the tone is in cadence.
这首宣扬道法的诗将由会众集体朗诵。
Zhèshǒu xuānyáng dàofǎ de shī jiāng yóu huìzhòng jítǐ lǎngsòng。
A poem that spreads magic power will be recited by all the Huidaomen members.
为发扬光大民族手工业，王先生继武家族事业。
Wèi fāyáng guāngdà mínzú shǒugōngyè，Wáng xiānshēng jìwǔ jiāzú shìyè。
In order to bring our national handicraft industry to a great height of development, Mr. Wang went on doing his family business.
我在这次科技比赛中连中三元，得到了老师的表扬。
Wǒ zài zhècì kējì bǐsài zhōng liánzhòng sānyuán，dédào le lǎoshī de biǎoyáng。
I have achieved excellent results in three consecutive technology competitions, and won the praise of our teacher.
城头上有一面大旗在猎猎飘扬。
Chéngtóu shàng yǒu yímiàn dàqí zài lièliè piāoyáng。
On the city wall, there is a big flag flying.
广场上的旗帜在大风中漫卷飘扬。
Guǎngchǎng shàng de qízhì zài dàfēng zhōng mànjuǎn piāoyáng。
The flag on the square is fluttering freely in the strong wind.
这首慢调悠扬婉转，使人陶醉其中。
Zhèshǒu màndiào yōuyáng wǎnzhuǎn，shǐ rén táozuì qí zhōng。
This slow melody is melodious and sweet, and makes people enchanted.
看他说话时讷讷的，写起文章来却是文采飞扬。
Kàn tā shuōhuà shí nènè de，xiě qǐ wénzhāng lái quèshì wéncǎi fēiyáng。
He is an inarticulate speaker, but is a man of literary taste.

Yángzhōu pínghuà shēnshòu dāngdì rénmín xǐ\'ài。
Yangzhou Pinghua is loved by local people.
小明的期中考试成绩很好，受到老师表扬。

她的长发在晨风中轻扬。
Tā de chángfà zài chénfēng zhōng qīngyáng。
Her hair is drifting lightly in the morning wind.
年轻人还是谨言慎行为好，不要太过张扬。

It\'s better for young people to watch their steps in doing things and not to be too arrogant.
她做事低调，不喜欢声扬。
Tā zuòshì dīdiào，bùxǐhuan shēngyáng。
She keeps a low key in life, not liking to show off.
你怎么偏偏喜欢将家丑外扬呢？

叔叔总是喜欢在亲朋好友面前显扬自己的宝贝儿子。

My uncle always likes to brag about the worthy son of his in front of his relatives.
岳飞以他的精忠报国精神显扬于世。

Yue Fei is famous for his loyalty to his country.

The teacher praised him in front of all the smiling students.

Wǒmen de shèhuì chàngyáng xīnfēng。
Our society promotes new customs.
她穿着军装站在操场上，秀发随风飞扬。
Tā chuān zhe jūnzhuāng zhànzài cāochǎng shàng，xiùfà suífēng fēiyáng。
She stood at the playground in her army suit, her beautiful hair flying with the wind.
她扬鞭而去，估计是不会回来了。
Tā yángbiān érqù，gūjì shì búhuì huílái le。
She went away with a swagger, and probably won\'t come back .

The rolling sea is another seascape of surging waves.
你应该在扬尘天气的时候减少出行。

You should reduce your travel during dusty weather.

Tā de shǒuyì jīngzhàn，míngyáng sìhǎi。
He is skillful and world-famous.

Chivalrous men in ancient times did good deeds and destroyed evil, all of them were heroes.

Tā yángshǒu gěi le tā yígè ěrguāng，ránhòu pǎo le。
She raised her hand, slapped him and ran away.
瞧他那耀武扬威的样子，真讨厌。

This great poet used to be the magistrate of Yangzhou.

to praise sb for sth/for doing sth
因某事赞扬某人/赞扬某人做某事
The death penalty brutalises society and breeds contempt for human life.
Sǐxíng xiàng shèhuì xuānyáng bàolì，xuānyáng duì shēngmìng de mòshì。
死刑向社会宣扬暴力，宣扬对生命的漠视。
They contain nothing but speakers each set on a foam mounted speaker baffle.
Tāmen jǐnjǐn bāohán yángshēngqì，měi zǔ dōu ānzhuāng zài diàn yǒu pàomò de yángshēngqì fǎnshèbǎn shàng。
它们仅仅包含扬声器，每组都安装在垫有泡沫的扬声器反射板上。
The room was abuzz over the latest scandal.
Zhè jiān wūzi bèi zuìjìn de liúyán chǎo de fèifèi-yángyáng。
这间屋子被最近的流言炒得沸沸扬扬。
the barrel of a windlass
卷扬机的圆筒
dip the flag in salute
(对另一船舰)扬旗致敬，行点旗礼
ill favored
其貌不扬的
a flag fluttering in the wind
随风飘扬的旗帜
to follow praise with blame
先表扬后责备
to get praised
受表扬
hollow praise
空洞的表扬
hungry for praise
渴望受赞扬
inept praise
可笑的赞扬
just praise
应受的表扬
lay the dust
使尘土不扬
iambic meter
(诗的)抑扬格
prodigal with one\'s praise
乱加赞扬
ravenous for praise
一心想得表扬
iambic rhythm
抑扬格
sweet praise
惬意的赞扬
tossing her head in disdain
她轻蔑地扬起了头
trochaic verse
扬抑格诗
flags waving in the breeze
在微风中飘扬的旗帜
They were praised for their hard work.
他们的努力工作受到了表扬。
They deserve praise for their work on the dictionary.
他们为编写字典所做的工作是值得表扬的。
I want to paint the ceiling to look like clouds.
我想把这个天花板涂成云彩飞扬的样子。
They couldn\'t defeat us because we were full of fight on the field.
我们在赛场上斗志昂扬，他们不可能打败我们。
Today, almost every PC comes equipped with a sound card and associated speakers.
今天几乎所有的个人电脑都装有声卡和扬声器。
I give them full credit for their work.
我高度赞扬了他们的工作。
In this place there are several contractors that provide winding engine drivers.
这个地方有几个承包商能提供卷扬机司机。
to commend sb for sth/for doing sth
表扬某人某事/做某事
it\'s to his credit that...
他值得赞扬的是…
to speak/think highly of sb
赞扬/尊重某人
to be notorious for sth/for doing sth
因某事/做某事而臭名远扬
they went their separate ways
他们分道扬镳了
to speak well {or} highly of sb
赞扬某人
Such a book should be praised, not banned.
此类书应该得到赞扬，而不应被禁止。
to threaten to do sth
扬言做某事
Reporters praised the quick relief efforts of the state officials.
记者赞扬了州政府官员迅速的救灾举动。
They were married in Yonkers, and a week later they went to a resort upstate.
他们在扬克斯举行了婚礼，一星期后，他们去了州北部的一个度假胜地。
With that windfall, Baekeland, with his wife and two children moved to Yonkers.
带着这笔意外之财，贝克兰及其妻子、他们的两个孩子移居到了扬克斯。
Any technology development in the province is worth praise.
这个省的任何技术发展都值得表扬。

那位老师贯彻了学校的教学规章制度，并因此得到了校长的赞扬。

An iambic foot consists of an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed syllable as in \'delay\'.

抑扬格诗中的音步是由非重读音节后跟着一个重读音节组成的，例如“delay”。

宣扬好人好事
xuānyánghǎorén hǎoshì
give publicity to good people and their good deeds
宣扬
xuānyáng
publicise; propagate; advocate; advertise

窗户的底部与地板同高。
I could see my classmates playing catch from my window.
Tòuguò chuānghu，wǒ kěyǐ kàndào wǒ de tóngxué zhèngzài wán chuánjiēqiú yóuxì。
透过窗户，我可以看到我的同学正在玩传接球游戏。
他在窗外窃听屋里人谈话。
Tā zài chuānɡ wài qiètīnɡ wū li rén tánhuà。
He hid just outside the window and eavesdropped on the conversation going on inside the room.
他悄声地告诉我窗外有人在偷听。
Tā qiǎoshēng de gàosù wǒ chuāngwài yǒurén zài tōutīng。
He whispered to me that there was an eavesdropper outside the window.
I heard whispers outside my window.
我听见了窗外窃窃私语的声音。

你听见敲窗户的砰砰声了吗？
I heard the rain striking the window.
Wǒ tīngzhe yǔshēng chuānguò chuānghu。
我听着雨声穿过窗户。

她可以听到游乐场的铁百叶窗被卷起的声音。
I yelled to her from the window but she couldn\'t hear me.
Wǒ cóng chuāngkǒu xiàng tā hǎn，dàn tā tīngbújiàn。
我从窗口向她喊，但她听不见。

我凝视窗外，试图理解刚才听到的话。

冬天要选择一些厚质的布料做窗帷。
